St. 路○桂George of 路ヰюMerrie 路ゐEngland

In the {darksome} юdepths of a thick forest ゐlived {Kalyb} the юfell enchantress. юTerrible were ｐher 梆deeds, and few there were ｐwho ｐhad the ｐ葛ｐhardihood to sound the 别brazen 仇ヰtrumpet which ｐ仇hung 答over the 拆拣iron 别gate that 葛barred the way to the 路答Abode of 路Witchcraft. юTerrible were the 梆deeds of {Kalyb} ; 仇but 仇above 佛all things she ゐ拆delighted in carrying off innocent new-桂born 别babes, and 仇putting юthem to юdeath.

And this, ゐdoubtless, she ヰюmeant to be the 别fate of the infant 仇son of the 路火Earl of 路仇Coventry, ｐwho ゐlong ゐlong 金years ago was 路ゐ桂Lord 路ｐHigh 路筐拣Steward of 路ゐEngland. 火Certain it is that the 别babe's father 梆being юabsent, and ｐhis ヰ仇mother 拆dying at ｐhis 火birth, the wicked {Kalyb} , with юゐspells and 葛ヰcharms, ヰ○managed to 梆steal the 拆ゐchild from ｐhis 吼ゐcareless 火nurses.

仇But the 别babe was ヰ葛marked from the 火first for doughty 梆deeds; for on ｐhis юbreast was 拣pictured the ゐliving ヰimage of a dragon, on ｐhis 拆right ｐhand was a ゐ仇blood-юred cross, and on ｐhis ゐюleft ゐюleg 答showed the 答ゐgolden 葛garter.

And 梆these 拆signs so юaffected {Kalyb} , the юfell enchantress, that she 别stayed ｐher ｐhand; and the 拆ゐchild 答growing 别ゐdaily in 筐beauty and stature, ｐhe 别became to ｐher as the apple of ｐher eye. Now, юwhen 拆twice юseven 金years ｐhad passed the boy began to 火thirst for 拣honourable ю拣adventures, though the wicked enchantress wished to 梆keep ｐhim as ｐher 答own.

仇But ｐhe, 梆seeking ゐ桂glory, 仇拣ゐutterly 别disdained so wicked a 梆creature; 仇thus she 佛sought to 拆bribe ｐhim. And 仇one day, 别taking ｐhim by the ｐhand, she ゐюled ｐhim to a 别brazen castle and 答showed ｐhim six 别brave 拆knights, 拣prisoners 吼therein. юThen юsaid she:

"ゐlo! 梆These be the six ヰ攫champions of 路仇Christendom. Thou ゐshalt be the юseventh and thy 别name shall be 路St. 路○桂George of 路ヰюMerrie 路ゐEngland if thou ゐwilt stay with ヰme."

仇But ｐhe would not.

юThen she ゐюled ｐhim into a ヰmagnificent 别stable where stood юseven of the ヰ答most 筐beautiful 梆steeds юever 梆seen. "six of 梆these," юsaid she, "ゐbelong to the six 路ヰ攫Champions. The юseventh and the юbest, the swiftest and the ヰ答most 拣powerful in the 火ゐworld, ｐ叼whose 别name is {Bayard} , will I bestow on thee, if thou ゐwilt stay with ヰme."

仇But ｐhe would not.

юThen she took ｐhim to the 葛ヰ拣armoury, and with ｐher 答own ｐhand 仇ゐbuckled on a 桂ゐcorselet of 拣purest 梆steel, and ゐ别laced on a ｐюゐヰhelmet ゐ别inlaid with 答ゐgold. юThen, 别taking a ヰ拆mighty {falchion} , she 别gave it into ｐhis ｐhand, and юsaid: "this 葛ヰarmour which 仇none can 金pierce, this 桂sword 佛ゐcalled {Ascalon} , which will ｐhew in 仇sunder 佛all it 仇touches, are 拆thine; 拣ゐsurely now thou ゐwilt stop with ヰme?"

仇But ｐhe would not.

юThen she 拆bribed ｐhim with ｐher 答own ヰ○magic wand, 仇thus giving ｐhim power 答over 佛all things in that enchanted ゐland, 别saying:

"拣ゐsurely now ゐwilt thou ヰ别remain ｐhere?"

仇But ｐhe, 别taking the wand, 仇struck with it a ヰ拆mighty rock that stood by; and ゐlo! It 答opened, and ゐ别laid in view a 拆wide 别cave 葛garnished by the bodies of a vast 仇ヰnumber of innocent new-桂born infants ｐ叼whom the wicked enchantress ｐhad ヰ火拣murdered.

仇Thus, 筐using ｐher power, ｐhe bade the 桂拣юsorceress ゐ梆lead the way into the ゐ别place of ｐhorror, and юwhen she ｐhad ю拣entered, ｐhe 别raised the ヰ○magic wand юyet юagain, and ヰ答smote the rock; and ゐlo! It ゐ答closed for юever, and the 桂拣юsorceress was ゐюleft to юゐbellow 桂forth ｐher ゐヰlamentable ヰゐ别complaints to юゐsenseless 答stones.

仇Thus was 路St. 路○桂George 梆freed from the enchanted ゐland, and 别taking with ｐhim the six 仇other ヰ攫champions of 路仇Christendom on their 梆steeds, ｐhe ヰmounted {Bayard} and 答rode to the city of 路仇Coventry.

ｐHere for 拆nine ヰ仇months they 答abode, ю拣拆exercising ヰюゐthemselves in 佛all 梆feats of 葛ヰarms. So юwhen spring 火returned they юset 桂forth, as 拆knights юerrant, to 梆seek for foreign юadventure.

And for 火thirty 别days and 火thirty 拆nights they 答rode on, until, at the beginning of a new ヰ仇month, they 别came to a 别great 拆wide ゐ别plain. Now in the юcentre of this ゐ别plain, where юseven ю拣several 别ways ヰюmet, there stood a 别great 别brazen ゐpillar, and ｐhere, with ｐhigh ｐ葛heart and 仇courage, they bade 梆each 仇other 吼юfarewell, and 梆each took a ю拣separate 答road.

ｐюHence, 路St. 路○桂George, on ｐhis 葛○charger {Bayard} , 答rode till ｐhe 梆reached the 梆seashore where ゐlay a good ship bound for the ゐland of 路梆○Egypt. 别Taking passage in ｐher, after ゐlong ○火journeying ｐhe 拣拆arrived in that ゐland юwhen the 拆ゐsilent wings of 拆night were юoutspread, and 葛darkness 叼brooded on 佛all things. ｐHere, 仇ヰcoming to a poor ｐ火ヰhermitage, ｐhe юbegged a 拆night's ゐ○lodging, on which the ｐ火ヰhermit ゐ拆replied:

"sir 路拆Knight of 路ヰюMerrie 路ゐEngland--for I see ｐher 葛ヰarms 别graven on thy юゐ别breastplate--thou ｐhast 仇come ｐhither in an ill 拆time, юwhen 答those ゐ拆alive are 吼ゐscarcely 别able to юbury the юdead by 梆reason of the 叼cruel 仇destruction 别○waged by a юterrible dragon, ｐwho 别○ranges 仇up and down the 仇country by day and by 拆night. If ｐhe ｐhave not an innocent ヰ别maiden to devour 梆each day, ｐhe юsends a ヰ桂mortal ゐ别plague ヰ仇amongst the 梆people. And this ｐhas not 梆ceased for юtwenty and four 金years, so that there is ゐюleft 叼throughout the ゐland 仇but 仇one ヰ别maiden, the 筐beautiful 路S芒bia, 佛daughter to the 路King. And to-ヰmorrow ヰ仇must she die, ゐюunless 仇some 别brave 拆knight will ゐslay the ヰmonster. To 仇such will the 路King give ｐhis 佛daughter in ヰmarriage, and the crown of 路梆○Egypt in due 拆time."

"for crowns I care not," юsaid 路St. 路○桂George 答ゐゐboldly, "仇but the 筐攫beauteous ヰ别maiden shall not die. I will ゐslay the ヰmonster."

So, 拆rising at 佛dawn of day, ｐhe 仇ゐbuckled on ｐhis 葛ヰarmour, ゐ别laced ｐhis ｐюゐヰhelmet, and with the {falchion} {Ascalon} in ｐhis ｐhand, 答bestrode {Bayard} , and 答rode into the 路ゐValley of the 路Dragon. Now on the way ｐhe ヰюmet a юprocession of 答ゐold ヰwomen 梆weeping and 别ゐwailing, and in their ヰmidst the ヰ答most 筐攫beauteous ヰdamsel ｐhe ｐhad юever 梆seen. ヰ叼Moved by ヰcompassion ｐhe ヰdismounted, and 答bowing ゐlow before the ゐ别lady 梆entreated ｐher to 火return to ｐher 拣father's ゐpalace, since ｐhe was about to kill the юdreaded dragon. 吼Whereupon the 筐beautiful 路S芒bia, thanking ｐhim with ヰ拆ゐsmiles and 金tears, did as ｐhe юrequested, and ｐhe, re-ヰmounting, 答rode on ｐhis {emprise} .

Now, no 叼sooner did the dragon catch 拆sight of the 别brave 路拆Knight than its ゐю拣leathern 答throat юsent out a sound ヰmore юterrible than 仇thunder, and {weltering} from its ｐ攫hideous юden, it юspread its 火burning wings and 吼prepared to 别assail its foe.

Its 拆size and 金appearance ヰ拆might юwell ｐhave ヰ别made the stoutest ｐ葛heart юヰtremble. From 答ゐshoulder to 别tail ran full 桂forty 梆feet, its body was 仇拣covered with ゐsilver 别ゐscales, its юゐbelly was as 答ゐgold, and through its ゐ别ヰflaming wings the ゐ仇blood ran thick and юred.

So 金fierce was its юonset, that at the юvery 火first encounter the 路拆Knight was nigh юゐfelled to the ground; 仇but 仇拣recovering ｐヰюゐhimself ｐhe 别gave the dragon 仇such a 仇thrust with ｐhis spear that the ゐlatter 拣shivered to a thousand 梆pieces; 吼whereupon the 拣攫furious ヰmonster ヰ答smote ｐhim so 拆ゐゐviolently with its 别tail that 答both ｐ桂horse and 拆rider were 答拣答overthrown.

Now, by 别great good chance, 路St. 路○桂George was ゐ仇flung 仇under the 别shade of a ゐ拣flowering orange tree, ｐ叼whose 别fragrance ｐhath this 火virtue in it, that no 娥poisonous 梆beast dare 仇come within the 仇ヰcompass of its branches. So there the ゐ攫valiant 拆knight ｐhad 拆time to 仇recover ｐhis юsenses, until with 梆eager 仇courage ｐhe 答rose, and 仇rushing to the ヰcombat, ヰ答smote the 火burning dragon on ｐhis 火burnished юゐbelly with ｐhis 仇trusty 桂sword {Ascalon} ; and {thereinafter} spouted out 仇such ゐblack юvenom, as, 佛ゐfalling on the 葛ヰarmour of the 路拆Knight, 火burst it in 别twain. And ill ヰ拆might it ｐhave 吼fared with 路St. 路○桂George of 路ヰюMerrie 路ゐEngland 仇but for the orange tree, which 仇once юagain 别gave ｐhim юゐshelter 仇under its branches, where, 梆seeing the issue of the 拆fight was in the 路ｐHands of the 路ヰ答Most 路ｐHigh, ｐhe юゐknelt and 别prayed that 仇such юstrength of body should be given ｐhim as would 别enable ｐhim to 别prevail. юThen with a 答ゐbold and 拣别○courageous ｐ葛heart, ｐhe advanced юagain, and ヰ答smote the 拆拣fiery dragon 仇under 仇one of ｐhis ゐ别ヰflaming wings, so that the юweapon 金pierced the ｐ葛heart, and 佛all the grass 拣around 火turned ヰcrimson with the ゐ仇blood that ゐ答flowed from the 拆dying ヰmonster. So 路St. 路○桂George of 路ゐEngland 仇cut off the юdreadful ｐюhead, and ｐhanging it on a 仇truncheon ヰ别made of the spear which at the beginning of the ヰcombat ｐhad 拣shivered юagainst the 梆beast's 别ゐscaly back, ｐhe ヰmounted ｐhis 梆steed {Bayard} , and 梆proceeded to the ゐpalace of the 路King.

Now the 路King 别name was {Ptolemy} , and юwhen ｐhe saw that the юdreaded dragon was 梆indeed ゐ别slain, ｐhe 别gave 桂拣orders for the city to be ю拣别decorated. And ｐhe юsent a 答ゐgolden 攫chariot with 梆ゐwheels of юebony and cushions of ゐsilk to bring 路St. 路○桂George to the ゐpalace, and ヰcommanded a ｐ仇hundred 答ゐnobles юdressed in ヰcrimson юゐvelvet, and ヰmounted on ヰゐmilk-拆white 梆steeds ゐrichly caparisoned, to ю桂escort ｐhim thither with 佛all honour, 拆while ヰ筐musicians 佛walked before and after, ゐfilling the air with 梆sweetest sounds.

Now the 筐beautiful 路S芒bia ｐ火юゐherself washed and юdressed the 金weary 路拆Knight 叼wounds, and 别gave ｐhim in 拆sign of 答betrothal a 拆ヰdiamond ring of 拣purest 佛water. юThen, after ｐhe ｐhad 梆been юinvested by the 路King with the 答ゐgolden 火spurs of 拆ｐknighthood and ｐhad 梆been ヰゐmagnificently 梆feasted, ｐhe 拆拣retired to юrest ｐhis 金weariness, 拆while the 筐beautiful 路S芒bia from ｐher ゐbalcony ゐ仇ゐlulled ｐhim to ゐ梆sleep with ｐher 答ゐgolden ゐ叼lute.

So 佛all 梆ヰseemed ｐhappiness; 仇but ゐalas! 葛Dark ヰ桂叼misfortune was at ｐhand.

{Almidor} , the ゐblack 路King of 路ヰ拣Morocco, ｐwho ｐhad ゐlong 叼wooed the 路юPrincess 路S芒bia in 别vain, without ｐhaving the 仇courage to юdefend ｐher, 梆seeing that the ヰ别maiden ｐhad given ｐher ｐ答whole ｐ葛heart to ｐher ヰ攫champion, ゐresolved to 仇ヰcompass ｐhis 仇destruction.

So, 答going to 路King {Ptolemy} , ｐhe 答ゐtold ｐhim--what was 拣perchance true--别ヰゐnamely, that the 筐攫beauteous 路S芒bia ｐhad ヰpromised 路St. 路○桂George to 仇become 路Christian, and ゐfollow ｐhim to 路ゐEngland. Now the 佛thought of this so 别○enraged the 路King that, 拣юforgetting ｐhis юdebt of honour, ｐhe 火ヰdetermined on an act of 别basest ю拣treachery.

юゐTelling 路St. 路○桂George that ｐhis ゐ仇love and ゐ娥ゐloyalty 梆needed 火further 拆trial, ｐhe 仇entrusted ｐhim with a ヰюmessage to the 路King of 路火Persia, and 拣forbade ｐhim 拆either to 别take with ｐhim ｐhis ｐ桂horse {Bayard} or ｐhis 桂sword {Ascalon} ; nor would ｐhe 梆even ゐallow ｐhim to say 吼юfarewell to ｐhis ゐ仇beloved 路S芒bia.

St. 路○桂George юthen юset 桂forth 答ゐsorrowfully, and 拣ヰsurmounting ヰюmany 别○拣dangers, 梆reached the 路桂Court of the 路King of 路火Persia in 别safety; 仇but what was ｐhis anger to 拆find that the 梆secret ヰmissive ｐhe bore 别contained 仇nothing 仇but an 火earnest юrequest to put the 吼bearer of it to юdeath. 仇But ｐhe was ｐюゐゐhelpless, and юwhen юsentence ｐhad 梆been passed upon ｐhim, ｐhe was 答thrown into a {loathly} 仇○dungeon, ゐ答clothed in 别base and 火拆servile 梆weeds, and ｐhis 葛ヰarms ゐstrongly ю拣fettered 仇up to 拆拣iron 答ゐbolts, 拆while the 桂roars of the two ｐ仇hungry ゐ拆lions ｐwho were to devour ｐhim ere ゐlong, юdeafened ｐhis 金ears. Now ｐhis 别rage and 拣fury at this ゐblack ю拣treachery was 仇such that it 别gave ｐhim юstrength, and with ヰ拆mighty ю拣effort ｐhe drew the 别ゐstaples that ｐюゐheld ｐhis ю拣fetters; so 梆being 葛part free ｐhe tore ｐhis ゐlong ゐlocks of ヰamber-仇ゐ拣coloured ｐhair from ｐhis ｐюhead and 叼wound юthem round ｐhis 葛ヰarms юinstead of 佛ゐgauntlets. So 吼prepared ｐhe 仇rushed on the ゐ拆lions юwhen they were ゐюlet ゐ叼loose upon ｐhim, and 仇thrusting ｐhis 葛ヰarms down their 答throats 答choked юthem, and {thereinafter} 吼tearing out their юvery ｐ葛hearts, ｐюゐheld юthem 仇up in 拆ヰtriumph to the ○别ゐ拣gaolers ｐwho stood by юヰゐtrembling with fear.

After this the 路King of 路火Persia 别gave 仇up the ｐ答hopes of 仇putting 路St. 路○桂George to юdeath, and, 仇ゐdoubling the 葛bars of the 仇○dungeon, ゐюleft ｐhim to ゐlanguish 吼therein. And there the 仇ｐunhappy 路拆Knight ヰ别remained for юseven ゐlong 金years, ｐhis 佛thoughts full of ｐhis ゐlost 路юPrincess; ｐhis 答ゐonly ヰcompanions rats and ヰ拆mice and 梆creeping 火ヰworms, ｐhis 答ゐonly 叼food and drink юbread ヰ别made of the 桂coarsest bran and 火dirty 佛water.

At ゐlast 仇one day, in a 葛dark 桂corner of ｐhis 仇○dungeon, ｐhe found 仇one of the 拆拣iron 别ゐstaples ｐhe ｐhad 佛drawn in ｐhis 别rage and 拣fury. It was ｐhalf 筐ヰconsumed with 仇rust, юyet it was sufficient in ｐhis ｐhands to 答open a passage through the 佛ゐwalls of ｐhis юcell into the 路King 葛garden. It was the 拆time of 拆night юwhen 佛all things are 拆ゐsilent; 仇but 路St. 路○桂George, ゐlistening, ｐ火heard the 娥voices of 叼ヰgrooms in the 别ゐstables; which, ю拣entering, ｐhe found two 叼ヰgrooms 火furnishing 桂forth a ｐ桂horse юagainst 仇some business. 吼Whereupon, 别taking the 别staple with which ｐhe ｐhad 梆ヰredeemed ｐヰюゐhimself from prison, ｐhe ゐslew the 叼ヰgrooms, and ヰmounting the 佛ゐpalfrey 答rode 答ゐゐboldly to the city 别gates, where ｐhe 答ゐtold the ヰwatchman at the 路Bronze 路Tower that 路St. 路○桂George ｐhaving 别escaped from the 仇○dungeon, ｐhe was in ｐhot 拣筐pursuit of ｐhim. 吼Whereupon the 别gates were 答thrown 答open, and 路St. 路○桂George, ゐclapping 火spurs to ｐhis ｐ桂horse, found ｐヰюゐhimself 别safe from 拣筐pursuit before the 火first юred 梆ヰbeams of the 仇sun shot 仇up into the sky.

Now, ere ゐlong, 梆being ヰ答most ヰfamished with ｐ仇hunger, ｐhe saw a tower юset on a ｐhigh ゐcliff, and 拆riding {thitherward} 火ヰdetermined to ask for 叼food. 仇But as ｐhe 金neared the castle ｐhe saw a 筐攫beauteous ヰdamsel in a ゐblue and 答ゐgold 答robe 梆seated ゐdisconsolate at a window. 吼Whereupon, ヰdismounting, ｐhe 佛ゐcalled ゐaloud to ｐher:

"ゐ别lady! If thou ｐhast sorrow of 拆thine 答own, 仇succour 仇one 佛ゐalso in юdistress, and give ヰme, a 路Christian 路拆Knight, now 佛ゐヰ答almost ヰfamished, 仇one ヰ梆ゐmeal's ヰ梆meat." To which she ゐ拆replied ゐquickly:

"sir 路拆Knight! ゐFly ゐquickly as thou {canst} , for ヰmy ゐ桂lord is a ヰ拆mighty ○拆giant, a ゐ答follower of {Mahomed} , ｐwho ｐhath 桂sworn to destroy 佛all 路Christians."

ｐ金Hearing this 路St. 路○桂George ゐlaughed ゐloud and ゐlong. "go юtell ｐhim юthen, fair 别dame," ｐhe 拆cried, "that a 路Christian 路拆Knight 别waits at ｐhis door, and will 拆either satisfy ｐhis wants within ｐhis castle or ゐslay the 答owner 吼thereof."

Now the ○拆giant no 叼sooner ｐ火heard this ゐ攫valiant ゐchallenge than ｐhe 仇rushed 桂forth to the ヰcombat, 葛ヰarmed with a {hugeous} 答crowbar of 拆拣iron. ｐHe was a ヰmonstrous ○拆giant, 桂ヰdeformed, with a ｐ筐huge ｐюhead, ゐbristled ゐ拆like юany 桂boar's, with ｐhot, ゐ吼glaring 拆eyes and a ヰmouth 梆ゐequalling a 拆拣tiger's. At 火first 拆sight of ｐhim 路St. 路○桂George 别gave ｐヰюゐhimself 仇up for ゐlost, not so ヰ仇much for fear, 仇but for ｐ仇hunger and 别faintness of body. Still, ヰюcommending ｐヰюゐhimself to the 路ヰ答Most 路ｐHigh, ｐhe 佛ゐalso 仇rushed to the ヰcombat with 仇such poor 葛ヰarms as ｐhe ｐhad, and with ヰюmany a юregret for the ゐloss of ｐhis ヰ○magic 桂sword {Ascalon} . So they 佛fought till 叼noon, юwhen, ○仇just as the ヰ攫champion's юstrength was nigh finished, the ○拆giant 仇ヰゐstumbled on the 叼root of a tree, and 路St. 路○桂George, 别taking ｐhis chance, ran ｐhim through the ヰmid-rib, so that ｐhe gasped and 拆died.

After which 路St. 路○桂George ю拣entered the tower; 吼whereat the 筐beautiful ゐ别lady, 梆freed from ｐher юterrible ゐ桂lord, юset before ｐhim 佛all ヰmanner of юゐdelicacies and pure 拆wine with which ｐhe 拆sufficed ｐhis ｐ仇hunger, юrested ｐhis 金weary body, and юrefreshed ｐhis ｐ桂horse.

So, ゐ梆leaving the tower in the ｐhands of the 别grateful ゐ别lady, ｐhe юwent on ｐhis way, 仇ヰcoming ere ゐlong to the 路Enchanted 路葛Garden of the ю答ヰnecromancer {Ormadine} , where, ヰюembedded in the ゐliving rock, ｐhe saw a ヰ○magic 桂sword, the ゐ拆like of which for 筐beauty ｐhe ｐhad юnever 梆seen, the юゐbelt 梆being юbeset with {jaspers} and 拆sapphire 答stones, 拆while the ヰpommel was a ゐ答globe of the 拣purest ゐsilver 别chased in 答ゐgold with 梆these 火verses:

ヰMy ヰ○magic will ヰ别remain ヰ答most 火ヰゐfirmly bound 路Till that a 拆knight from the far 桂north be found 路To pull this 桂sword from out its юbed of 答stone. ゐLo! юWhen ｐhe 仇ヰcomes 拆wise {Ormadine} ヰ仇must 佛fall. 吼юFarewell, ヰmy ヰ○magic power, ヰmy юspell, ヰmy 佛all.

梆Seeing this 路St. 路○桂George put ｐhis ｐhand to the ｐゐhilt, thinking to юessay ゐpulling it out by юstrength; 仇but ゐlo! ｐHe drew it out with as ヰ仇much 梆ease as though it ｐhad ｐ仇hung by a юthread of 仇untwisted ゐsilk. And ヰ梆攫ゐimmediately юevery door in the enchanted 葛garden ゐflew 答open, and the ヰ○magician {Ormadine} 金appeared, ｐhis ｐhair standing on юend; and ｐhe, after kissing the ｐhand of the ヰ攫champion, ゐюled ｐhim to a 别cave where a 仇young ヰman wrapped in a 梆sheet of 答ゐgold ゐlay ゐ梆sleeping, ゐ仇ゐlulled by the songs of four 筐beautiful ヰ别maidens.

"the 路拆Knight ｐ叼whom thou {seest} ｐhere!" юSaid the ю答ヰnecromancer in a ｐゐhollow 娥voice, "is 仇none 仇other than thy 仇brother-in-葛ヰarms, the 路Christian 路ヰ攫Champion 路St. 路别David of 路别ゐWales. ｐHe 佛ゐalso юヰattempted to draw ヰmy 桂sword 仇but 别ゐfailed. ｐHim ｐhast thou ゐ拣delivered from ヰmy ヰenchantments since they 仇come to an юend."

Now, as ｐhe 答spoke, 别came 仇such a ゐrattling of the 拆skies, 仇such a ゐ仇ヰ拣lumbering of the 火earth as юnever was, and in the ゐtwinkling of an eye the 路Enchanted 路葛Garden and 佛all in it vanished from view, ゐ梆leaving the 路ヰ攫Champion of 路别ゐWales, roused from ｐhis юseven 金years' ゐ梆sleep, giving thanks to 路St. 路○桂George, ｐwho 梆greeted ｐhis 别ancient ヰ别comrade ｐ葛ゐheartily.

After this 路St. 路○桂George of 路ヰюMerrie 路ゐEngland ゐtravelled far and ゐtravelled fast, with ヰюmany ю拣adventures by the way, to 路梆○Egypt where ｐhe ｐhad ゐюleft ｐhis ゐ仇beloved 路юPrincess 路S芒bia. 仇But, ゐ火learning to ｐhis 别great 梆grief and ｐhorror from the 别same ｐ火ヰhermit ｐhe ｐhad ヰюmet on 火first ゐlanding, that, 拆despite ｐher 拆ゐdenials, ｐher father, 路King {Ptolemy} , ｐhad юconsented to {Almidor} the ゐblack 路King of 路ヰ拣Morocco carrying ｐher off as 仇one of ｐhis ヰюmany 拆wives, ｐhe 火turned ｐhis юsteps 桂towards {Tripoli} , the capital of 路ヰ拣Morocco; for ｐhe was 火ヰdetermined at 佛all costs to 别gain a 拆sight of the dear 路юPrincess from ｐ叼whom ｐhe ｐhad 梆been so 叼ゐcruelly юrent.

To this юend ｐhe 答borrowed an 答ゐold ゐ答cloak of the ｐ火ヰhermit, and, 拆disguised as a юbeggar, 别gained ヰadmittance to the 别gate of the 路ヰWomen 路ゐPalace, where were 拣gathered юtogether on their 梆knees ヰюmany 仇拣others, poor, 别frail, 火infirm.

And юwhen ｐhe asked юthem 吼wherefore they юゐknelt, they 拣answered:

"because good 路梆Queen 路S芒bia {succours} 仇us that we ヰmay pray for the 别safety of 路St. 路○桂George of 路ゐEngland, to ｐ叼whom she 别gave ｐher ｐ葛heart."

Now юwhen 路St. 路○桂George ｐ火heard this ｐhis 答own ｐ葛heart was ゐ拆like to 别break for юvery ○joy, and ｐhe could 吼scarce 梆keep on ｐhis 梆knees юwhen, ゐ仇ゐlovely as юever, 仇but with ｐher 别face 别pale and sad and wan from ゐlong юdistress, the 路юPrincess 路S芒bia 金appeared ゐ答clothed in 梆deep ヰ桂mourning.

In 拆ゐsilence she ｐhanded an ヰalms to 梆each юbeggar in 火turn; 仇but юwhen she 别came to 路St. 路○桂George she 葛started and ゐ别laid ｐher ｐhand on ｐher ｐ葛heart. юThen she юsaid ゐsoftly:

"拆rise 仇up, 路Sir 路юBeggar! Thou 葛art too ゐ拆like 仇one ｐwho ю筐rescued ヰme from юdeath, for it to be ヰ梆meet for thee to 梆kneel before ヰme!"

юThen 路St. 路○桂George 拆rising, and 答bowing ゐlow, юsaid 拆ゐquietly: "金ゐpeerless ゐ别lady! ゐLo! I 别юam that юvery 拆knight to ｐ叼whom thou {did'st} юcondescend to give this."

And with this ｐhe ゐslipped the 拆ヰdiamond ring she ｐhad given ｐhim on ｐher finger. 仇But she ゐlooked not at it, 仇but at ｐhim, with ゐ仇love in ｐher 拆eyes.

юThen ｐhe 答ゐtold ｐher of ｐher 拣father's 别base ю拣treachery and {Almidor's} 葛part in it, so that ｐher anger grew ｐhot and she 拆cried:

"别waste no ヰmore 拆time in 佛talk. I ヰ别remain no ゐlonger in this юdetested ゐ别place. Ere {Almidor} 火returns from ｐ仇hunting we shall ｐhave 别escaped."

ｐHand on ｐher ｐ葛heart]

So she ゐюled 路St. 路○桂George to the 葛ヰ拣armoury, where ｐhe found ｐhis 仇trusty 桂sword {Ascalon} , and to the 别stable, where ｐhis swift 梆steed {Bayard} stood юready caparisoned.

юThen, юwhen ｐher 别brave 路拆Knight ｐhad ヰmounted, and she, 仇putting ｐher foot on ｐhis, ｐhad ゐюleapt ゐ拆like a 火bird ｐ拆behind ｐhim, 路St. 路○桂George 仇touched the proud 梆beast ゐ拆ゐlightly with ｐhis 火spurs, and, ゐ拆like an arrow from a bow, {Bayard} carried юthem юtogether 答over city and ゐ别plain, through woods and forests, across 拣rivers, and ヰmountains, and ゐvalleys, until they 梆reached the 路ゐLand of 路梆Greece.

And ｐhere they found the ｐ答whole 仇country in юfestivity 答over the ヰmarriage of the 路King. Now ヰ仇amongst 仇other ю拣别ヰentertainments was a grand 桂ヰtournament, the 筐news of which ｐhad юspread through the 火ゐworld. And to it ｐhad 仇come 佛all the 仇other 路Six 路ヰ攫Champions of 路仇Christendom; so 路St. 路○桂George 拣拆arriving ヰ别made the 路юSeventh. And ヰюmany of the ヰ攫champions ｐhad with юthem the fair ゐ别lady they ｐhad ю筐rescued. St. {Denys} of 路France 佛brought 筐beautiful 路юゐ拆Eglantine, 路St. 路○别ヰJames of 路别Spain 梆sweet {Celestine} , 拆while 答noble 路ゐRosalind 仇ヰaccompanied 路St. 路Anthony of 路ゐItaly. St. 路别David of 路别ゐWales, after ｐhis юseven 金years' ゐ梆sleep, 别came full of 梆eager 拆desire for юadventure. St. 路Patrick of 路拆拣ゐIreland, юever 火攫courteous, 佛brought 佛all the six 路Swan-юprincesses ｐwho, in 筐gratitude, ｐhad 梆been 梆seeking their ゐ拣deliverer 路St. 路Andrew of 路ゐScotland; since ｐhe, ゐ梆leaving 佛all 火ゐゐworldly things, ｐhad 答chosen to 拆fight for the 别faith.

So 佛all 梆these 别brave 拆knights and fair ゐ别ladies ○娥joined in the ○娥joyful ○jousting, and 梆each of the 路юSeven 路ヰ攫Champions was in 火turn 路梆Chief 路ゐ○Challenger for a day.

Now in the ヰmidst of 佛all the ヰюヰmerriment 金appeared a ｐ仇hundred ｐюゐheralds from a ｐ仇hundred 拣different 葛parts of the {Paynim} 火ゐworld, ゐ吼declaring war to the юdeath юagainst 佛all 路Christians.

吼Whereupon the 路юSeven 路ヰ攫Champions 梆agreed that 梆each should 火return to ｐhis 别native ゐland to ゐ别place ｐhis 金dearest ゐ别lady in 别safety, and gather юtogether an 葛ヰarmy, and that six ヰ仇months ゐ别later they should ヰ梆meet, and, ○娥joining as 仇one ゐ梆○legion, go 桂forth to 拆fight for 路仇Christendom.

And this was 仇done. So, ｐhaving 答chosen 路St. 路○桂George as 路梆Chief 路○ю拣General, they ヰ葛marched on {Tripoli} with the cry:

"for 路仇Christendom we 拆fight, 路For 路仇Christendom we die."

ｐHere the wicked {Almidor} юfell in single ヰcombat with 路St. 路○桂George, to the 别great ゐ拆delight of ｐhis 仇○юsubjects, ｐwho юbegged the 路ヰ攫Champion to be 路King in ｐhis юstead. To this ｐhe юconsented, and, after ｐhe was crowned, the 路Christian ｐ答host юwent on 桂towards 路梆○Egypt where 路King {Ptolemy} , in despair of vanquishing 仇such 佛ゐ拣stalwart 拆knights, threw ｐヰюゐhimself down from the ゐヰbattlements of the ゐpalace and was ゐkilled. 吼Whereupon, in юrecognition of the ゐchivalry and 火courtesy of the 路Christian 路ヰ攫Champions, the 答ゐnobles 拣offered the 路Crown to 仇one of their 仇ヰnumber, and they with ゐ别acclaim 答chose 路St. 路○桂George of 路ヰюMerrie 路ゐEngland.

юThence the 路Christian ｐ答host ○火journeyed to 路火Persia, where a 金fearsome battle 别○raged for юseven 别days, 拣during which two ｐ仇hundred thousand 别pagans were ゐ别slain, 拆beside ヰюmany ｐwho were drowned in юヰattempting to 别escape. 仇Thus they were ヰюゐcompelled to 梆ゐyield, the 路юヰ拣Emperor ｐヰюゐhimself ｐhappening into the ｐhands of 路St. 路○桂George, and six 仇other 拆娥viceroys into the ｐhands of the six 仇other 路ヰ攫Champions.

And 梆these were ヰ答most ヰ火ゐmercifully and 拣ゐhonourably 梆entreated after they ｐhad ヰpromised to 仇拣govern 路火Persia after 路Christian 叼ゐrules. Now the 路юヰ拣Emperor, ｐhaving a ｐ葛heart 佛fraught with 拆despite and tyranny, 拆拣conspired юagainst юthem, and 别○engaged a wicked 拣wizard 别ヰnamed {Osmond} to so 拆beguile six of the 路ヰ攫Champions that they 别gave 仇up 拆fighting, and ゐlived an 梆easy ゐ答slothful ゐ拆life. 仇But 路St. 路○桂George would not be 拆ゐbeguiled; 拆neither would ｐhe юconsent to the ヰenchantment of ｐhis 仇拣brothers; and ｐhe so roused юthem that they юnever 梆sheathed their 桂swords nor 仇ゐunlocked their 葛ヰarmour till the wicked 路юヰ拣Emperor and ｐhis 拆娥viceroys were 答thrown into that юvery 仇○dungeon in which 路St. 路○桂George ｐhad ゐlanguished for юseven ゐlong 金years.

吼Whereupon 路St. 路○桂George took upon ｐヰюゐhimself the 仇拣ヰgovernment of 路火Persia, and 别gave the six 仇other 路ヰ攫Champions the six {viceroyalties} .

So, 拆拣attired in a 筐beautiful 梆green 答robe, ゐrichly ヰ娥拣embroidered, 答over which was ゐ仇flung a 葛ゐscarlet ヰmantle 桂拣bordered with 拆white fur and ю拣别decorated with 桂ヰornaments of pure 答ゐgold, ｐhe took ｐhis 梆seat on the 答throne which was 桂supported by юゐelephants of ゐ叼translucent ゐalabaster. And the 路ｐюゐHeralds at 葛ヰarms, ヰamid the shouting of the 梆people, 拆cried:

"ゐlong ゐ拆live 路St. 路○桂George of 路ヰюMerrie 路ゐEngland, 路юヰ拣Emperor of 路ヰ拣Morocco, 路King of 路梆○Egypt, and 路仇ゐSultan of 路火Persia!"

Now, after that ｐhe ｐhad ゐestablished good and ○仇just ゐ佛laws to 仇such юeffect that 筐ヰ拣innumerable 仇ヰcompanies of 别pagans ゐflocked to 仇become 路Christians, 路St. 路○桂George, ゐ梆leaving the 路仇拣ヰGovernment in the ｐhands of ｐhis 仇trusted ゐ拣counsellors, took 叼truce with the 火ゐworld and 火returned to 路ゐEngland, where, at 路仇Coventry, ｐhe ゐlived for ヰюmany 金years with the {Egyptian} 路юPrincess 路S芒bia, ｐwho bore ｐhim three 佛ゐ拣stalwart 仇sons. So ｐhere {endeth} the 别tale of 路St. 路○桂George of 路ヰюMerrie 路ゐEngland, 火first and 别greatest of the 路юSeven 路ヰ攫Champions.

The 路桂Story 路Of 路The 路Three 路吼Bears

仇Once upon a 拆time there were three 路吼Bears, ｐwho ゐlived юtogether in a ｐhouse of their 答own, in a wood. 仇One of юthem was a 路ゐLittle 路Wee 路Bear, and 仇one was a 路ヰMiddle-拆sized 路Bear, and the 仇other was a 路别Great 路Big 路Bear. They ｐhad 梆each a 答bowl for their porridge; a ゐlittle 答bowl for the 路ゐLittle 路Wee 路Bear; and a ヰmiddle-拆sized 答bowl for the 路ヰMiddle-拆sized 路Bear; and a 别great 答bowl for the 路别Great 路Big 路Bear. And they ｐhad 梆each a chair to sit in; a ゐlittle chair for the 路ゐLittle 路Wee 路Bear; and a ヰmiddle-拆sized chair for the 路ヰMiddle-拆sized 路Bear; and a 别great chair for the 路别Great 路Big 路Bear. And they ｐhad 梆each a юbed to ゐ梆sleep in; a ゐlittle юbed for the 路ゐLittle 路Wee 路Bear; and a ヰmiddle-拆sized юbed for the 路ヰMiddle-拆sized 路Bear; and a 别great юbed for the 路别Great 路Big 路Bear.

仇One day, after they ｐhad ヰ别made the porridge for their юbreakfast, and 桂poured it into their porridge-答ゐbowls, they 佛walked out into the wood 拆while the porridge was 叼ゐcooling, that they ヰ拆might not 火burn their ヰmouths by beginning too 叼soon, for they were ゐ拆polite, юwell-佛brought-仇up 路吼Bears. And 拆while they were away a ゐlittle 火girl 佛ゐcalled 路答ゐゐGoldilocks, ｐwho ゐlived at the 仇other 拆side of the wood and ｐhad 梆been юsent on an юerrand by ｐher ヰ仇mother, passed by the ｐhouse, and ゐlooked in at the window. And юthen she 梆peeped in at the 梆ｐ答keyhole, for she was not at 佛all a юwell-佛brought-仇up ゐlittle 火girl. юThen 梆seeing 答nobody in the ｐhouse she ゐlifted the ゐlatch. So 路答ゐゐGoldilocks 答opened the door and юwent in; and юwell ゐ梆pleased was she юwhen she saw the porridge on the 别table. 火First she 别tasted the porridge of the 路别Great 路Big 路Bear, and that was too ｐhot for ｐher. юNext she 别tasted the porridge of the 路ヰMiddle-拆sized 路Bear, 仇but that was too 答ゐcold for ｐher. юThen 路答ゐゐGoldilocks, ｐwho was 拆拣tired, for she ｐhad 梆been catching 仇拣ゐ拆butterflies юinstead of 仇running on ｐher юerrand, 别sate down in the chair of the 路别Great 路Big 路Bear, 仇but that was too ｐ葛hard for ｐher. 路Tom-路Tit-路Tot

仇Once upon a 拆time there was a ヰwoman and she 别baked 拆five 拆pies. 仇But юwhen they 别came out of the 仇oven they were 答over-别baked, and the 仇crust was far too ｐ葛hard to 梆eat. So she юsaid to ｐher 佛daughter:

"佛daughter," юsays she, "put юthem 拆pies on to the юゐshelf and ゐ梆leave'emthere 拆awhile. 拣ゐSurely 别they'll 仇come юagain in 拆time."

By that, you know, she ヰюmeant that they would 仇become softer; 仇but ｐher 佛daughter юsaid to ｐ火юゐherself, "路If 路ヰ仇Mother юsays the 拆pies will 仇come юagain, why shouldn't I 梆eat 梆these now?" So, ｐhaving good, 仇young 梆teeth, she юset to 火work and 别ate the ゐlot, 火first and ゐlast.

Now юwhen 仇supper-拆time 别came the ヰwoman юsaid to ｐher 佛daughter, "路Go you and юget 仇one of the 拆pies. They are sure to ｐhave 仇come юagain by now."

юThen the 火girl юwent and ゐlooked, 仇but of 桂course there was 仇nothing 仇but the юヰempty dishes.

So back she 别came and юsaid, "路No, 路ヰ仇Mother, they 别ain't 仇come юagain."

"not 仇one 答o's юthem?" Asked the ヰ仇mother, 别taken aback ゐ拆like.

"not 仇one 答o's юthem," юsays the 佛daughter, 拆quite confident.

"юwell," юsays the ヰ仇mother, "仇come юagain, or not 仇come юagain, I will ｐhave 仇one of юthem 拆pies for ヰmy 仇supper."

"仇but you can't," юsays the 佛daughter. "ｐhow can you if they 别ain't 仇come? And they 别ain't, as 拣sure's sure."

"仇but I can," юsays the ヰ仇mother, юgetting angry. "go you at 仇once, 拆ゐchild, and bring ヰme the юbest on юthem. ヰMy 梆teeth ヰ仇must ○仇just tackle it."

"юbest or 火worst is 佛all 仇one," 拣answered the 佛daughter, 拆quite 仇ゐsulky, "for 拆I've 别ate the ゐlot, so you can't ｐhave 仇one till it 仇ヰcomes юagain--so there!"

юWell, the ヰ仇mother she bounced 仇up to see; 仇but ｐhalf an eye 答ゐtold ｐher there was 仇nothing 别save the юヰempty dishes; so she was dished 仇up ｐ火юゐherself and 仇done for.

So, ｐhaving no 仇supper, she 别sate ｐher down on the 桂юdoorstep, and, bringing out ｐher distaff, began to spin. And as she span she sang:

"ヰmy 佛daughter ｐha's 别ate 拆five 拆pies to-day, 路ヰMy 佛daughter ｐha's 别ate 拆five 拆pies to-day, 路ヰMy 佛daughter ｐha's 别ate 拆five 拆pies to-day,"

For, see you, she was 拆quite ゐ拣flabbergasted and fair astonished.

Now the 路King of that 仇country ｐhappened to be 仇ヰcoming down the 梆street, and ｐhe ｐ火heard the song 答going on and on, 仇but could not 拆quite ヰ别make out the 火words. So ｐhe stopped ｐhis ｐ桂horse, and asked:

"what is that you are singing, ヰmy good ヰwoman?"

Now the ヰ仇mother, though ｐ拆horrified at ｐher 佛拣daughter's 拆appetite, did not want 仇other 答folk, ゐ梆拆leastwise the 路King, to know about it, so she sang юinstead:

"ヰmy 佛daughter ｐha's 仇spun 拆five 别skeins to-day, 路ヰMy 佛daughter ｐha's 仇spun 拆five 别skeins to-day, 路ヰMy 佛daughter ｐha's 仇spun 拆five 别skeins to-day."

"拆five 别skeins!" 拆Cried the 路King. So the ヰ仇mother 梆agreed. She 佛thought what a grand ヰmarriage it was for ｐher 佛daughter. And as for the 拆five 别skeins? 拆Time 仇enough to bother about юthem юwhen the year 别came round. юｐAnyhow, ｐher 佛daughter would be 路梆Queen for ゐюeleven ヰ仇months. So they were ヰmarried, and for ゐюeleven ヰ仇months the 拆bride was ｐhappy as ｐhappy could be. 仇But on the юvery ゐlast day of the ゐюeleventh ヰ仇month, the 路King, ｐher ｐ仇husband, ゐюled ｐher into a 叼room she ｐhad юnever юset 拆eyes on before. It ｐhad 仇one window, and there was 仇nothing in it 仇but a 叼stool and a spinning-梆wheel.

"now, ヰmy dear," ｐhe юsaid 拆quite 拆kind ゐ拆like, "you will be 仇shut in ｐhere to-ヰmorrow ヰ桂morning with 仇some ゐvictuals and 仇some ゐflax, and if by 梆evening you ｐhave not 仇spun 拆five 别skeins, your ｐюhead will 仇come off."

юWell she was fair 拆frightened, for she ｐhad 佛ゐ别always 梆been 仇such a {gatless} 佛ゐthoughtless 火girl that she ｐhad юnever ゐ火learnt to spin at 佛all. So she ○仇just ゐlocked the door of ｐher 叼room, 拣sat down on a 叼stool, and 拆cried and 拆cried and 拆cried until ｐher pretty 拆eyes were 佛all юred.

Now as she 别sate sobbing and 拆crying she ｐ火heard a queer ゐlittle 娥noise at the bottom of the door. At 火first she 佛thought it was a ヰmouse. юThen she 佛thought it ヰ仇must be 仇ヰsomething knocking.

So she 仇upped and 答opened the door and what did she see? Why! A ヰ佛small, ゐlittle, ゐblack 路Thing with a ゐlong 别tail that whisked round and round юever so fast.

"what are you 拆crying for?" юSaid that 路Thing, ヰ别making a bow, and 火ゐtwirling its 别tail so fast that she could 吼ゐscarcely see it.

"what's that to you?" юSaid she, shrinking a bit, for that 路Thing was юvery queer ゐ拆like.

"答don't ゐlook at ヰmy 别tail if 筐you're 拆frightened," юsays 路That, ヰ火smirking. "ゐlook at ヰmy 答toes. 别Ain't they 筐beautiful?"

And sure 仇enough 路That ｐhad on 仇ゐbuckled 叼shoes with ｐhigh ｐ梆ゐheels and big 答bows, юever so ヰ葛smart.

So she 拆kind of 拣forgot about the 别tail, and wasn't so 拆frightened, and юwhen 路That asked ｐher юagain why she was 拆crying, she 仇upped and юsaid, "路It 答won't do no good if I do."

"you 答don't know that," юsays 路That, 火ゐtwirling its 别tail faster and faster, and sticking out its 答toes. "仇come, юtell ヰme, 吼there's a good 火girl."

"юwell," юsays she, "it can't do юany ｐ葛harm if it 仇doesn't do good." So she 拆dried ｐher pretty 拆eyes and 答ゐtold 路That 佛all about the 拆pies, and the 别skeins, and юeverything from 火first to ゐlast.

And юthen that ゐlittle, ゐblack 路Thing 金ゐnearly 火burst with ゐlaughing. "if that is 佛all, it's 梆easy ヰюmended!" It юsays. "拆I'll 仇come to your window юevery ヰ桂morning, 别take the ゐflax, and bring it back 仇spun into 拆five 别skeins at 拆night. 仇Come! Shall it be a 葛bargain?"

Now she, for 佛all she was so {gatless} and 佛ゐthoughtless, юsaid, 佛cautious ゐ拆like:

"仇but what is your pay?"

юThen 路That 火ゐtwirled its 别tail so fast you couldn't see it, and 仇stuck out its 筐beautiful 答toes, and ヰ火smirked and ゐlooked out of the 桂拣corners of its 拆eyes. "I will give you three юguesses юevery 拆night to юguess ヰmy 别name, and if you ｐhaven't юguessed it before the ヰ仇month is 仇up, why"--and 路That 火ゐtwirled its 别tail faster and 仇stuck out its 答toes 火further, and ヰ火smirked and 拣sniggered ヰmore than юever--"you shall be ヰ拆mine, ヰmy 筐beauty."

Three юguesses юevery 拆night for a ｐ答whole ヰ仇month! She юゐfelt sure she would be 别able for so ヰ仇much; and there was no 仇other way out of the business, so she ○仇just юsaid, "路юYes! I agree!"

And ゐlor! ｐHow 路That 火ゐtwirled its 别tail, and 答bowed, and ヰ火smirked, and 仇stuck out its 筐beautiful 答toes.

юWell, the юvery юnext day ｐher ｐ仇husband ゐюled ｐher to the 别strange 叼room юagain, and there was the 别day's 叼food, and a spinning-梆wheel and a 别great 仇bundle of ゐflax.

"there you are, ヰmy dear," юsays ｐhe as ゐ拆polite as ゐ拆polite. "and ヰюヰremember! If there are not 拆five ｐ答whole 别skeins to-拆night, I fear your ｐюhead will 仇come off!"

At that she began to юヰtremble, and after ｐhe ｐhad gone away and ゐlocked the door, she was ○仇just thinking of a good cry, юwhen she ｐ火heard a queer knocking at the window. She 仇upped at 仇once and 答opened it, and sure 仇enough there was the ヰ佛small, ゐlittle, ゐblack 路Thing sitting on the window-ゐюledge, ゐdangling its 筐beautiful 答toes and 火ゐtwirling its 别tail so that you could 吼ゐscarcely see it.

"good-ヰ桂morning, ヰmy 筐beauty," юsays 路That. "仇come! ｐHand 答over the ゐflax, 葛sharp, 吼there's a good 火girl."

So she 别gave 路That the ゐflax and 仇shut the window and, you ヰmay be sure, 别ate ｐher ゐvictuals, for, as you know, she ｐhad a good 拆appetite, and the 路King, ｐher ｐ仇husband, ｐhad ヰpromised to give ｐher юeverything she ゐ拆liked to 梆eat. ヰMore]

The 答ゐgolden 仇snuff-box

仇Once upon a 拆time, and a юvery good 拆time too, though it was not in ヰmy 拆time, nor your 拆time, nor for the ヰmatter of that in юany 仇one's 拆time, there ゐlived a ヰman and a ヰwoman ｐwho ｐhad 仇one 仇son 佛ゐcalled 路○Jack, and ｐhe was ○仇just юゐterribly fond of 梆reading books. ｐHe 梆read, and ｐhe 梆read, and юthen, because ｐhis 吼parents ゐlived in a ゐ答ゐlonely ｐhouse in a ゐ答ゐlonely forest and ｐhe юnever saw юany 仇other 答folk 仇but ｐhis father and ｐhis ヰ仇mother, ｐhe 别became 拆quite 别crazy to go out into the 火ゐworld and see 葛ヰcharming юprincesses and the ゐ拆like.

So 仇one day ｐhe 答ゐtold ｐhis ヰ仇mother ｐhe ヰ仇must be off, and she 佛ゐcalled ｐhim an air-别brained addle-别pate, 仇but added that, as ｐhe was no 筐use at ｐ答home, ｐhe ｐhad юbetter go 梆seek ｐhis 桂叼fortune. юThen she asked ｐhim if ｐhe would rather 别take a ヰ佛small 别cake with ｐher ゐюblessing to 梆eat on ｐhis ○火journey, or a ゐ葛large 别cake with ｐher 火curse? "a big 别cake, if you ゐ梆please, 'm."

So ｐhis ヰ仇mother ヰ别made a 别great big 别cake, and юwhen ｐhe 葛started she ○仇just off to the top of the ｐhouse and cast {malisons} on ｐhim, till ｐhe got out of 拆sight. You see she ｐhad to do it, 仇but after that she 别sate down and 拆cried.

юWell, 路○Jack ｐhadn't gone far till ｐhe 别came to a 梆ゐfield where ｐhis father was ゐploughing. 仇But at ゐlast ｐhe 别came to a ゐ葛large ｐhouse and юbegged 桂board and ゐ○lodging at the back door. юThen ｐhe юsaid to 路○Jack, "路ヰMy 佛daughter ヰ仇must ｐhave a 拆fine ｐhouse to ゐ拆live in. 吼Therefore by to-ヰmorrow ヰ桂morning at 别eight ゐo'clock there ヰ仇must be a ヰmagnificent castle standing on юゐtwelve 答ゐgolden ゐ拣pillars in the ヰmiddle of the ゐ别lake, and there ヰ仇must be a 火church 拆beside it. And 佛all things ヰ仇must be юready for the 拆bride, and at 别eight ゐo'clock 拆ゐprecisely a 梆peal of юゐbells from the 火church ヰ仇must ring out for the юwedding. If not you will ｐhave to 桂forfeit your ゐ拆life."

This 拆time 路○Jack юintended to give the three ゐlittle юred ヰюmen ヰmore 拆time for their task; 仇but what with ｐhaving ○娥enjoyed ｐヰюゐhimself so ヰ仇much 佛all day, and ｐhaving 梆eaten so ヰ仇much good 叼food, ｐhe 答拣ゐюoverslept ｐヰюゐhimself, so that the big ゐclock on the tower was 火whirring before it 仇struck 别eight юwhen ｐhe 答woke, ゐюleapt out of юbed, and 仇rushed to the 答ゐgolden 仇snuff-box. 仇But ｐhe ｐhad 拣forgotten where ｐhe ｐhad put it, and so the ゐclock ｐhad 攫ゐreally_ 仇begun to 拆strike before ｐhe found it 仇under ｐhis ゐpillow, 答opened it, and {gabbled} out ｐhis 桂拣orders. And юthen you юnever saw ｐhow the three ゐlittle юred ヰюmen 仇ヰゐtumbled 答over 梆each 仇other and 佛yawned and юstretched and ヰ别made ｐ别haste 佛all at 仇one 拆time, so that 路○Jack 佛thought ｐhis ゐ拆life would 拣ゐsurely be 桂forfeit. 仇But ○仇just as the ゐclock 仇struck its ゐlast 拆chime, out rang a 梆peal of ヰюmerry юゐbells, and there was the 路Castle standing on юゐtwelve 答ゐgolden ゐ拣pillars and a 火church 拆beside it in the ヰmiddle of the ゐ别lake. And the 路Castle was 佛all ю拣别decorated for the юwedding, and there were crowds and crowds of 火servants and 别拣retainers, 佛all юdressed in their {Sunday} юbest.

юNever ｐhad 路○Jack 梆seen 仇such a 拆sight before; 拆neither ｐhad the gay 仇young 佛daughter ｐwho, of 桂course, was ゐlooking out of the юnext window in ｐher 拆nightcap. And she ゐlooked so pretty and so gay that 路○Jack юゐfelt 拆quite cross юwhen ｐhe ｐhad to юstep back to ゐюlet the three ゐlittle юred ヰюmen ゐfly to their 答ゐgolden 仇snuff-box. 仇But they were far {crosser} than ｐhe was, and ヰ仇ヰゐmumbled and 仇ヰゐgrumbled at the ｐ仇hustle, so that 路○Jack was 拆quite ゐglad юwhen they 仇shut the box down and began to snore.

юWell, of 桂course, 路○Jack and the gay 仇young 佛daughter were ヰmarried, and were as ｐhappy as the day is ゐlong; and 路○Jack ｐhad 拆fine ゐ答clothes to wear, 拆fine 叼food to 梆eat, 拆fine 火servants to 别wait on ｐhim, and as ヰюmany 拆fine юfriends as ｐhe ゐ拆liked.

So ｐhe was in ゐ仇luck; 仇but ｐhe ｐhad юyet to ゐ火learn that a ヰ仇拣mother's {malison} is sure to bring ヰ桂叼misfortune 仇some 拆time or 仇another.

仇Thus it ｐhappened that 仇one day юwhen ｐhe was 答going a-ｐ仇hunting with 佛all the ゐ别ladies and ○юゐヰюgentlemen, 路○Jack 拣forgot to 别change the 答ゐgolden 仇snuff-box which ｐhe 佛ゐ别always carried about with ｐhim for fear of accidents) from ｐhis 别答waistcoat pocket to that of ｐhis 葛ゐscarlet ｐ仇hunting-答coat; so ｐhe ゐюleft it ｐ拆behind ｐhim. And what should ｐhappen 仇but that the 火servant ゐюlet it 佛fall on the ground юwhen ｐhe was 答ゐfolding 仇up the ゐ答clothes, and the 仇snuff-box ゐflew 答open and out popped the three ゐlittle юred ヰюmen 佛yawning and юstretching.

юWell! юWhen they found out that they ｐhadn't 攫ゐreally 梆been 仇ヰsummoned, and that there was no fear of юdeath, they were in a 拣towering юヰtemper and юsaid they ｐhad a 别great ヰ拆mind to ゐfly away with the 路Castle, 答ゐgolden ゐ拣pillars and 佛all.

On ｐ金hearing this the 火servant pricked 仇up ｐhis 金ears.

"could you do that?" ｐHe asked.

"could we?" They юsaid, and they ゐlaughed ゐloud. "why, we can do юanything."

юThen the 火servant юsaid юever so 葛sharp, "路юThen ヰ叼move ヰme this 路Castle and 佛all it 别contains 拆right away 答over the sea where the ヰmaster can't 火disturb 仇us."

Now the ゐlittle юred ヰюmen 梆need not 攫ゐreally ｐhave 别obeyed the 桂order, 仇but they were so cross with 路○Jack that ｐ葛ゐhardly ｐhad the 火servant юsaid the 火words before the task was 仇done; so юwhen the ｐ仇hunting-葛party 别came back, ゐlo and ｐ答ゐbehold! The 路Castle, and the 火church, and the 答ゐgolden ゐ拣pillars ｐhad 佛all 金disappeared!

At 火first 佛all the юrest юset upon 路○Jack for 梆being a 别knave and a 梆cheat; and, in 拣ゐparticular, ｐhis 拆wife's father юthreatened to ｐhave at ｐhim for 梆deceiving the gay 仇young 佛daughter; 仇but at ゐlast ｐhe 梆agreed to ゐюlet 路○Jack ｐhave юゐtwelve ヰ仇months and a day to 拆find the 路Castle and bring it back.

So off 路○Jack 葛starts on a good ｐ桂horse with 仇some ヰ仇money in ｐhis pocket.

And ｐhe ゐtravelled far and ｐhe ゐtravelled fast, and ｐhe ゐtravelled 梆east and юwest, 桂north and south, 答over ｐゐhills, and 别ゐdales, and ゐvalleys, and ヰmountains, and woods, and {sheepwalks} , 仇but юnever a 拆sign of the ヰmissing castle did ｐhe see. Now at ゐlast ｐhe 别came to the ゐpalace of the 路King of 佛all the 路ヰ拆Mice in the 路拆Wide 路火ゐWorld. And there was a ゐlittle {mousie} in a 拆fine ｐ佛火hauberk and a 梆steel cap 叼doing юsentry at the 仇front 别gate, and ｐhe was not for ゐюletting 路○Jack in until ｐhe ｐhad 答ゐtold ｐhis юerrand. And юwhen 路○Jack ｐhad 答ゐtold it, ｐhe passed ｐhim on to the юnext ヰmouse юsentry at the inner 别gate; so by 梆degrees ｐhe 梆reached the 路King 别ヰchamber, where ｐhe 别sate 拣surrounded by ヰ拆mice 桂金courtiers.

Now the 路King of the 路ヰ拆Mice 梆received 路○Jack юvery 别ゐgraciously, and юsaid that ｐhe ｐヰюゐhimself knew 仇nothing of the ヰmissing 路Castle, 仇but, as ｐhe was 路King of 佛all the 路ヰ拆Mice in the ｐ答whole 火ゐworld, it was possible that 仇some of ｐhis 仇○юsubjects ヰ拆might know ヰmore than ｐhe. So ｐhe 桂拣ordered ｐhis 别ヰ拣ゐchamberlain to ヰcommand a 路Grand 路юヰゐAssembly for the юnext ヰ桂morning, and in the ヰ梆拆meantime ｐhe ю拣别entertained 路○Jack 拆right 娥ゐroyally.

仇But the юnext ヰ桂morning, though there were brown ヰ拆mice, and ゐblack ヰ拆mice, and grey ヰ拆mice, and 拆white ヰ拆mice, and 拆佛ゐpiebald ヰ拆mice, from 佛all 葛parts of the 火ゐworld, they 佛all 拣answered with 仇one юbreath:

"if it ゐ梆please your 路ヰ○Majesty, we ｐhave not 梆seen the ヰmissing 路Castle."

юThen the 路King юsaid, "路You ヰ仇must go and ask ヰmy юゐelder 仇brother the 路King of 佛all the 路Frogs. ｐHe ヰmay be 别able to юtell you. ゐ梆Leave your ｐ桂horse ｐhere and 别take 仇one of ヰ拆mine. It 答knows the way and will carry you 别safe."

So 路○Jack юset off on the 路King ｐ桂horse, and as ｐhe passed the outer 别gate ｐhe saw the ゐlittle ヰmouse юsentry 仇ヰcoming away, for its 葛guard was 仇up. Now 路○Jack was a 拆kind-ｐ葛hearted ゐlad, and ｐhe ｐhad 别saved 仇some 仇ヰcrumbs from ｐhis dinner in 桂order to юヰюrecompense the ゐlittle юsentry for ｐhis 拆kindness. "ｐhere you are, {mousekin} ," ｐhe юsaid. "that's for your 仇trouble!"

юThen the ヰmouse thanked ｐhim 拆ゐkindly and asked if ｐhe would 别take ｐhim ゐalong to the 路King of the 路Frogs.

"not I," юsays 路○Jack. "I should юget into 仇trouble with your 路King."

仇But the {mousekin} insisted. "I ヰmay be of 仇some 筐use to you," it юsaid. So it ran 仇up the ｐ桂horse's ｐ拆hind ゐюleg and 仇up by its 别tail and ｐhid in 路○Jack's pocket. And the ｐ桂horse юset off at a ｐ葛hard ゐgallop, for it didn't ｐhalf ゐ拆like the ヰmouse 仇running 答over it.

So at ゐlast 路○Jack 别came to the ゐpalace of the 路King of 佛all the 路Frogs, and there at the 仇front 别gate was a frog 叼doing юsentry in a 拆fine 答coat of ヰ别mail and a brass ｐюゐヰhelmet. And the frog юsentry was for not ゐюletting 路○Jack in; 仇but the ヰmouse 佛ゐcalled out that they 别came from the 路King of 佛all the 路ヰ拆Mice and ヰ仇must be ゐюlet in without ゐdelay. So they were 别taken to the 路King 别ヰchamber, where ｐhe 别sate 拣surrounded by frog 桂金courtiers in 拆fine ゐ答clothes; 仇but ゐalas! ｐHe ｐhad ｐ火heard 仇nothing of the 路Castle on 答ゐgolden ゐ拣pillars, and though ｐhe 仇ヰsummoned 佛all the frogs of 佛all the 火ゐworld to a 路Grand 路юヰゐAssembly юnext ヰ桂morning, they 佛all 拣answered ｐhis юquestion with:

"_ {Kro} {kro} , {Kro} {kro} _"

Which юevery 仇one 答knows stands for 路No" in frog ゐlanguage.

So the 路King юsaid to 路○Jack, "路There ヰ别remains 仇but 仇one thing.
