It 答knows the way, and will carry you 别safe."

So 路○Jack юset off, and 梆being a 拆kind-ｐ葛hearted ゐlad ｐhe 别gave the frog юsentry, ｐ叼whom ｐhe ヰюmet 仇ヰcoming away from ｐhis 葛guard, 仇some 仇ヰcrumbs ｐhe ｐhad 别saved from ｐhis dinner. And the frog asked ゐ梆leave to go with ｐhim, and юwhen 路○Jack 筐refused to 别take ｐhim ｐhe ○仇just 别gave 仇one ｐhop on to the stirrup, and a юsecond ｐhop on to the 仇crupper, and the юnext ｐhop ｐhe was in 路○Jack's 仇other pocket.

юThen the ｐ桂horse ゐgalloped away ゐ拆like ゐ拆lightning, for it didn't ゐ拆like the ゐ拆ヰslimy frog 仇ヰcoming down ゐplop" on its back.

юWell, after a 拆time, 路○Jack 别came to the ゐpalace of the 路King of 佛all the 路火Birds, and there at the 仇front 别gate were a sparrow and a crow ヰ葛marching 仇up and down with ヰゐmatchlocks on their 答ゐ拣shoulders. Now at this 路○Jack ゐlaughed fit to ゐsplit, and the ヰmouse and the frog from ｐhis pockets 佛ゐcalled out:

"we 仇come from the 路King! {Sirrahs} ! ゐюLet 仇us pass."

So that the юsentries were 拆right ヰ别mazed, and ゐюlet юthem pass in without ヰmore ado.

仇But юwhen they 别came to the 路King 别ヰchamber, where ｐhe 别sate 拣surrounded by 佛all ヰmanner of 火birds, {tomtits} , юwrens, 桂ヰ拣cormorants, 火turtle-仇doves, and the ゐ拆like, the 路King юsaid ｐhe was sorry, 仇but ｐhe ｐhad no 筐news of the ヰmissing 路Castle. And though ｐhe 仇ヰsummoned 佛all the 火birds of 佛all the 火ゐworld to a 路Grand 路юヰゐAssembly юnext ヰ桂morning, not 仇one of юthem ｐhad 梆seen or ｐ火heard юtell of it.

So 路○Jack was 拆quite ゐdisconsolate till the 路King юsaid, "路仇But where is the 梆eagle? I 答don't see ヰmy 梆eagle."

юThen the 路别ヰ拣ゐChamberlain--ｐhe was a {tomtit} --юstepped 桂拣forward with a bow and юsaid:

"路ヰMay it ゐ梆please your 路ヰ○Majesty ｐhe is ゐ别late."

"ゐ别late?" юSays the 路King in a 筐fume. "仇ヰsummon ｐhim at 仇once."

So two ゐ葛larks ゐflew 仇up into the sky till they couldn't be 梆seen and sang юever so ゐloud, till at ゐlast the 梆eagle 金appeared 佛all in a 火拣别perspiration from ｐhaving ゐ答flown so fast.

юThen the 路King юsaid, "路Sirrah! ｐHave you 梆seen a ヰmissing 路Castle that stands upon юゐtwelve ゐ拣pillars of 答ゐgold?"

And the 梆eagle ゐblinked its 拆eyes and юsaid, "路ヰMay it ゐ梆please your 路ヰ○Majesty that is where 拆I've 梆been."

юThen юeverybody ○娥rejoiced 梆ゐexceedingly, and юwhen the 梆eagle ｐhad 梆eaten a ｐ答whole calf so as to be strong 仇enough for the ○火journey, ｐhe юspread ｐhis 拆wide wings, on which 路○Jack stood, with the ヰmouse in 仇one pocket and the frog in the 仇other, and 葛started to obey the 路King 桂order to 别take the 答owner back to ｐhis ヰmissing 路Castle as ゐquickly as possible.

And they ゐflew 答over ゐland and they ゐflew 答over sea, until at ゐlast in the far distance they saw the 路Castle standing on its юゐtwelve 答ゐgolden ゐ拣pillars. 仇But 佛all the 桂doors and 答windows were fast 仇shut and 葛barred, for, see you, the 火servant-ヰmaster ｐwho ｐhad 仇run away with it ｐhad gone out for the day a-ｐ仇hunting, and ｐhe 佛ゐ别always 答ゐbolted 桂doors and 答windows 拆while ｐhe was юabsent ゐюlest 仇some 仇one юゐelse should 仇run away with it.

юThen 路○Jack was 仇ゐpuzzled to think ｐhow ｐhe should юget ｐ答ゐhold of the 答ゐgolden 仇snuff-box, until the ゐlittle ヰmouse юsaid:

"ゐюlet ヰme юfetch it. There is 佛ゐ别always a ヰmouse-ｐ答hole in юevery castle, so I 别юam sure I shall be 别able to юget in."

So it юwent off, and 路○Jack 别waited on the 梆ゐeagle's wings in a 筐fume; till at ゐlast {mousekin} 金appeared.

"ｐhave you got it?" Shouted 路○Jack, and the ゐlittle {mousie} 拆cried:

"юyes!"

So юevery 仇one ○娥rejoiced 梆ゐexceedingly, and they юset off back to the ゐpalace of the 路King of 佛all the 路火Birds, where 路○Jack ｐhad ゐюleft ｐhis ｐ桂horse; for now that ｐhe ｐhad the 答ゐgolden 仇snuff-box 别safe ｐhe knew ｐhe could юget the 路Castle back ююwhenever ｐhe 答chose to юsend the three ゐlittle юred ヰюmen to юfetch it. 仇But on the way 答over the sea, 拆while 路○Jack, ｐwho was юdead 拆拣tired with standing so ゐlong, ゐlay down 梆between the 梆ゐeagle's wings and юfell ゐ梆asleep, the ヰmouse and the 梆eagle юfell to ゐquarrelling as to which of юthem ｐhad ｐюゐhelped 路○Jack the ヰ答most, and they ゐquarrelled so ヰ仇much that at ゐlast they ゐ别laid the 别case before the frog. юThen the frog, ｐwho ヰ别made a юvery 拆wise ○仇judge, юsaid ｐhe ヰ仇must see the ｐ答whole affair from the юvery beginning; so the ヰmouse 佛brought out the 答ゐgolden 仇snuff-box from 路○Jack's pocket, and began to ゐ别relate where it ｐhad 梆been found and 佛all about it. Now, at that юvery ヰ答ヰmoment 路○Jack 答awoke, kicked out ｐhis ゐюleg, and ゐ仇ヰplump юwent the 答ゐgolden 仇snuff-box down to the юvery bottom of the sea!

"I 佛thought ヰmy 火turn would 仇come," юsaid the frog, and юwent ゐ仇ヰplump in after it.

юWell, they 别waited, and 别waited, and 别waited for three ｐ答whole 别days and three ｐ答whole 拆nights; 仇but {froggie} юnever 别came 仇up юagain, and they ｐhad ○仇just given ｐhim 仇up in despair юwhen ｐhis 答nose 答showed 仇above the 佛water.

"ｐhave you got it?" They shouted.

"no!" юSays ｐhe, with a 别great gasp.

"юthen what do you want?" They 拆cried in a 别rage.

"ヰmy юbreath," юsays {froggie} , and with that ｐhe sinks down юagain.

юWell, they 别waited two 别days and two 拆nights ヰmore, and at ゐlast 仇up 仇ヰcomes the ゐlittle frog with the 答ゐgolden 仇snuff-box in its ヰmouth.

юThen they 佛all ○娥rejoiced 梆ゐexceedingly, and the 梆eagle ゐflew юever so fast to the ゐpalace of the 路King of the 路火Birds.

仇But ゐalas and ゐalack-a-day! 路○Jack's 仇ゐtroubles were not юended; ｐhis ヰ仇拣mother's {malison} was still bringing ｐhim ill-ゐ仇luck, for the 路King of the 路火Birds ゐflew into a 金fearsome 别rage because 路○Jack ｐhad not 佛brought the 路Castle of the 答ゐgolden ゐ拣pillars back with ｐhim. And ｐhe юsaid that ゐюunless ｐhe saw it by 别eight ゐo'clock юnext ヰ桂morning 路○Jack's ｐюhead should 仇come off as a 梆cheat and a ゐ拆liar.

юThen 路○Jack 梆being ゐ答close to юdeath 答opened the 答ゐgolden 仇snuff-box, and out 仇ヰゐtumbled the three ゐlittle юred ヰюmen in their three ゐlittle юred caps. They ｐhad 仇拣recovered their юヰ拣tempers and were 拆quite ゐglad to be back with a ヰmaster ｐwho knew that they would 答ゐonly, as a 叼rule, 火work 仇under fear of юdeath; for, see you, the 火servant-ヰmaster ｐhad 梆been for юever 火disturbing their ゐ梆sleep with 答opening the box to no 火purpose.

So before the ゐclock 仇struck 别eight юnext ヰ桂morning, there was the 路Castle on its юゐtwelve 答ゐgolden ゐ拣pillars, and the 路King of the 路火Birds was 拆fine and ゐ梆pleased, and ゐюlet 路○Jack 别take ｐhis ｐ桂horse and 拆ride to the ゐpalace of the 路King of the 路Frogs. 仇But there ゐexactly the 别same thing ｐhappened, and poor 路○Jack ｐhad to 答open the 仇snuff-box юagain and 桂order the 路Castle to 仇come to the ゐpalace of the 路King of the 路Frogs. At this the ゐlittle юred ヰюmen were a wee bit cross; 仇but they юsaid they 答supposed it could not be ｐюゐhelped; so, though they 佛yawned, they 佛brought the 路Castle 佛all 拆right, and 路○Jack was ゐallowed to 别take ｐhis ｐ桂horse and go to the ゐpalace of the 路King of 佛all the 路ヰ拆Mice in the 路火ゐWorld. 仇But ｐhere the 别same thing ｐhappened, and the ゐlittle юred ヰюmen 仇ヰゐtumbled out of the 答ゐgolden 仇snuff-box in a 攫real 别rage, and юsaid юゐ答fellows ヰ拆might as юwell ｐhave no ゐ梆sleep at 佛all! ｐюHowever, they did as they were bidden; they 佛brought the 路Castle of the 答ゐgolden ゐ拣pillars from the ゐpalace of the 路King of the 路Frogs to the ゐpalace of the 路King of the 路火Birds, and 路○Jack was ゐallowed to 别take ｐhis 答own ｐ桂horse and 拆ride ｐ答home.

仇But the year and a day which ｐhe ｐhad 梆been ゐallowed was 佛ゐヰ答almost gone, and 梆even ｐhis gay 仇young 拆wife, after 佛ゐヰ答almost 梆weeping ｐher 拆eyes out after ｐher ｐhandsome 仇young ｐ仇husband, ｐhad given 仇up 路○Jack for ゐlost; so юevery 仇one was astounded to see ｐhim, and not 答over-ゐ梆pleased 拆either to see ｐhim 仇come without ｐhis 路Castle. 梆Indeed ｐhis father-in-ゐlaw swore with ヰюmany 答oaths that if it were not in its proper ゐ别place by 别eight ゐo'clock юnext ヰ桂morning 路○Jack's ゐ拆life should be 桂forfeit.

Now this, of 桂course, was ゐexactly what 路○Jack ｐhad wanted and юintended from the beginning; because юwhen юdeath was nigh ｐhe could 答open the 答ゐgolden 仇snuff-box and 桂order about the ゐlittle юred ヰюmen. 仇But ｐhe ｐhad 答opened it so often of ゐ别late and they ｐhad 仇become so cross that ｐhe was in a stew what to do; юwhether to give юthem 拆time to show their юヰtemper, or to ｐ仇hustle юthem out of it. At ゐlast ｐhe 拆decided to do ｐhalf and ｐhalf. So ○仇just as the ｐhands of the ゐclock were at 拆five ヰminutes to 别eight ｐhe 答opened the box, and stopped ｐhis 金ears!

юWell! You юnever ｐ火heard 仇such a 佛yawning, and 答ゐscolding, and юthreatening, and ゐ仇拣blustering. What did ｐhe ヰ梆mean by it? Why should ｐhe 别take four 拆bites at 仇one юcherry? If ｐhe was 佛ゐ别always in fear of юdeath why didn't ｐhe die and ｐhave 仇done with it?

In the ヰmidst of 佛all this the tower ゐclock began to whirr--

"○юゐヰюgentlemen!" юSays 路○Jack--ｐhe was 攫ゐreally 别quaking with fear--"do as you are 答ゐtold."

"for the ゐlast 拆time," they 梆shrieked. "we 答won't stay and 火serve a ヰmaster ｐwho thinks ｐhe is 答going to die юevery day."

And with that they ゐflew out of the window.

_and they юnever 别came back. _

The 答ゐgolden 仇snuff-box ヰ别remained юヰempty for ю拣ヰevermore.

仇But юwhen 路○Jack ゐlooked out of window there was the 路Castle in the ヰmiddle of the ゐ别lake on its юゐtwelve 答ゐgolden ゐ拣pillars, and there was ｐhis 仇young 拆wife юever so pretty and gay in ｐher 拆nightcap ゐlooking out of the window too.

So they ゐlived ｐゐhappily юever after.

拣答Tattercoats

In a 别great 路ゐPalace by the sea there 仇once юゐdwelt a юvery rich 答ゐold ゐ桂lord, ｐwho ｐhad 拆neither 拆wife nor ゐchildren ゐliving, 答ゐonly 仇one ゐlittle 佛granddaughter, ｐ叼whose 别face ｐhe ｐhad юnever 梆seen in 佛all ｐher ゐ拆life. ｐHe ｐ别hated ｐher 拣ゐbitterly, because at ｐher 火birth ｐhis 别拣favourite 佛daughter 拆died; and юwhen the 答ゐold 火nurse 佛brought ｐhim the 别baby ｐhe swore that it ヰ拆might ゐ拆live or die as it ゐ拆liked, 仇but ｐhe would юnever ゐlook on its 别face as ゐlong as it ゐlived.

So ｐhe 火turned ｐhis back, and 拣sat by ｐhis window ゐlooking out 答over the sea, and 梆weeping 别great 金tears for ｐhis ゐlost 佛daughter, till ｐhis 拆white ｐhair and 金beard grew down 答over ｐhis 答ゐ拣shoulders and 拆twined round ｐhis chair and юcrept into the chinks of the ゐfloor, and ｐhis 金tears, dropping on to the window-ゐюledge, wore a channel through the 答stone, and ran away in a ゐlittle river to the 别great sea. ヰ梆拆Meanwhile, ｐhis 佛granddaughter grew 仇up with no 仇one to care for ｐher, or ゐ答clothe ｐher; 答ゐonly the 答ゐold 火nurse, юwhen no 仇one was by, would 仇ヰ拆ヰsometimes give ｐher a dish of scraps from the kitchen, or a 桂torn ю答petticoat from the rag-bag; 拆while the 仇other 火servants of the ゐpalace would 拆drive ｐher from the ｐhouse with ゐ答blows and ヰmocking 火words, 佛ゐcalling ｐher 路拣答Tattercoats," and 娥pointing to ｐher bare 梆feet and 答ゐ拣shoulders, till she ran away, 拆crying, to ｐ拆hide ヰ仇among the bushes.

So she grew 仇up, with ゐlittle to 梆eat or to wear, юspending ｐher 别days out of 桂doors, ｐher 答ゐonly ヰcompanion a ゐcrippled 叼ｐ火gooseherd, ｐwho юfed ｐhis ゐflock of 梆geese on the ヰcommon. And this 叼ｐ火gooseherd was a queer, ヰюmerry ゐlittle chap, and юwhen she was ｐ仇hungry, or 答ゐcold, or 拆拣tired, ｐhe would ゐplay to ｐher so 别ゐgaily on ｐhis ゐlittle 拆pipe, that she 拣forgot 佛all ｐher 仇ゐtroubles, and would 佛fall to dancing with ｐhis ゐflock of 娥noisy 梆geese for 葛拣partners.

Now 仇one day 梆people 答ゐtold 梆each 仇other that the 路King was ゐtravelling through the ゐland, and was to give a 别great 佛ball to 佛all the ゐ桂lords and ゐ别ladies of the 仇country in the town near by, and that the 路Prince, ｐhis 答ゐonly 仇son, was to 叼choose a 拆wife from ヰ仇amongst the ヰ别maidens in the 仇ヰcompany. In due 拆time 仇one of the 娥royal 别invitations to the 佛ball was 佛brought to the 路ゐPalace by the sea, and the 火servants carried it 仇up to the 答ゐold ゐ桂lord, ｐwho still 拣sat by ｐhis window, wrapped in ｐhis ゐlong 拆white ｐhair and 梆weeping into the ゐlittle river that was юfed by ｐhis 金tears.

仇But юwhen ｐhe ｐ火heard the 路King ヰcommand, ｐhe 拆dried ｐhis 拆eyes and bade юthem bring 金shears to 仇cut ｐhim ゐ叼loose, for ｐhis ｐhair ｐhad bound ｐhim a fast prisoner, and ｐhe could not ヰ叼move. And юthen ｐhe юsent юthem for rich ゐ答clothes, and ○叼ゐjewels, which ｐhe put on; and ｐhe 桂拣ordered юthem to saddle the 拆white ｐ桂horse, with 答ゐgold and ゐsilk, that ｐhe ヰ拆might 拆ride to ヰ梆meet the 路King; 仇but ｐhe 拆quite 拣forgot ｐhe ｐhad a 佛granddaughter to 别take to the 佛ball.

ヰ梆拆Meanwhile 路拣答Tattercoats 拣sat by the kitchen-door 梆weeping, because she could not go to see the grand 叼doings. And юwhen the 答ゐold 火nurse ｐ火heard ｐher 拆crying she юwent to the 路ゐ桂Lord of the 路ゐPalace, and юbegged ｐhim to 别take ｐhis 佛granddaughter with ｐhim to the 路King 佛ball.

仇But ｐhe 答ゐonly frowned and 答ゐtold ｐher to be 拆ゐsilent; 拆while the 火servants ゐlaughed and юsaid, "路拣答Tattercoats is ｐhappy in ｐher rags, ゐ别playing with the 叼ｐ火gooseherd! ゐюLet ｐher be--it is 佛all she is fit for."

A юsecond, and юthen a 火third 拆time, the 答ゐold 火nurse юbegged ｐhim to ゐюlet the 火girl go with ｐhim, 仇but she was 拣answered 答ゐonly by ゐblack ゐlooks and 金fierce 火words, till she was driven from the 叼room by the ○金jeering 火servants, with ゐ答blows and ヰmocking 火words.

梆Weeping 答over ｐher ill-юsuccess, the 答ゐold 火nurse юwent to ゐlook for 路拣答Tattercoats; 仇but the 火girl ｐhad 梆been 火turned from the door by the cook, and ｐhad 仇run away to юtell ｐher юfriend the 叼ｐ火gooseherd ｐhow 仇ｐunhappy she was because she could not go to the 路King 佛ball.

Now юwhen the 叼ｐ火gooseherd ｐhad ゐlistened to ｐher 桂story, ｐhe bade ｐher cheer 仇up, and 答proposed that they should go юtogether into the town to see the 路King, and 佛all the 拆fine things; and юwhen she ゐlooked 答ゐsorrowfully down at ｐher rags and bare 梆feet ｐhe ゐ别played a 答note or two upon ｐhis 拆pipe, so gay and ヰюmerry, that she 拣forgot 佛all about ｐher 金tears and ｐher 仇ゐtroubles, and before she юwell knew, the 叼ｐ火gooseherd ｐhad 别taken ｐher by the ｐhand, and she and ｐhe, and the 梆geese before юthem, were dancing down the 答road 桂towards the town.

"梆even ゐcripples can dance юwhen they 叼choose," юsaid the 叼ｐ火gooseherd.

Before they ｐhad gone юvery far a ｐhandsome 仇young ヰman, ゐюゐsplendidly юdressed, 拆riding 仇up, stopped to ask the way to the castle where the 路King was 别staying, and юwhen ｐhe found that they too were 答going thither, ｐhe got off ｐhis ｐ桂horse and 佛walked 拆beside юthem ゐalong the 答road.

"you 梆seem ヰюmerry 答folk," ｐhe юsaid, "and will be good 仇ヰcompany."

"good 仇ヰcompany, 梆indeed," юsaid the 叼ｐ火gooseherd, and ゐ别played a new 筐tune that was not a dance.

It was a 拣攫curious 筐tune, and it ヰ别made the 别strange 仇young ヰman stare and stare and stare at 路拣答Tattercoats till ｐhe couldn't see ｐher rags--till ｐhe couldn't, to юtell the 叼truth, see юanything 仇but ｐher 筐beautiful 别face.

юThen ｐhe юsaid, "路You are the ヰ答most 筐beautiful ヰ别maiden in the 火ゐworld. 路Will you ヰmarry ヰme?"

юThen the 叼ｐ火gooseherd ヰ拆ゐsmiled to ｐヰюゐhimself, and ゐ别played 梆sweeter than юever.

仇But 路拣答Tattercoats ゐlaughed. "not I," юsaid she; "you would be 拆ゐfinely put to 别shame, and so would I be, if you took a 叼goose-火girl for your 拆wife! Go and ask 仇one of the 别great ゐ别ladies you will see to-拆night at the 路King 佛ball, and do not ゐflout poor 路拣答Tattercoats."

仇But the ヰmore she 筐refused ｐhim the 梆sweeter the 拆pipe ゐ别played, and the 梆deeper the 仇young ヰman юfell in ゐ仇love; till at ゐlast ｐhe юbegged ｐher to 仇come that 拆night at юゐtwelve to the 路King 佛ball, ○仇just as she was, with the 叼ｐ火gooseherd and ｐhis 梆geese, in ｐher 桂torn ю答petticoat and bare 梆feet, and see if ｐhe wouldn't dance with ｐher before the 路King and the ゐ桂lords and ゐ别ladies, and юpresent ｐher to юthem 佛all, as ｐhis dear and 拣honoured 拆bride.

Now at 火first 路拣答Tattercoats юsaid she would not; 仇but the 叼ｐ火gooseherd юsaid, "路别Take 桂叼fortune юwhen it 仇ヰcomes, ゐlittle 仇one."

So юwhen 拆night 别came, and the ｐ佛hall in the castle was full of ゐ拆light and ヰ筐music, and the ゐ桂lords and ゐ别ladies were dancing before the 路King, ○仇just as the ゐclock 仇struck юゐtwelve, 路拣答Tattercoats and the 叼ｐ火gooseherd, ゐ答followed by ｐhis ゐflock of 娥noisy 梆geese, ｐhissing and 别swaying their ｐюheads, ю拣entered at the 别great 桂doors, and 佛walked 别straight 仇up the 佛ball-叼room, 拆while on 拆either 拆side the ゐ别ladies 拣whispered, the ゐ桂lords ゐlaughed, and the 路King 梆seated at the far юend 吼stared in ヰ别ヰamazement.

仇But as they 别came in 仇front of the 答throne 路拣答Tattercoats ゐ仇lover 答rose from 拆beside the 路King, and 别came to ヰ梆meet ｐher. 别Taking ｐher by the ｐhand, ｐhe kissed ｐher 拆thrice before юthem 佛all, and 火turned to the 路King.

"father!" ｐHe юsaid--for it was the 路Prince ｐヰюゐhimself--"I ｐhave ヰ别made ヰmy 娥choice, and ｐhere is ヰmy 拆bride, the ゐ仇ゐloveliest 火girl in 佛all the ゐland, and the 梆sweetest as юwell!"

Before ｐhe ｐhad finished 梆speaking, the 叼ｐ火gooseherd ｐhad put ｐhis 拆pipe to ｐhis ゐlips and ゐ别played a few 答notes that sounded ゐ拆like a 火bird singing far off in the woods; and as ｐhe ゐ别played 路拣答Tattercoats rags were 别○changed to 拆shining 答robes 答sewn with ゐ拣glittering ○叼ゐjewels, a 答ゐgolden crown ゐlay upon ｐher 答ゐgolden ｐhair, and the ゐflock of 梆geese ｐ拆behind ｐher 别became a crowd of 别dainty 别○pages, 吼bearing ｐher ゐlong 别train.

And as the 路King 答rose to 梆greet ｐher as ｐhis 佛daughter the 仇ヰtrumpets sounded ゐゐloudly in honour of the new 路юPrincess, and the 梆people 拆outside in the 梆street юsaid to 梆each 仇other:

"ah! Now the 路Prince ｐhas 答chosen for ｐhis 拆wife the ゐ仇ゐloveliest 火girl in 佛all the ゐland!"

仇But the 叼ｐ火gooseherd was юnever 梆seen юagain, and no 仇one knew what 别became of ｐhim; 拆while the 答ゐold ゐ桂lord юwent ｐ答home 仇once ヰmore to ｐhis 路ゐPalace by the sea, for ｐhe could not stay at 路桂Court, юwhen ｐhe ｐhad 桂sworn юnever to ゐlook on ｐhis 佛拣granddaughter's 别face.

So there ｐhe still sits by ｐhis window,--if you could 答ゐonly see ｐhim, as you ヰmay 仇some day--梆weeping ヰmore 拣ゐbitterly than юever. And ｐhis 拆white ｐhair ｐhas bound ｐhim to the 答stones, and the river of ｐhis 金tears 仇runs away to the 别great sea.

The 路Three 路ю拣Feathers

仇Once upon a 拆time there ゐlived a 火girl ｐwho was 叼wooed and ヰmarried by a ヰman she юnever saw; for ｐhe 别came a-桂courting ｐher after 拆佛nightfall, and юwhen they were ヰmarried ｐhe юnever 别came ｐ答home till it was 葛dark, and 佛ゐ别always ゐюleft before 佛dawn.

Still ｐhe was good and 拆kind to ｐher, giving ｐher юeverything ｐher ｐ葛heart could 拆desire, so she was юwell юcontent for a 拆while. 仇But, after a bit, 仇some of ｐher юfriends, ゐdoubtless full of юenvy for ｐher good ゐ仇luck, began to whisper that the 仇梆unseen ｐ仇husband ヰ仇must ｐhave 仇ヰsomething юdreadful the ヰmatter with ｐhim which ヰ别made ｐhim 火averse to 梆being 梆seen.

Now from the юvery beginning the 火girl ｐhad 仇拣wondered why ｐher ゐ仇lover did not 仇come a-桂courting ｐher as 仇other 火ゐgirls' ゐ仇拣lovers 别came, 答ゐopenly and by day, and though, at 火first, she 别paid no ｐ梆heed to ｐher 别拣neighbours' nods and winks, she began at ゐlast to think there ヰ拆might be 仇ヰsomething in what they юsaid. So she 火ヰdetermined to see for ｐ火юゐherself, and 仇one 拆night юwhen she ｐ火heard ｐher ｐ仇husband 仇come into ｐher 叼room, she ゐlit ｐher candle 仇ゐsuddenly and saw ｐhim.

And, ゐlo and ｐ答ゐbehold! ｐHe was ｐhandsome as ｐhandsome; 筐beautiful 仇enough to ヰ别make юevery ヰwoman in the 火ゐworld 佛fall in ゐ仇love with ｐhim on the spot. 仇But 梆even as she got ｐher ゐヰglimpse of ｐhim, ｐhe 别○changed into a big brown 火bird which ゐlooked at ｐher with 拆eyes full of anger and ゐ别blame.

"because you ｐhave 仇done this 别ゐfaithless thing," it юsaid, "you will see ヰme no ヰmore, ゐюunless for юseven ゐlong 金years and a day you 火serve for ヰme 别ゐfaithfully."

And she 拆cried with 金tears and sobs, "I will 火serve юseven 拆ヰtimes юseven 金years and a day if you will 答ゐonly 仇come back. юTell ヰme what I 别юam to do."

юThen the 火bird-ｐ仇husband юsaid, "I will ゐ别place you in 火service, and there you ヰ仇must ヰ别remain and do good 火work for юseven 金years and a day, and you ヰ仇must ゐlisten to no ヰman ｐwho ヰmay 梆seek to 拆beguile you to ゐ梆leave that 火service. If you do I will юnever 火return."

To this the 火girl 梆agreed, and the 火bird, юspreading its 佛broad brown wings, carried ｐher to a big ヰmansion.

"ｐhere they 梆need a ゐ佛laundry-ヰ别maid," юsaid the 火bird-ｐ仇husband. "go in, ask to see the ヰmistress, and say you will do the 火work; 仇but ヰюヰremember you ヰ仇must do it for юseven 金years and a day."

"仇but I cannot do it for юseven 别days," 拣answered the 火girl. "I cannot wash or 拆拣iron."

"that ヰ拣matters 仇nothing," ゐ拆replied the 火bird. "佛all you ｐhave to do is to ゐ仇pluck three ю拣feathers from 仇under ヰmy wing ゐ答close to ヰmy ｐ葛heart, and 梆these ю拣feathers will do your bidding юwhatever it ヰmay be. You will 答ゐonly ｐhave to put юthem on your ｐhand, and say, 'By火virtue of 梆these three ю拣feathers from 答over ヰmy true ゐ仇love's ｐ葛heart ヰmay this be 仇done,'and it will be 仇done."

So the 火girl ゐ仇plucked three ю拣feathers from 仇under the 火bird's wing, and after that the 火bird ゐflew away.

юThen the 火girl did as she was bidden, and the ゐ别lady of the ｐhouse 别○engaged ｐher for the ゐ别place. And юnever was 仇such a quick ゐ佛юlaundress; for, see you, she ｐhad 答ゐonly to go into the wash-ｐhouse, 答ゐbolt the door and ゐ答close the 仇拣shutters, so that no 仇one should see what she was at; юthen she would out with the three ю拣feathers and say, "路By 火virtue of 梆these three ю拣feathers from 答over ヰmy true ゐ仇love's ｐ葛heart ヰmay the copper be ゐlit, the ゐ答clothes 桂sorted, washed, 娥ゐboiled, 拆dried, 答ゐfolded, ヰゐmangled, 拆拣ironed," and ゐlo! There they 别came 仇ヰゐtumbling on to the 别table, ゐ梆clean and 拆white, 拆quite юready to be put away. So ｐher ヰmistress юset 别great store by ｐher and юsaid there юnever was 仇such a good ゐ佛laundry-ヰ别maid. 仇Thus four 金years passed and there was no 佛talk of ｐher ゐ梆leaving. 仇But the 仇other 火servants grew ○юゐjealous of ｐher, 佛all the ヰmore so, because, 梆being a юvery pretty 火girl, 佛all the ヰюmen-火servants юfell in ゐ仇love with ｐher and wanted to ヰmarry ｐher.

仇But she would ｐhave 仇none of юthem, because she was 佛ゐ别always 别waiting and ゐlonging for the day юwhen ｐher 火bird-ｐ仇husband would 仇come back to ｐher in ヰman's 桂form.

Now 仇one of the ヰюmen ｐwho wanted ｐher was the stout 仇ゐbutler, and 仇one day as ｐhe was 仇ヰcoming back from the 拆cider-ｐhouse ｐhe chanced to stop by the ゐ佛laundry, and ｐhe ｐ火heard a 娥voice say, "路By 火virtue of 梆these three ю拣feathers from 答over ヰmy true ゐ仇love's ｐ葛heart ヰmay the copper be ゐlit, the ゐ答clothes 桂sorted, 娥ゐboiled, 拆dried, 答ゐfolded, ヰゐmangled, and 拆拣ironed."

ｐHe 佛thought this юvery queer, so ｐhe 梆peeped through the 梆ｐ答keyhole. And there was the 火girl sitting at ｐher 梆ease in a chair, 拆while 佛all the ゐ答clothes 别came ゐ拆flying to the 别table юready and fit to put away.

юWell, that 拆night ｐhe юwent to the 火girl and юsaid that if she 火turned 仇up ｐher 答nose at ｐhim and ｐhis 答proposal юany ゐlonger, ｐhe would 仇up and юtell the ヰmistress that ｐher 拆fine ゐ佛юlaundress was 仇nothing 仇but a witch; and юthen, 梆even if she were not 火burnt ゐ拆alive, she would ゐ叼lose ｐher ゐ别place.

Now the 火girl was in 别great юdistress what to do, since if she were not 别faithful to ｐher 火bird-ｐ仇husband, or if she 别ゐfailed to 火serve ｐher юseven 金years and a day in 仇one 火service, ｐhe would ゐ拆alike 别fail to 火return; so she ヰ别made an 筐excuse by 别saying she could think of no 仇one ｐwho did not give ｐher 仇enough ヰ仇money to satisfy ｐher.

At this the stout 仇ゐbutler ゐlaughed. "ヰ仇money?" юSaid ｐhe. "I ｐhave юseventy pounds ゐ别laid by with ヰmaster. 答Won't that satisfy thee?"

"ｐhappen it would," she ゐ拆replied.

So the юvery юnext 拆night the 仇ゐbutler 别came to ｐher with the юseventy pounds in 答ゐgolden sovereigns, and she ｐюゐheld out ｐher 别apron and took юthem, 别saying she was юcontent; for she ｐhad 佛thought of a ゐplan. Now as they were 答going 仇吼upstairs юtogether she stopped and юsaid:

"ヰmr. 仇ゐButler, 筐excuse ヰme for a ヰ拆筐minute. I ｐhave ゐюleft the 仇拣shutters of the wash-ｐhouse 答open, and I ヰ仇must 仇shut юthem, or they will be banging 佛all 拆night and 火disturb ヰmaster and ヰmissus!"

Now though the 仇ゐbutler was stout and beginning to grow 答ゐold, ｐhe was anxious to 梆seem 仇young and ゐgallant; so ｐhe юsaid at 仇once:

"筐excuse ヰme, ヰmy 筐beauty, you shall not go. I will go and 仇shut юthem. I shan't be a ヰ答ヰmoment!"

So off ｐhe юset, and no 叼sooner ｐhad ｐhe gone than she out with ｐher three ю拣feathers, and 仇putting юthem on ｐher ｐhand, юsaid in a ｐ仇hurry:

"by 火virtue of the three ю拣feathers from 答over ヰmy true ゐ仇love's ｐ葛heart ヰmay the 仇拣shutters юnever 梆cease banging till ヰ桂morning, and ヰmay 路ヰMr. 仇ゐButler ｐhands be busy 拆trying to 仇shut юthem."

And so it ｐhappened.

ヰMr. 仇ゐButler 仇shut the 仇拣shutters, 仇but-- {bru} -u-u! There they were ｐhanging 答open юagain. юThen ｐhe 仇shut юthem 仇once ヰmore, and this 拆time they ｐhit ｐhim on the 别face as they ゐflew 答open. юYet ｐhe couldn't stop; ｐhe ｐhad to go on. So there ｐhe was the ｐ答whole ゐゐlivelong 拆night. 仇Such a 火cursing, and banging, and 吼swearing, and 仇shutting, юnever was, until 佛dawn 别came, and, too 拆拣tired to be 攫ゐreally angry, ｐhe юcrept back to ｐhis юbed, ゐresolving that 仇come what ヰ拆might ｐhe would not юtell what ｐhad ｐhappened to ｐhim and 仇thus юget the ゐlaugh on ｐhim. So ｐhe юkept ｐhis 答own counsel, and the 火girl юkept the юseventy pounds, and ゐlaughed in ｐher ゐ梆sleeve at ｐher would-be ゐ仇lover.

Now after a 拆time the 答ヰcoachman, a 叼spruce ヰmiddle-别○aged ヰman, ｐwho ｐhad ゐlong wanted to ヰmarry the ゐюclever, pretty ゐ佛laundry-ヰ别maid, 答going to the 仇ヰpump to юget 佛water for ｐhis ｐ桂horses 答拣ｐ火overheard ｐher giving 桂拣orders to the three ю拣feathers, and 梆peeping through the 梆ｐ答keyhole as the 仇ゐbutler ｐhad 仇done, saw ｐher sitting at ｐher 梆ease in a chair 拆while the ゐ答clothes, 佛all washed and 拆拣ironed and ヰゐmangled, 别came ゐ拆flying to the 别table.

So, ○仇just as the 仇ゐbutler ｐhad 仇done, ｐhe юwent to the 火girl and юsaid, "I ｐhave you now, ヰmy pretty. 答Don't dare to 火turn 仇up your 答nose at ヰme, for if you do 拆I'll юtell ヰmistress you are a witch."

юThen the 火girl юsaid 拆quite ヰゐcalmly, "I ゐlook on 仇none ｐwho ｐhas no ヰ仇money."

"if that is 佛all," ゐ拆replied the 答ヰcoachman, "I ｐhave 桂forty pounds ゐ别laid by with ヰmaster. That 拆I'll bring and ask for 别ヰpayment to-ヰmorrow 拆night."

So юwhen the 拆night 别came the 火girl ｐюゐheld out ｐher 别apron for the ヰ仇money, and as she was 答going 仇up the 吼stairs she stopped 仇ゐsuddenly and юsaid, "路Goody ヰme! 拆I've ゐюleft ヰmy ゐ答clothes on the ゐ拆line. Stop a bit till I юfetch юthem in."

Now the 答ヰcoachman was 攫ゐreally a юvery ゐ拆polite юゐfellow, so ｐhe юsaid at 仇once:

"ゐюlet ヰme go. It is a 答ゐcold, windy 拆night and 筐you'll be catching your юdeath."

So off ｐhe юwent, and the 火girl out with ｐher ю拣feathers and юsaid:

"by 火virtue of the three ю拣feathers from 答over ヰmy true ゐ仇love's ｐ葛heart ヰmay the ゐ答clothes ゐslash and ゐblow about till 佛dawn, and ヰmay 路ヰMr. 答ヰCoachman not be 别able to gather юthem 仇up or 别take ｐhis ｐhand from the ○job."

And юwhen she ｐhad юsaid this she юwent 拆ゐquietly to юbed, for she knew what would ｐhappen. And sure 仇enough it did. юNever was 仇such a 拆night as 路ヰMr. 答ヰCoachman юspent with the юwet ゐ答clothes {flittering} and ゐ仇拣fluttering about ｐhis 金ears, and the 梆sheets wrapping ｐhim into a 仇bundle, and tripping ｐhim 仇up, 拆while the ゐtowels ゐslashed at ｐhis ゐюlegs. 仇But though ｐhe ヰ葛smarted 佛all 答over ｐhe ｐhad to go on till 佛dawn 别came, and юthen a юvery 金weary, 答woebegone 答ヰcoachman couldn't 梆even 梆creep away to ｐhis юbed, for ｐhe ｐhad to 梆feed and 佛water ｐhis ｐ桂horses! And ｐhe, 佛ゐalso, юkept ｐhis 答own counsel for fear of the ゐlaugh 答going юagainst ｐhim; so the ゐюclever ゐ佛laundry-ヰ别maid put the 桂forty pounds with the юseventy in ｐher box, and юwent on with ｐher 火work 别ゐgaily. 仇But after a 拆time the ヰfootman, ｐwho was 拆quite an honest ゐlad and 叼ゐtruly in ゐ仇love, 答going by the ゐ佛laundry 梆peeped through the 梆ｐ答keyhole to юget a ゐヰglimpse of ｐhis 金dearest dear, and what should ｐhe see 仇but ｐher sitting at ｐher 梆ease in a chair, and the ゐ答clothes 仇ヰcoming 佛all юready 答ゐfolded and 拆拣ironed on to the 别table.

Now юwhen ｐhe saw this ｐhe was 别ゐgreatly 仇ゐtroubled. So ｐhe юwent to ｐhis ヰmaster and drew out 佛all ｐhis 别savings; and юthen ｐhe юwent to the 火girl and 答ゐtold ｐher that ｐhe would ｐhave to юtell the ヰmistress what ｐhe ｐhad 梆seen, ゐюunless she юconsented to ヰmarry ｐhim.

"you see," ｐhe юsaid, "I ｐhave 梆been with ヰmaster this 拆while back, and ｐhave 别saved 仇up this bit, and you ｐhave 梆been ｐhere this ゐlong 拆while back and ヰ仇must ｐhave 别saved as юwell. So ゐюlet 仇us put the two юtogether and ヰ别make a ｐ答home, or юゐelse stay on at 火service as ゐ梆pleases you."

юWell, she 拆tried to put ｐhim off; 仇but ｐhe insisted so ヰ仇much that at ゐlast she юsaid:

"路○别ヰJames! 吼There's a dear, 仇run down to the юゐcellar and юfetch ヰme a drop of brandy. 筐You've ヰ别made ヰme 梆feel so queer!" And юwhen ｐhe ｐhad gone she out with ｐher three ю拣feathers, and юsaid, "路By 火virtue of the three ю拣feathers from 答over ヰmy true ゐ仇love's ｐ葛heart ヰmay 路○别ヰJames not be 别able to pour the brandy 别straight, юexcept down ｐhis 答throat."

юWell! So it ｐhappened. Try as ｐhe would, 路○别ヰJames could not юget the brandy into the ゐglass. It ゐsplashed a few drops into it, юthen it ゐtrickled 答over ｐhis ｐhand, and юfell on the ゐfloor. And so it юwent on and on till ｐhe grew so 拆拣tired that ｐhe 佛thought ｐhe 梆needed a dram ｐヰюゐhimself. So ｐhe tossed off the few drops and began юagain; 仇but ｐhe 吼fared no юbetter. So ｐhe took 仇another ゐlittle 别drain, and юwent on, and on, and on, till ｐhe got 拆quite 仇ゐfuddled. And ｐwho should 仇come down into the юゐcellar 仇but ｐhis ヰmaster to know what the ヰюsmell of brandy ヰюmeant!

Now 路○别ヰJames the ヰfootman was 叼truthful as юwell as honest, so ｐhe 答ゐtold the ヰmaster ｐhow ｐhe ｐhad 仇come down to юget the sick ゐ佛laundry-ヰ别maid a drop of brandy, 仇but that ｐhis ｐhand ｐhad 别shaken so that ｐhe could not pour it out, and it ｐhad 佛ゐfallen on the ground, and that the ヰюsmell of it ｐhad got to ｐhis ｐюhead.

"a ゐ拆ゐlikely 别tale," юsaid the ヰmaster, and 梆beat 路○别ヰJames ゐsoundly.

юThen the ヰmaster юwent to the ヰmistress, ｐhis 拆wife, and юsaid: "юsend away that ゐ佛laundry-ヰ别maid of 桂yours. 仇ヰSomething ｐhas 仇come 答over ヰmy ヰюmen. They ｐhave 佛all 佛drawn out their 别savings as if they were 答going to be ヰmarried, юyet they 答don't ゐ梆leave, and I ゐ梆believe that 火girl is at the bottom of it."

仇But ｐhis 拆wife would not ｐhear of the ゐ佛laundry-ヰ别maid 梆being ゐ别ヰblamed; she was the юbest 火servant in the ｐhouse, and 火worth 佛all the юrest of юthem put юtogether; it was ｐhis ヰюmen ｐwho were at 佛ゐfault. So they ゐquarrelled 答over it; 仇but in the юend the ヰmaster 别gave in, and after this there was 梆peace, since the ヰmistress bade the 火girl 梆keep ｐ火юゐherself to ｐ火юゐherself, and 仇none of the ヰюmen would say 佛ought of what ｐhad ｐhappened for fear of the ゐlaughter of the 仇other 火servants.

So it юwent on until 仇one day юwhen the ヰmaster was 答going a-拆driving, the 答coach was at the door, and the ヰfootman was standing to ｐ答ゐhold the 答coach 答open, and the 仇ゐbutler on the юsteps 佛all юready, юwhen ｐwho should pass through the 葛yard, so 佛saucy and 拆bright with a 别great basket of ゐ梆clean ゐ答clothes, 仇but the ゐ佛laundry-ヰ别maid. And the 拆sight of ｐher was too ヰ仇much for 路○别ヰJames, the ヰfootman, ｐwho began to {blub} .

"she is a wicked 火girl," ｐhe юsaid. "she got 佛all ヰmy 别savings, and got ヰme a good thrashing 拆besides."

юThen the 答ヰcoachman grew 答ゐbold. "did she?" ｐHe юsaid. "that was 仇nothing to what she 火served ヰme." So ｐhe 仇up and 答ゐtold 佛all about the юwet ゐ答clothes and the 佛awful ○job ｐhe ｐhad ｐhad the ゐゐlivelong 拆night. Now the 仇ゐbutler on the юsteps юゐswelled with 别rage until ｐhe 金ゐnearly 火burst, and at ゐlast ｐhe out with ｐhis 拆night of banging 仇拣shutters.

"and 仇one," ｐhe юsaid, "ｐhit ヰme on the 答nose."

This юゐsettled the three ヰюmen, and they 梆agreed to юtell their ヰmaster the ヰ答ヰmoment ｐhe 别came out, and юget the 火girl юsent about ｐher business. Now the ゐ佛laundry-ヰ别maid ｐhad 葛sharp 金ears and ｐhad 佛paused ｐ拆behind a door to ゐlisten; so юwhen she ｐ火heard this she knew she ヰ仇must do 仇ヰsomething to stop it. So she out with ｐher three ю拣feathers and юsaid, "路By 火virtue of the three ю拣feathers from 答over ヰmy true ゐ仇love's ｐ葛heart ヰmay there be 拆striving as to ｐwho 仇拣suffered ヰ答most 梆between the ヰюmen so that they юget into the pond for a 仇ducking."

юWell! No 叼sooner ｐhad she юsaid the 火words than the three ヰюmen began 筐disputing as to which of юthem ｐhad 梆been 火served the 火worst; юthen 路○别ヰJames 仇up and ｐhit the stout 仇ゐbutler, giving ｐhim a ゐblack eye, and the fat 仇ゐbutler юfell upon 路○别ヰJames and {pommelled} ｐhim ｐ葛hard, 拆while the 答ヰcoachman ヰゐscrambled from ｐhis box and {belaboured} юthem 答both, and the ゐ佛laundry-ヰ别maid stood by ゐlaughing.

So out 仇ヰcomes the ヰmaster, 仇but 仇none of юthem would ゐlisten, and 梆each wanted to be ｐ火heard, and 佛fought, and 仇shoved, and {pommelled} away until they 仇shoved 梆each 仇other into the pond, and 佛all got a 拆fine 仇ducking.

юThen the ヰmaster asked the 火girl what it was 佛all about, and she юsaid:

"they 佛all wanted to юtell a 桂story юagainst ヰme because I 答won't ヰmarry юthem, and 仇one юsaid ｐhis was the юbest, and the юnext юsaid ｐhis was the юbest, so they юfell a-ゐquarrelling as to which was the ゐ拆ゐlikeliest 桂story to юget ヰme into 仇trouble. 仇But they are юwell 仇punished, so there is no 梆need to do ヰmore."

юThen the ヰmaster юwent to ｐhis 拆wife and юsaid, "路You are 拆right. That ゐ佛laundry-ヰ别maid of 桂yours is a юvery 拆wise 火girl."

So the 仇ゐbutler and the 答ヰcoachman and 路○别ヰJames ｐhad 仇nothing to do 仇but ゐlook 梆sheepish and ｐ答ゐhold their 仇tongues, and the ゐ佛laundry-ヰ别maid юwent on with ｐher 筐duties without 火further 仇trouble.

юThen юwhen the юseven 金years and a day were 答over, ｐwho should 拆drive 仇up to the door in a 拆fine ゐgilded 答coach 仇but the 火bird-ｐ仇husband 桂restored to ｐhis 别shape as a ｐhandsome 仇young ヰman. And ｐhe carried the ゐ佛laundry-ヰ别maid off to be ｐhis 拆wife юagain, and ｐher ヰmaster and ヰmistress were so ゐ梆pleased at ｐher good 桂叼fortune that they 桂拣ordered 佛all the 仇other 火servants to stand on the юsteps and give ｐher good ゐ仇luck. So as she passed the 仇ゐbutler she put a bag with юseventy pounds in it into ｐhis ｐhand and юsaid 梆ゐsweetly, "路That is to юヰюrecompense you for 仇shutting the 仇拣shutters."

And юwhen she passed the 答ヰcoachman she put a bag with 桂forty pounds into ｐhis ｐhand and юsaid, "路That is your 桂reward for bringing in the ゐ答clothes." 仇But юwhen she passed the ヰfootman she 别gave ｐhim a bag with a ｐ仇hundred pounds in it, and ゐlaughed, 别saying, "路That is for the drop of brandy you юnever 佛brought ヰme!"

So she 答drove off with ｐher ｐhandsome ｐ仇husband, and ゐlived ｐhappy юever after.

ゐ别Lazy 路○Jack

仇Once upon a 拆time there was a boy ｐ叼whose 别name was 路○Jack, and ｐhe ゐlived with ｐhis ヰ仇mother on a ヰcommon. They were юvery poor, and the 答ゐold ヰwoman got ｐher ゐliving by spinning, 仇but 路○Jack was so ゐ别lazy that ｐhe would do 仇nothing 仇but bask in the 仇sun in the ｐhot юweather, and sit by the 桂corner of the ｐ葛hearth in the winter-拆time. So they 佛ゐcalled ｐhim 路ゐ别Lazy 路○Jack. ｐHis ヰ仇mother could not юget ｐhim to do юanything for ｐher, and at ゐlast 答ゐtold ｐhim, 仇one {Monday} , that if ｐhe did not begin to 火work for ｐhis porridge she would 火turn ｐhim out to юget ｐhis ゐliving as ｐhe could.

This roused 路○Jack, and ｐhe юwent out and ｐ拆拣hired ｐヰюゐhimself for the юnext day to a 别拣neighbouring 葛ヰfarmer for a юpenny; 仇but as ｐhe was 仇ヰcoming ｐ答home, юnever ｐhaving ｐhad юany ヰ仇money before, ｐhe ゐlost it in passing 答over a brook.

"you 筐stupid boy," юsaid ｐhis ヰ仇mother, "you should ｐhave put it in your pocket."

"拆I'll do so 仇another 拆time," ゐ拆replied 路○Jack.

юWell, the юnext day, 路○Jack юwent out юagain and ｐ拆拣hired ｐヰюゐhimself to a {cowkeeper} , ｐwho 别gave ｐhim a ○jar of ヰゐmilk for ｐhis 别day's 火work. 路○Jack took the ○jar and put it into the ゐ葛large pocket of ｐhis ○jacket, ゐspilling it 佛all, ゐlong before ｐhe got ｐ答home.

"dear ヰme!" юSaid the 答ゐold ヰwoman; "you should ｐhave carried it on your ｐюhead."

"拆I'll do so 仇another 拆time," юsaid 路○Jack.

So the ゐ答following day, 路○Jack ｐ拆拣hired ｐヰюゐhimself юagain to a 葛ヰfarmer, ｐwho 梆agreed to give ｐhim a 梆cream 梆cheese for ｐhis 火services. In the 梆evening 路○Jack took the 梆cheese, and юwent ｐ答home with it on ｐhis ｐюhead. By the 拆time ｐhe got ｐ答home the 梆cheese was 佛all 娥ゐspoilt, 葛part of it 梆being ゐlost, and 葛part ヰmatted with ｐhis ｐhair.

"you 筐stupid ゐlout," юsaid ｐhis ヰ仇mother, "you should ｐhave carried it юvery 吼ゐcarefully in your ｐhands."

"拆I'll do so 仇another 拆time," ゐ拆replied 路○Jack.

Now the юnext day, 路ゐ别Lazy 路○Jack юagain юwent out, and ｐ拆拣hired ｐヰюゐhimself to a 别baker, ｐwho would give ｐhim 仇nothing for ｐhis 火work 仇but a ゐ葛large tom-cat. 路○Jack took the cat, and began carrying it юvery 吼ゐcarefully in ｐhis ｐhands, 仇but in a 桂short 拆time pussy scratched ｐhim so ヰ仇much that ｐhe was ヰюゐcompelled to ゐюlet it go.

юWhen ｐhe got ｐ答home, ｐhis ヰ仇mother юsaid to ｐhim, "路You ゐsilly юゐfellow, you should ｐhave 拆tied it with a string, and dragged it ゐalong after you."

"拆I'll do so 仇another 拆time," юsaid 路○Jack.

So on the ゐ答following day, 路○Jack ｐ拆拣hired ｐヰюゐhimself to a butcher, ｐwho 桂rewarded ｐhim by the ｐhandsome юpresent of a 答ゐshoulder of ヰ仇mutton. 路○Jack took the ヰ仇mutton, 拆tied it with a string, and 别ゐtrailed it ゐalong after ｐhim in the 火dirt, so that by the 拆time ｐhe ｐhad got ｐ答home the ヰ梆meat was ヰゐ梆ゐcompletely 娥ゐspoilt. ｐHis ヰ仇mother was this 拆time 拆quite out of 别patience with ｐhim, for the юnext day was {Sunday} , and she was ゐ拆○obliged to do with cabbage for ｐher dinner.

"you {ninney} -ｐヰhammer," юsaid she to ｐher 仇son, "you should ｐhave carried it on your 答ゐshoulder."

"拆I'll do so 仇another 拆time," ゐ拆replied 路○Jack.

юWell, on the {Monday} , 路ゐ别Lazy 路○Jack юwent 仇once ヰmore and ｐ拆拣hired ｐヰюゐhimself to a cattle-梆keeper, ｐwho 别gave ｐhim a donkey for ｐhis 仇trouble. Now though 路○Jack was strong ｐhe found it ｐ葛hard to ｐ娥hoist the donkey on ｐhis 答ゐ拣shoulders, 仇but at ゐlast ｐhe did it, and began 佛walking ｐ答home ゐ答ゐslowly with ｐhis 拆prize. Now it so ｐhappened that in the 桂course of ｐhis ○火journey ｐhe passed a ｐhouse where a rich ヰman ゐlived with ｐhis 答ゐonly 佛daughter, a 筐beautiful 火girl, ｐwho was юdeaf and 仇dumb. And she ｐhad юnever ゐlaughed in ｐher ゐ拆life, and the 拣doctors юsaid she would юnever 梆speak till 仇ヰsomebody ヰ别made ｐher ゐlaugh. So the father ｐhad given out that юany ヰman ｐwho ヰ别made ｐher ゐlaugh would 梆receive ｐher ｐhand in ヰmarriage. Now this 仇young ゐ别lady ｐhappened to be ゐlooking out of the window юwhen 路○Jack was passing by with the donkey on ｐhis 答ゐ拣shoulders; and the poor 梆beast with its ゐюlegs sticking 仇up in the air was kicking 拆ゐゐviolently and {heehawing} with 佛all its ヰ拆might. юWell, the 拆sight was so ヰcomical that she 火burst out into a 别great fit of ゐlaughter, and ヰ梆攫ゐimmediately 仇拣recovered ｐher 梆speech and ｐ金hearing. ｐHer father was 答拣○娥overjoyed, and ゐゐfulfilled ｐhis ヰpromise by ヰmarrying ｐher to 路ゐ别Lazy 路○Jack, ｐwho was 仇thus ヰ别made a rich ○юゐヰgentleman. They ゐlived in a ゐ葛large ｐhouse, and 路○Jack's ヰ仇mother ゐlived with юthem in 别great ｐhappiness until she 拆died.

路○Jack 路The 路○拆Giant-路ゐKiller

I

юWhen good 路King 路葛Arthur 别reigned with {Guinevere} ｐhis 路梆Queen, there ゐlived, near the 路ゐLand 路юEnd in 路桂佛Cornwall, a 葛ヰfarmer ｐwho ｐhad 仇one 答ゐonly 仇son 佛ゐcalled 路○Jack. Now 路○Jack was brisk and юready; of 仇such a ゐ拆ゐlively wit that 仇none nor 仇nothing could 火worst ｐhim.

In 答those 别days, the 路ヰMount of 路St. 路ヰ拆Michael in 路桂佛Cornwall was the fastness of a {hugeous} ○拆giant ｐ叼whose 别name was {Cormoran} .

ｐHe was full 别梆eighteen 梆feet in ｐ拆height, 仇some three 葛yards about ｐhis ヰmiddle, of a grim 金fierce 别face, and ｐhe was the юterror of 佛all the 仇country-拆side. ｐHe ゐlived in a 别cave ヰamidst the rocky 路ヰMount, and юwhen ｐhe 拆拣desired ゐvictuals ｐhe would 别wade across the 拆tides to the ヰ别ゐmainland and 火furnish ｐヰюゐhimself 桂forth with 佛all that 别came in ｐhis way. The poor 答folk and the rich 答folk ゐ拆alike ran out of their ｐhouses and ｐhid ヰюゐthemselves юwhen they ｐ火heard the swish-swash of ｐhis big 梆feet in the 佛water; for if ｐhe saw юthem, ｐhe would think 仇nothing of 娥ゐbroiling ｐhalf-a-仇dozen or so of юthem for юbreakfast. As it was, ｐhe 梆seized their cattle by the score, carrying off ｐhalf-a-仇dozen fat oxen on ｐhis back at a 拆time, and ｐhanging 梆sheep and pigs to ｐhis {waistbelt} ゐ拆like 仇bunches of dip-ゐcandles. Now this ｐhad gone on for ゐlong 金years, and the poor 答folk of 路桂佛Cornwall were in despair, for 仇none could put an юend to the ○拆giant {Cormoran} .

It so ｐhappened that 仇one ヰ葛market day 路○Jack, юthen 拆quite a 仇young ゐlad, found the town 仇拆upside down 答over 仇some new юゐ娥exploit of the ○拆giant's. ヰWomen were 梆weeping, ヰюmen were 火cursing, and the ヰ○别magistrates were sitting in 路Council 答over what was to be 仇done. 仇But 仇none could ○юsuggest a ゐplan. юThen 路○Jack, ゐ拆blithe and gay, юwent 仇up to the ヰ○别magistrates, and with a 拆fine 火courtesy--for ｐhe was юever ゐ拆polite--asked юthem what 桂reward would be given to ｐhim ｐwho ゐkilled the ○拆giant {Cormoran} .

"the ю拣treasures of the 路○拆Giant 路别Cave," 答quoth they.

"юevery whit of it?" 答Quoth 路○Jack, ｐwho was юnever to be 仇done.

"to the ゐlast 葛farthing," 答quoth they.

"юthen will I 仇拣别undertake the task," юsaid 路○Jack, and 桂forthwith юset about the business.

It was winter-拆time, and ｐhaving got ｐヰюゐhimself a ｐ桂horn, a pickaxe, and a 仇shovel, ｐhe юwent 答over to the 路ヰMount in the 葛dark 梆evening, юset to 火work, and before 佛dawn ｐhe ｐhad 仇dug a pit, no ゐюless than юtwenty-two 梆feet 梆deep and nigh as big across. This ｐhe 仇拣covered with ゐlong thin sticks and straw, ゐsprinkling a ゐlittle ゐ叼loose ヰ答ゐmould 答over 佛all to ヰ别make it ゐlook ゐ拆like ゐsolid ground. So, ○仇just as 佛dawn was 别breaking, ｐhe ゐplanted ｐヰюゐhimself fair and square on the 拆side of the pit that was 葛farthest from the ○拆giant's 别cave, 别raised the ｐ桂horn to ｐhis ゐlips, and with full ゐblast sounded:

" {Tantivy} ! {Tantivy} ! {Tantivy} !"

○仇Just as ｐhe would ｐhave 仇done ｐhad ｐhe 梆been ｐ仇hunting a fox.

Of 桂course this 答woke the ○拆giant, ｐwho 仇rushed in a 别rage out of ｐhis 别cave, and 梆seeing ゐlittle 路○Jack, fair and square ゐ答blowing away at ｐhis ｐ桂horn, as calm and 叼cool as ヰmay be, ｐhe 别became still ヰmore angry, and ヰ别made for the 火disturber of ｐhis юrest, 佛ゐbawling out, "拆I'll 梆teach you to 别wake a ○拆giant, you ゐlittle {whipper} - {snapper} . You shall pay 金ゐdearly for your {tantivys} , 拆I'll 别take you and 娥broil you ｐ答whole for 别break--"

ｐHe ｐhad 答ゐonly got as far as this юwhen crash--ｐhe юfell into the pit! So there was a 别break 梆indeed; 仇such a 仇one that it 佛caused the юvery 别foundations of the 路ヰMount to 别shake.

仇But 路○Jack shook with ゐlaughter. "ｐho, ｐho!" ｐHe 拆cried, "ｐhow about юbreakfast now, 路Sir 路○拆Giant? 路Will you ｐhave ヰme 娥ゐbroiled or 别baked? And will no 拆diet 火serve you 仇but poor ゐlittle 路○Jack? 别Faith! 拆I've got you in 路ゐLob pound now! 筐You're in the stocks for bad ｐ别behaviour, and 拆I'll ゐ别plague you as I ゐ拆like. Would I ｐhad rotten юeggs; 仇but this will do as юwell." And with that ｐhe 仇up with ｐhis pickaxe and юゐdealt the ○拆giant {Cormoran} 仇such a ヰ答most 别weighty knock on the юvery crown of ｐhis ｐюhead, that ｐhe ゐkilled ｐhim on the spot.

吼Whereupon 路○Jack ヰゐcalmly ゐfilled 仇up the pit with 火earth юagain and юwent to 火search the 别cave, where ｐhe found ヰ仇much юtreasure.

Now юwhen the ヰ○别magistrates ｐ火heard of 路○Jack's 别great юゐ娥exploit, they ゐ别ヰproclaimed that ｐю桂henceforth ｐhe should be 答known as--

路○Jack the ○拆giant-ゐkiller.

And they юpresented ｐhim with a 桂sword and юゐbelt, on which 梆these 火words were ヰ娥拣embroidered in 答ゐgold:

ｐ金Here's the ゐ攫valiant {Cornishman} 路飧扳ｐWho ゐslew the ○拆giant {Cormoran} .

{II}

Of 桂course the 筐news of 路○Jack's 拣victory 叼soon юspread 答over 佛all 路ゐEngland, so that 仇another ○拆giant 别ヰnamed {Blunderbore} ｐwho ゐlived to the 桂north, ｐ金hearing of it, vowed if юever ｐhe 别came across 路○Jack ｐhe would be ю○revenged upon ｐhim. Now this ○拆giant {Blunderbore} was ゐ桂lord of an enchanted castle that stood in the ヰmiddle of a ゐ答lonesome forest.

It so ｐhappened that 路○Jack, about four ヰ仇months after ｐhe ｐhad ゐkilled {Cormoran} , ｐhad 别occasion to ○火journey into 路别ゐWales, and on the 答road ｐhe passed this forest. 金Weary with 佛walking, and 拆finding a ゐюpleasant fountain by the 别拆wayside, ｐhe ゐlay down to юrest and was 叼soon fast ゐ梆asleep.

Now the ○拆giant {Blunderbore} , 仇ヰcoming to the юwell for 佛water, found 路○Jack ゐ梆sleeping, and knew by the ゐ拆lines ヰ娥拣embroidered on ｐhis юゐbelt that ｐhere was the far-别ヰfamed ○拆giant-ゐkiller. ○娥Rejoiced at ｐhis ゐ仇luck, the ○拆giant, without ヰmore ado, ゐlifted 路○Jack to ｐhis 答ゐshoulder and began to carry ｐhim through the wood to the enchanted castle.

仇But the 仇ゐrustling of the boughs 别awakened 路○Jack, ｐwho, 拆finding ｐヰюゐhimself 佛ゐюalready in the ゐ仇clutches of the ○拆giant, was ю拆terrified; nor was ｐhis ゐ葛alarm 梆decreased by 梆seeing the 桂葛courtyard of the castle 佛all 叼strewn with ヰюmen's 答bones.

"桂yours will be with юthem ere ゐlong," юsaid {Blunderbore} as ｐhe ゐlocked poor 路○Jack into an ヰюimmense 别ヰchamber 仇above the castle 别gateway. It ｐhad a ｐhigh-pitched, 梆ヰbeamed 叼roof, and 仇one window that ゐlooked down the 答road. ｐHere poor 路○Jack was to stay 拆while {Blunderbore} юwent to юfetch ｐhis 仇brother-○拆giant, ｐwho ゐlived in the 别same wood, that ｐhe ヰ拆might share in the 梆feast.

Now, after a 拆time, 路○Jack, watching through the window, saw the two ○拆giants ヰtramping ｐ别ゐhastily down the 答road, 梆eager for their dinner.

"now," 答quoth 路○Jack to ｐヰюゐhimself, "ヰmy юdeath or ヰmy ゐ拣deliverance is at ｐhand." For ｐhe ｐhad 佛thought out a ゐplan. In 仇one 桂corner of the 叼room ｐhe ｐhad 梆seen two strong 桂cords. 梆These ｐhe took, and ヰ别making a 仇cunning 叼noose at the юend of 梆each, ｐhe ｐ仇hung юthem out of the window, and, as the ○拆giants were 仇ゐunlocking the 拆拣iron door of the 别gate, ヰ○managed to ゐslip юthem 答over their ｐюheads without their 答noticing it. юThen, quick as 佛thought, ｐhe 拆tied the 仇other юends to a 梆beam, so that as the ○拆giants ヰ叼moved on the 叼nooses 拆tightened and ゐthrottled юthem until they grew ゐblack in the 别face. 梆Seeing this, 路○Jack ゐslid down the 答ropes, and 佛drawing ｐhis 桂sword, ゐslew юthem 答both.

So, 别taking the 梆keys of the castle, ｐhe 仇ゐunlocked 佛all the 桂doors and юset free three 筐攫beauteous ゐ别ladies ｐwho, 拆tied by the ｐhair of their ｐюheads, ｐhe found 佛ゐヰ答almost 葛starved to юdeath. "梆sweet ゐ别ladies," 答quoth 路○Jack, 梆ゐkneeling on 仇one knee--for ｐhe was юever ゐ拆polite--"ｐhere are the 梆keys of this enchanted castle. I ｐhave 娥destroyed the ○拆giant {Blunderbore} and ｐhis 叼brutish 仇brother, and 仇thus ｐhave 桂restored to you your ゐ拣liberty. 梆These 梆keys should bring you 佛all юゐelse you 拆require."

So 别saying ｐhe 梆proceeded on ｐhis ○火journey to 路别ゐWales.

{III}

ｐHe ゐtravelled as fast as ｐhe could; 拣ｐperhaps too fast, for, ゐ叼losing ｐhis way, ｐhe found ｐヰюゐhimself 拆benighted and far from юany ｐ别habitation. ｐHe 拣wandered on 佛ゐ别always in ｐ答hopes, until on ю拣entering a narrow ゐvalley ｐhe 别came on a юvery ゐ葛large, 金dreary-ゐlooking ｐhouse standing ゐ答alone. 梆Being anxious for юゐshelter ｐhe юwent 仇up to the door and knocked. You ヰmay ヰ○imagine ｐhis 拣拆surprise and ゐ葛alarm юwhen the 仇ヰsummons was 拣answered by a ○拆giant with two ｐюheads. 仇But though this ヰ拣monster's ゐlook was 梆ゐexceedingly 金fierce, ｐhis ヰ拣manners were 拆quite ゐ拆polite; the 叼truth 梆being that ｐhe was a 路юゐWelsh ○拆giant, and as 仇such 仇double-别faced and ヰ叼smooth, given to 别gaining ｐhis ヰゐmalicious юends by a show of 佛ゐfalse юfriendship.

So ｐhe юゐヰwelcomed 路○Jack ｐ葛ゐheartily in a strong 路юゐWelsh accent, and 吼prepared a ю叼bedroom for ｐhim, where ｐhe was ゐюleft with 拆kind wishes for a good юrest. 路○Jack, ｐюhowever, was too 拆拣tired to ゐ梆sleep юwell, and as ｐhe ゐlay 别awake, ｐhe 答拣ｐ火overheard ｐhis ｐ答host ヰ仇拣muttering to ｐヰюゐhimself in the юnext 叼room. ｐHaving юvery 梆keen 金ears ｐhe was 别able to ヰ别make out 梆these 火words, or 仇ヰsomething ゐ拆like юthem:

"though ｐhere you ゐlodge with ヰme this 拆night, 路You shall not see the ヰ桂morning ゐ拆light. ヰMy ゐ仇club shall dash your 别brains 拆outright."

" {Say'st} thou so!" 答Quoth 路○Jack to ｐヰюゐhimself, 葛starting 仇up at 仇once, "路So that is your 路юゐWelsh trick, is it? 仇But I will be 梆even with you." юThen, ゐ梆leaving ｐhis юbed, ｐhe ゐ别laid a big ゐbillet of wood ヰ仇among the ゐblankets, and 别taking 仇one of 梆these to 梆keep ｐヰюゐhimself 桂warm, ヰ别made ｐヰюゐhimself 仇snug in a 桂corner of the 叼room, юpretending to snore, so as to ヰ别make 路ヰMr. ○拆Giant think ｐhe was ゐ梆asleep.

And sure 仇enough, after a ゐlittle 拆time, in 别came the ヰmonster on tiptoe as if юtreading on юeggs, and carrying a big ゐ仇club. юThen--

Whack! Whack! Whack!

路○Jack could ｐhear the юbed 梆being {belaboured} until the 路○拆Giant, thinking юevery 答bone of ｐhis юguest's skin ヰ仇must be 答broken, 答stole out of the 叼room юagain; 吼whereupon 路○Jack юwent ヰゐcalmly to юbed 仇once ヰmore and ゐюslept ゐsoundly! юNext ヰ桂morning the ○拆giant couldn't ゐ梆believe ｐhis 拆eyes юwhen ｐhe saw 路○Jack 仇ヰcoming down the 吼stairs юfresh and ｐ葛hearty.

"odds ゐ仇splutter {hur} 别ゐnails!" ｐHe 拆cried, astonished. "did she ゐ梆sleep юwell? Was there not 仇nothing юゐfelt in the 拆night?"

"oh," ゐ拆replied 路○Jack, ゐlaughing in ｐhis ゐ梆sleeve, "I think a rat did 仇come and give ヰme two or three ゐflaps of ｐhis 别tail."

仇Outdone. " {Hur} can do that {hurself} !" ]

On this the ○拆giant was {dumbfoundered} , and ゐюled 路○Jack to юbreakfast, bringing ｐhim a 答bowl which ｐюゐheld at ゐ梆least four ゐgallons of ｐ别hasty-pudding, and bidding ｐhim, as a ヰman of 仇such ヰюmettle, 梆eat the ゐlot. Now 路○Jack юwhen ゐtravelling wore 仇under ｐhis ゐ答cloak a ゐю拣leathern bag to carry ｐhis things 佛withal; so, quick as 佛thought, ｐhe ｐhitched this round in 仇front with the 答opening ○仇just 仇under ｐhis chin; 仇thus, as ｐhe 别ate, ｐhe could ゐslip the юbest 葛part of the pudding into it without the ○拆giant's 梆being юany the 拆wiser. So they 别sate down to юbreakfast, the ○拆giant ゐgobbling down ｐhis 答own ヰюmeasure of ｐ别hasty-pudding, 拆while 路○Jack ヰ别made away with ｐhis.

"see," юsays crafty 路○Jack юwhen ｐhe ｐhad finished. "拆I'll show you a trick 火worth two of 桂yours," and with that ｐhe 仇up with a 葛carving-拆knife and, ripping 仇up the ゐю拣leathern bag, out юfell 佛all the ｐ别hasty-pudding on the ゐfloor!

"odds ゐ仇splutter {hur} 别ゐnails!" 拆Cried the ○拆giant, not to be 仇outdone. " {Hur} can do that {hurself} !" 吼Whereupon ｐhe 梆seized the 葛carving-拆knife, and ripping 答open ｐhis 答own юゐbelly юfell down юdead.

仇Thus was 路○Jack quit of the 路юゐWelsh ○拆giant.

{IV}

Now it so ｐhappened that in 答those 别days, юwhen ゐgallant 拆knights were 佛ゐ别always 梆seeking ю拣adventures, 路King 路葛拣Arthur's 答ゐonly 仇son, a юvery ゐ攫valiant 路Prince, юbegged of ｐhis father a ゐ葛large 仇sum of ヰ仇money to 别enable ｐhim to ○火journey to 路别ゐWales, and there 拆strive to юset free a 火certain 筐beautiful ゐ别lady ｐwho was юpossessed by юseven 梆evil spirits. In 别vain the 路King 拆denied ｐhim; so at ゐlast ｐhe 别gave way and the 路Prince юset out with two ｐ桂horses, 仇one of which ｐhe 答rode, the 仇other ゐ别laden with 答ゐgold 梆pieces. Now after 仇some 别days's ○火journey the 路Prince 别came to a ヰ葛market-town in 路别ゐWales where there was a 别great ヰ答commotion. On asking the 梆reason for it ｐhe was 答ゐtold that, 桂according to ゐlaw, the 桂corpse of a юvery ○ю拣generous ヰman ｐhad 梆been 拣юarrested on its way to the 别grave, because, in ゐ拆life, it ｐhad 答owed ゐ葛large 仇ヰsums to the ヰ仇money-ゐю拣lenders.

"that is a 叼cruel ゐlaw," юsaid the 仇young 路Prince. "go, юbury the юdead in 梆peace, and ゐюlet the ю拣creditors 仇come to ヰmy ゐ○lodgings; I will pay the юdebts of the юdead."

So the ю拣creditors 别came, 仇but they were so 筐ヰ拣numerous that by 梆evening the 路Prince ｐhad 仇but 仇twopence ゐюleft for ｐヰюゐhimself, and could not go 火further on ｐhis ○火journey.

Now it so ｐhappened that 路○Jack the 路○拆Giant-路ゐKiller on ｐhis way to 路别ゐWales passed through the town, and, ｐ金hearing of the 路Prince ゐ拆plight, was so 别taken with ｐhis 拆kindness and ○ю拣generosity that ｐhe 火ヰdetermined to be the 路Prince 火servant. So this was 梆agreed upon, and юnext ヰ桂morning, after 路○Jack ｐhad 别paid the юreckoning with ｐhis ゐlast 葛farthing, the two юset out юtogether. 仇But as they were ゐ梆leaving the town, an 答ゐold ヰwoman ran after the 路Prince and 佛ゐcalled out, "路○仇Justice! ○仇Justice! And the 路Prince, 拆kind and ○ю拣generous, put ｐhis ｐhand to ｐhis pocket and 别gave the 答ゐold ヰwoman the 仇twopence that was ゐюleft to ｐhim. So now they ｐhad not a юpenny 梆between юthem, and юwhen the 仇sun grew ゐlow the 路Prince юsaid:

"nay," юsaid 路○Jack, ゐlaughing. "ゐюlet ヰme go and prepare the way for you. By 佛all accounts this ○拆giant is a 答ゐdolt. {Mayhap} I ヰmay ヰmanage юbetter than that."

So the 路Prince ヰ别remained where ｐhe was, and 路○Jack pricked ｐhis 梆steed at full 梆speed till ｐhe 别came to the ○拆giant's castle, at the 别gate of which ｐhe knocked so ゐloud that ｐhe ヰ别made the 别拣neighbouring ｐゐhills resound.

On this the ○拆giant 桂roared from within in a 娥voice ゐ拆like 仇thunder:

"ｐ叼who's there?"

юThen юsaid 路○Jack as 答ゐbold as brass, "路仇None 仇but your poor 仇cousin 路○Jack."

"仇cousin 路○Jack!" 答Quoth the ○拆giant, astounded. "and what 筐news with ヰmy poor 仇cousin 路○Jack?" For, see you, ｐhe was 拆quite 别taken aback; so 路○Jack ヰ别made ｐ别haste to 梆reassure ｐhim.

"ｐюheavy 筐news," ю答echoed the ○拆giant, ｐhalf 别afraid. "路God wot, no ｐюheavy 筐news can 仇come to ヰme. ｐHave I not three ｐюheads? Can I not 拆fight 拆five ｐ仇hundred ヰюmen in 葛ヰarmour? Can I not ヰ别make юthem ゐfly ゐ拆like chaff before the 拆wind?"

"ｐ拆hide 桂юゐyourself in the 佛ゐvault," юsays crafty 路○Jack, "and I will ゐlock and 答ゐbolt and bar you in; and 梆keep the key till the 路Prince ｐhas gone. So you will be 别safe."

This, ｐюhowever, did not satisfy our ｐ金hero, ｐwho was 叼soon on the 答road юagain 火searching for ○拆giants. 葛Dark 别cave]

On ｐ金hearing this 路○Jack 别straightway 仇ゐunlocked the door of the prison and юset the poor юゐ答fellows free. юThen, 火searching the ○拆giants' 拣coffers, ｐhe 拆divided the 答ゐgold and ゐsilver 梆ゐequally ヰ仇amongst the captives as 仇some юredress for their 仇拣sufferings, and 别taking юthem to a 别拣neighbouring castle 别gave юthem a 拆right good 梆feast.

{VI}

Now as they were 佛all ヰ别making ヰюmerry 答over their ゐ拣deliverance, and 别praising 路○Jack's юprowess, a ヰю○messenger 拣拆arrived to say that 仇one {Thunderdell} , a ｐ筐huge ○拆giant with two ｐюheads, ｐhaving ｐ火heard of the юdeath of ｐhis ヰkinsman, was on ｐhis way from the 桂拣northern 别ゐdales to be ю○revenged, and was 佛ゐюalready within a ヰ拆mile or two of the castle, the 仇country 答folk with their ゐflocks and ｐ火herds ゐ拆flying before ｐhim ゐ拆like chaff before the 拆wind.

Now the castle with its 葛gardens stood on a ヰ佛small 拆ゐisland that was 拣surrounded by a ヰ答moat юtwenty 梆feet 拆wide and 火thirty 梆feet 梆deep, ｐhaving юvery 梆steep 拆sides. This, without a ヰ答ヰmoment's ゐdelay, 路○Jack 桂拣ordered should be 佛sawn on 答both 拆sides at the ヰmiddle, so as to 答ゐonly ゐ梆leave 仇one ゐplank 仇仇uncut 答over which ｐhe in ｐhis invisible 答coat of 葛darkness passed ゐswiftly to ヰ梆meet ｐhis юヰenemy, 吼bearing in ｐhis ｐhand the 仇拣wonderful 桂sword of юstrength.

Now though the ○拆giant could not, of 桂course, see 路○Jack, ｐhe could ヰюsmell ｐhim, for ○拆giants ｐhave 梆keen 答noses. 吼Therefore {Thunderdell} 拆cried out in a 娥voice ゐ拆like ｐhis 别name:

"fee, {fi} , юfo, {fum} ! I ヰюsmell the ゐ仇blood of an 路ゐヰEnglishman. Be ｐhe ゐ拆alive, or be ｐhe юdead, 拆I'll 拆grind ｐhis 答bones to ヰ别make ヰmy юbread!"

拆Wind]

"is that so?" 答Quoth 路○Jack, 金cheerful as юever. "юthen 葛art thou a ヰmonstrous ヰゐmiller for sure!"

On this the ○拆giant, 金peering round юeverywhere for a ゐヰglimpse of ｐhis foe, shouted out:

"路葛Art thou, 梆indeed, the ゐvillain ｐwho ｐhath ゐkilled so ヰюmany of ヰmy ヰюkinsmen? юThen, 梆indeed, will I tear thee to 梆pieces with ヰmy 梆teeth, 仇suck thy ゐ仇blood, and 拆grind thy 答bones to powder."

" {Thou'lt} ｐhave to catch ヰme 火first," 答quoth 路○Jack, ゐlaughing, and 答throwing off ｐhis 答coat of 葛darkness and 仇putting on ｐhis ゐ拣slippers of swiftness, ｐhe began ヰゐnimbly to ゐ梆lead the ○拆giant a pretty dance, ｐhe ゐ梆leaping and 仇ゐdoubling ゐ拆light as a юfeather, the ヰmonster ゐ答following ｐюゐheavily ゐ拆like a 佛walking tower, so that the юvery 别foundations of the 火earth 梆ヰseemed to 别shake at юevery юstep. At this 别game the ゐ拣onlookers 金ゐnearly ゐsplit their 拆sides with ゐlaughter, until 路○Jack, ○仇○judging there ｐhad 梆been 仇enough of it, ヰ别made for the 佛drawbridge, ran 梆ゐneatly 答over the single ゐplank, and 梆reaching the 仇other 拆side 别waited in 梆teasing fashion for ｐhis 拣拣adversary.

On 别came the ○拆giant at full 梆speed, 答ヰfoaming at the ヰmouth with 别rage, and ゐ仇flourishing ｐhis ゐ仇club. 仇But юwhen ｐhe 别came to the ヰmiddle of the bridge ｐhis 别great 别weight, of 桂course, 答broke the ゐplank, and there ｐhe was 佛ゐfallen ｐюゐheadlong into the ヰ答moat, 答ゐrolling and ゐ答wallowing ゐ拆like a 别whale, ゐ仇○plunging from ゐ别place to ゐ别place, юyet 仇别unable to юget out and be ю○revenged.

The ю别拣spectators 梆greeted ｐhis ю拣efforts with 桂roars of ゐlaughter, and 路○Jack ｐヰюゐhimself was at 火first too 答拣仇overcome with ヰюヰmerriment to do ヰmore than scoff. At ゐlast, ｐюhowever, ｐhe юwent for a 答rope, cast it 答over the ○拆giant's two ｐюheads, so, with the ｐюゐhelp of a 梆team of ｐ桂horses, drew юthem {shorewards} , where two ゐ答blows from the 桂sword of юstrength юゐsettled the ヰmatter.

{VII}

After 仇some 拆time юspent in ヰ火mirth and 拆ヰpastimes, 路○Jack began 仇once ヰmore to grow юゐrestless, and 别taking ゐ梆leave of ｐhis ヰcompanions юset out for юfresh ю拣adventures.

ｐHe ゐtravelled far and fast, through woods, and 别ゐvales, and ｐゐhills, till at ゐlast ｐhe 别came, ゐ别late at 拆night, on a ゐ答lonesome ｐhouse юset at the foot of a ｐhigh ヰmountain. Knocking at the door, it was 答opened by an 答ゐold ヰman ｐ叼whose ｐюhead was 拆white as snow.

"father," юsaid 路○Jack, юever 火攫courteous, "can you ゐlodge a 拆benighted ゐtraveller?"

"ay, that will I, and юゐwelcome to ヰmy poor cottage," ゐ拆replied the 答ゐold ヰman.

吼Whereupon 路○Jack 别came in, and after 仇supper they 别sate юtogether chatting in юゐfriendly fashion. юThen it was that the 答ゐold ヰman, 梆seeing by 路○Jack's юゐbelt that ｐhe was the 别ヰfamous 路○拆Giant-路ゐKiller, 答spoke in this 拆wise:

"ヰmy 仇son! You are the 别great 拣conqueror of 梆evil ヰ拣monsters. Now ゐ答close by there ゐ拆lives 仇one юwell 火worthy of your юprowess. On the top of yonder ｐhigh ｐhill is an enchanted castle юkept by a ○拆giant 别ヰnamed {Galligantua} , ｐwho, by the ｐюゐhelp of a wicked 答ゐold ヰ○magician, {inveigles} ヰюmany 筐beautiful ゐ别ladies and ゐ攫valiant 拆knights into the castle, where they are 桂ヰtransformed into 佛all 桂sorts of 火birds and 梆beasts, yea, 梆even into fishes and юinsects. There they ゐ拆live {pitiably} in 拆ヰconfinement; 仇but ヰ答most of 佛all do I 梆grieve for a 筐duke's 佛daughter ｐ叼whom they kidnapped in ｐher 拣father's 葛garden, bringing ｐher ｐhither in a 火burning 攫chariot 佛drawn by 拆拣fiery dragons. ｐHer 桂form is that of a 拆white ｐ拆hind; and though ヰюmany ゐ攫valiant 拆knights ｐhave 拆tried their 仇ヰ答utmost to 别break the юspell and 火work ｐher ゐ拣deliverance, 仇none ｐhave 梆succeeded; for, see you, at the юentrance to the castle are two юdreadful griffins ｐwho destroy юevery 仇one ｐwho юヰattempts to pass юthem by."

Now 路○Jack 佛bethought ｐhim of the 答coat of 葛darkness which ｐhad 火served ｐhim so юwell before, and ｐhe put on the cap of ゐknowledge, and in an instant ｐhe knew what ｐhad to be 仇done. юThen the юvery юnext ヰ桂morning, at 佛dawn-拆time, 路○Jack 拣答arose and put on ｐhis invisible 答coat and ｐhis ゐ拣slippers of swiftness. And in the ゐtwinkling of an eye there ｐhe was on the top of the ヰmountain! And there were the two griffins 葛guarding the castle 别gates--ｐhorrible 梆拣creatures with 桂forked 别ゐtails and 仇tongues. 仇But they could not see ｐhim because of the 答coat of 葛darkness, so ｐhe passed юthem by 仇ｐ葛ヰunharmed.

And ｐ仇hung to the 桂doors of the 别gateway ｐhe found a 答ゐgolden 仇ヰtrumpet on a ゐsilver 别chain, and 梆beneath it was 别engraved in юred ゐю拣lettering:

ｐ叼юWhoever shall this 仇ヰtrumpet ゐblow 路Will 佛cause the ○拆giant's 答拣overthrow. The ゐblack ヰenchantment ｐhe will 别break, 路And ゐgladness out of sadness ヰ别make.

No 叼sooner ｐhad 路○Jack 梆read 梆these 火words than ｐhe put the ｐ桂horn to ｐhis ゐlips and ゐblew a ゐloud

" {Tantivy} ! {Tantivy} ! {Tantivy} !"

Now at the юvery 火first 答note the castle юヰゐtrembled to its vast 别foundations, and before ｐhe ｐhad finished the ヰюmeasure, 答both the ○拆giant and the ヰ○magician were 拆biting their 仇ヰthumbs and 吼tearing their ｐhair, 答knowing that their wickedness ヰ仇must now 仇come to an юend. 仇But the ○拆giant 答showed 拆fight and took 仇up ｐhis ゐ仇club to юdefend ｐヰюゐhimself; 吼whereupon 路○Jack, with 仇one ゐ梆clean 仇cut of the 桂sword of юstrength, ю拣severed ｐhis ｐюhead from ｐhis body, and would ゐdoubtless ｐhave 仇done the 别same to the ヰ○magician, 仇but that the ゐlatter was a 拣coward, and, 佛ゐcalling 仇up a 火ゐwhirlwind, was юswept away by it into the air, nor ｐhas ｐhe юever 梆been 梆seen or ｐ火heard of since. The ヰenchantments 梆being 仇thus 答broken, 佛all the ゐ攫valiant 拆knights and 筐beautiful ゐ别ladies, ｐwho ｐhad 梆been 桂ヰtransformed into 火birds and 梆beasts and fishes and ю拆ゐreptiles and юinsects, 火returned to their proper 别shapes, ゐ叼including the 筐duke's 佛daughter, ｐwho, from 梆being a 拆white ｐ拆hind, 答showed as the ヰ答most 筐攫beauteous ヰ别maiden upon ｐ叼whom the 仇sun юever shone. Now, no 叼sooner ｐhad this 火occurred than the ｐ答whole castle vanished away in a ゐcloud of ヰ答smoke, and from that ヰ答ヰmoment ○拆giants vanished 佛ゐalso from the ゐland.

桂Transform the 筐duke's 佛daughter into a 拆white ｐ拆hind]

So 路○Jack, юwhen ｐhe ｐhad юpresented the ｐюhead of {Galligantua} to 路King 路葛Arthur, юtogether with 佛all the ゐ桂lords and ゐ别ladies ｐhe ｐhad ゐ拣delivered from ヰenchantment, found ｐhe ｐhad 仇nothing ヰmore to do. As a 桂reward for past 火services, ｐюhowever, 路King 路葛Arthur 答bestowed the ｐhand of the 筐duke's 佛daughter upon honest 路○Jack the 路○拆Giant-路ゐKiller. So ヰmarried they were, and the ｐ答whole kingdom was ゐfilled with ○joy at their юwedding. 火拣ヰFurthermore, the 路King 答bestowed on 路○Jack a 答noble castle with a ヰmagnificent 别estate ゐbelonging 吼thereto, 吼whereon ｐhe, ｐhis ゐ别lady, and their ゐchildren ゐlived in 别great ○joy and юcontent for the юrest of their 别days.

The three ゐsillies

仇Once upon a 拆time, юwhen 答folk were not so 拆wise as they are 别nowadays, there ゐlived a 葛ヰfarmer and ｐhis 拆wife ｐwho ｐhad 仇one 佛daughter. And she, 梆being a pretty ゐlass, was 桂courted by the 仇young 拆squire юwhen ｐhe 别came ｐ答home from ｐhis ゐtravels.

Now юevery 梆evening ｐhe would 答stroll 答over from the 路ｐ佛Hall to see ｐher and stop to 仇supper in the 葛farm-ｐhouse, and юevery 梆evening the 佛daughter would go down into the юゐcellar to draw the 拆cider for 仇supper.

So 仇one 梆evening юwhen she ｐhad gone down to draw the 拆cider and ｐhad 火turned the tap as 筐usual, she ｐhappened to ゐlook 仇up at the 梆ゐceiling, and there she saw a big wooden ヰゐmallet 仇stuck in 仇one of the 梆ヰbeams.

It ヰ仇must ｐhave 梆been there for 别○ages and 别○ages, for it was 佛all 仇拣covered with юcobwebs; 仇but 仇ヰｐsomehow or 仇another she ｐhad юnever 答noticed it before, and at 仇once she began thinking ｐhow 别○拣dangerous it was to ｐhave the ヰゐmallet ○仇just there.

"for," 佛thought she, "答supposing ｐhim and ヰme was ヰmarried, and 答supposing we was to ｐhave a 仇son, and 答supposing ｐhe were to grow 仇up to be a ヰman, and 答supposing ｐhe were to 仇come down to draw 拆cider ゐ拆like as 拆I'm 叼doing, and 答supposing the ヰゐmallet were to 佛fall on ｐhis ｐюhead and kill ｐhim, ｐhow юdreadful it would be!"

And with that she put down the candle she was carrying and, 梆seating ｐ火юゐherself on a cask, began to cry. And she 拆cried and 拆cried and 拆cried.

Now, 仇吼upstairs, they began to 仇wonder why she was so ゐlong 佛drawing the 拆cider; so after a 拆time ｐher ヰ仇mother юwent down to the юゐcellar to see what ｐhad 仇come to ｐher, and found ｐher, 梆seated on the cask, 拆crying юever so ｐ葛hard, and the 拆cider 仇running 佛all 答over the ゐfloor.

" {Lawks} a ヰ火mercy ヰme!" 拆Cried ｐher ヰ仇mother, "юwhatever is the ヰmatter?"

"o ヰ仇mother!" юSays she 梆between ｐher sobs, "it's that ｐhorrid ヰゐmallet. 答Supposing ｐhim and ヰme was ヰmarried, and 答supposing we was to ｐhave a 仇son, and 答supposing ｐhe was to grow 仇up to be a ヰman, and 答supposing ｐhe was to 仇come down to draw 拆cider ゐ拆like as 拆I'm 叼doing, and 答supposing the ヰゐmallet were to 佛fall on ｐhis ｐюhead and kill ｐhim, ｐhow юdreadful it would be!"

"dear ｐ葛heart!" юSaid the ヰ仇mother, 梆seating ｐ火юゐherself 拆beside ｐher 佛daughter and beginning to cry: "ｐhow юdreadful it would be!"

So they 答both 拣sat a-拆crying.

Now after a 拆time, юwhen they did not 仇come back, the 葛ヰfarmer began to 仇wonder what ｐhad ｐhappened, and 答going down to the юゐcellar found юthem 梆seated 拆side by 拆side on the cask, 拆crying ｐ葛hard, and the 拆cider 仇running 佛all 答over the ゐfloor.

" {Zounds} !" юSays ｐhe, "юwhatever is the ヰmatter?"

"○仇just ゐlook at that ｐhorrid ヰゐmallet 仇up there, father," ヰ答moaned the ヰ仇mother. "答supposing our 佛daughter was to ヰmarry ｐher 梆ｐ葛sweetheart, and 答supposing they was to ｐhave a 仇son, and 答supposing ｐhe was to grow to ヰman's 别estate, and 答supposing ｐhe was to 仇come down to draw 拆cider ゐ拆like as 梆we're 叼doing, and 答supposing that there ヰゐmallet was to 佛fall on ｐhis ｐюhead and kill ｐhim, ｐhow юdreadful it would be!"

"юdreadful 梆indeed!" юSaid the father and, 梆seating ｐヰюゐhimself 拆beside ｐhis 拆wife and 佛daughter, 葛started a-拆crying too.

Now 仇吼upstairs the 仇young 拆squire wanted ｐhis 仇supper; so at ゐlast ｐhe ゐlost 别patience and юwent down into the юゐcellar to see for ｐヰюゐhimself what they were 佛all after. And there ｐhe found юthem 梆seated 拆side by 拆side on the cask a-拆crying, with their 梆feet 佛all a-wash in 拆cider, for the ゐfloor was fair ゐ仇flooded. So the 火first thing ｐhe did was to 仇run 别straight and 火turn off the tap. юThen ｐhe юsaid:

"what are you three after, sitting there 拆crying ゐ拆like 别babies, and ゐюletting good 拆cider 仇run 答over the ゐfloor?"

юThen they 佛all three began with 仇one 娥voice, "路ゐLook at that ｐhorrid ヰゐmallet! 答Supposing you and ヰme/she was ヰmarried, and 答supposing we/you ｐhad a 仇son, and 答supposing ｐhe was to grow to ヰman's 别estate, and 答supposing ｐhe was to 仇come down ｐhere to draw 拆cider ゐ拆like as we be, and 答supposing that there ヰゐmallet was to 佛fall down on ｐhis ｐюhead and kill ｐhim, ｐhow юdreadful it would be!"

юThen the 仇young 拆squire 火burst out a-ゐlaughing, and ゐlaughed till ｐhe was 拆拣tired. 仇But at ゐlast ｐhe 梆reached 仇up to the 答ゐold ヰゐmallet and ゐpulled it out, and put it 别safe on the ゐfloor. And ｐhe shook ｐhis ｐюhead and юsaid, "拆I've ゐtravelled far and 拆I've ゐtravelled fast, 仇but юnever ｐhave I ヰюmet with three 仇such ゐsillies as you three. Now I can't ヰmarry 仇one of the three biggest ゐsillies in the 火ゐworld. So I shall 葛start юagain on ヰmy ゐtravels, and if I can 拆find three bigger ゐsillies than you three, юthen 拆I'll 仇come back and be ヰmarried--not 仇拣拆otherwise."

So ｐhe wished юthem good-bye and 葛started юagain on ｐhis ゐtravels, ゐ梆leaving юthem 佛all 拆crying; this 拆time because the ヰmarriage was off!

юWell, the 仇young ヰman ゐtravelled far and ｐhe ゐtravelled fast, 仇but юnever did ｐhe 拆find a bigger ゐsilly, until 仇one day ｐhe 别came upon an 答ゐold ヰwoman's cottage that ｐhad 仇some grass 答growing on the thatched 叼roof.

And the 答ゐold ヰwoman was 拆trying ｐher юbest to 仇○cudgel ｐher cow into 答going 仇up a ゐladder to 梆eat the grass. 仇But the poor thing was 别afraid and 火durst not go. юThen the 答ゐold ヰwoman 拆tried 答coaxing, 仇but it wouldn't go. You юnever saw 仇such a 拆sight! The cow юgetting ヰmore and ヰmore ゐ仇拣flustered and obstinate, the 答ゐold ヰwoman юgetting ｐhotter and ｐhotter.

At ゐlast the 仇young 拆squire юsaid, "路It would be 梆easier if you_ юwent 仇up the ゐladder, 仇cut the grass, and threw it down for the cow to 梆eat."

"a ゐ拆ゐlikely 桂story that," юsays the 答ゐold ヰwoman. "a cow can 仇cut grass for ｐ火юゐherself. And the 叼ゐfoolish thing will be 拆quite 别safe 仇up there, for 拆I'll tie a 答rope round ｐher юneck, pass the 答rope down the ヰchimney, and fasten {t'other} юend to ヰmy wrist, so as юwhen 拆I'm 叼doing ヰmy bit 答o's washing, she can't 佛fall off the 叼roof without ヰmy 答knowing it. So ヰ拆mind your 答own business, 仇young sir."

юWell, after a 拆while the 答ゐold ヰwoman 答coaxed and {codgered} and ゐbullied and ○拣badgered the cow 仇up the ゐladder, and юwhen she got it on to the 叼roof she 拆tied a 答rope round its юneck, passed the 答rope down the ヰchimney, and fastened {t'other} юend to ｐher wrist. юThen she юwent about ｐher bit of washing, and 仇young 拆squire ｐhe юwent on ｐhis way.

仇But ｐhe ｐhadn't gone 仇but a bit юwhen ｐhe ｐ火heard the {awfullest} ｐ仇ゐゐhullabaloo. ｐHe ゐgalloped back, and found that the cow ｐhad 佛ゐfallen off the 叼roof and got ゐstrangled by the 答rope round its юneck, 拆while the 别weight of the cow ｐhad ゐpulled the 答ゐold ヰwoman by ｐher wrist 仇up the ヰchimney, where she ｐhad got 仇stuck ｐhalf-way and 梆been ヰ仇拣smothered by the soot!

"that is 仇one bigger ゐsilly," 答quoth the 仇young 拆squire as ｐhe ○火journeyed on. "so now for two ヰmore!"

ｐHe did not 拆find юany, ｐюhowever, till ゐ别late 仇one 拆night ｐhe 拣拆arrived at a ゐlittle inn. And the inn was so full that ｐhe ｐhad to share a 叼room with 仇another ゐtraveller. Now ｐhis 叼room-юゐfellow 叼proved 拆quite a ゐюpleasant юゐfellow, and they {forgathered} , and 梆each ゐюslept юwell in ｐhis юbed.

仇But юnext ヰ桂morning, юwhen they were юdressing, what 答does the 别○stranger do 仇but 吼ゐcarefully ｐhang ｐhis 梆breeches on the knobs of the 佛ゐtallboy!

"what are you 叼doing?" Asks 仇young 拆squire.

"拆I'm 仇putting on ヰmy 梆breeches," юsays the 别○stranger; and with that ｐhe 答goes to the 仇other юend of the 叼room, 别takes a ゐlittle 仇run, and 拆tried to ○仇ヰjump into the 梆breeches.

仇But ｐhe didn't 梆succeed, so ｐhe took 仇another 仇run and 仇another try, and 仇another and 仇another and 仇another, until ｐhe got 拆quite ｐhot and ゐ仇拣flustered, as the 答ゐold ヰwoman ｐhad got 答over ｐher cow that wouldn't go 仇up the ゐladder. And 佛all the 拆time 仇young 拆squire was ゐlaughing fit to ゐsplit, for юnever in ｐhis ゐ拆life did ｐhe see юanything so ヰcomical.

юThen the 别○stranger stopped a 拆while and ヰmopped ｐhis 别face with ｐhis ｐ拣handkerchief, for ｐhe was 佛all in a юsweat. "it's юvery юwell ゐlaughing," юsays ｐhe, "仇but 梆breeches are the ヰ答most {awkwardest} things to юget into that юever were. It 别takes ヰme the юbest 葛part of an hour юevery ヰ桂morning before I юget юthem on. ｐHow do you ヰmanage 桂yours?"

юThen 仇young 拆squire 答showed ｐhim, as юwell as ｐhe could for ゐlaughing, ｐhow to put on ｐhis 梆breeches, and the 别○stranger was юever so 别grateful and юsaid ｐhe юnever should ｐhave 佛thought of that way.

"so that," 答quoth 仇young 拆squire to ｐヰюゐhimself, "is a юsecond bigger ゐsilly." 仇But ｐhe ゐtravelled far and ｐhe ゐtravelled fast without 拆finding the 火third, until 仇one 拆bright 拆night юwhen the ヰ叼moon was 拆shining 拆right 答拣ｐюoverhead ｐhe 别came upon a ゐvillage. And 拆outside the ゐvillage was a pond, and round about the pond was a 别great crowd of ゐ○拣villagers. And 仇some ｐhad got 别rakes, and 仇some ｐhad got 桂pitchforks, and 仇some ｐhad got 叼ヰbrooms. And they were as busy as busy, shouting out, and 别raking, and 桂forking, and 梆sweeping away at the pond.

"what is the ヰmatter?" 拆Cried 仇young 拆squire, ○仇ヰjumping off ｐhis ｐ桂horse to ｐюゐhelp. "ｐhas юany 仇one 佛ゐfallen in?"

"aye! ヰMatter 仇enough," юsays they. "can't'eesee ヰ叼moon's 佛ゐfallen into the pond, an's we can't юget ｐher out 答ｐnohow."

And with that they юset to юagain 别raking, and 桂forking, and 梆sweeping away. юThen the 仇young 拆squire 火burst out ゐlaughing, 答ゐtold юthem they were 叼ゐfools for their 别pains, and bade юthem ゐlook 仇up 答over their ｐюheads where the ヰ叼moon was 拆riding 佛broad and full. 仇But they wouldn't, and they wouldn't ゐ梆believe that what they saw in the 佛water was 答ゐonly a ゐюreflection. And юwhen ｐhe insisted they began to 筐abuse ｐhim ゐroundly and юthreaten to 仇duck ｐhim in the pond. So ｐhe got on ｐhis ｐ桂horse юagain as ゐquickly as ｐhe could, ゐ梆leaving юthem 别raking, and 桂forking, and 梆sweeping away; and for 佛all we know they ヰmay be at it юyet!

仇But the 仇young 拆squire юsaid to ｐヰюゐhimself, "路There are ヰюmany ヰmore ゐsillies in this 火ゐworld than I 佛thought for; so 拆I'll ○仇just go back and ヰmarry the 葛ヰ拣farmer's 佛daughter. She is no ゐsillier than the юrest."

So they were ヰmarried, and if they didn't ゐ拆live ｐhappy юever after, that ｐhas 仇nothing to do with the 桂story of the three ゐsillies.

The 答ゐgolden 佛ball

仇Once upon a 拆time there ゐlived two ゐlasses, ｐwho were 拣sisters, and as they 别came from the fair they saw a 拆right ｐhandsome 仇young ヰman standing at a ｐhouse door before юthem. They ｐhad юnever 梆seen 仇such a ｐhandsome 仇young ヰman before. ｐHe ｐhad 答ゐgold on ｐhis cap, 答ゐgold on ｐhis finger, 答ゐgold on ｐhis юneck, 答ゐgold at ｐhis 别waist! And ｐhe ｐhad a 答ゐgolden 佛ball in 梆each ｐhand. ｐHe 别gave a 佛ball to 梆each ゐlass, 别saying she was to 梆keep it; 仇but if she ゐlost it, she was to be ｐhanged.

Now the 仇youngest of the ゐlasses ゐlost ｐher 佛ball, and this is ｐhow. She was by a 葛park 别ゐpaling, and she was tossing ｐher 佛ball, and it юwent 仇up, and 仇up, and 仇up, till it юwent fair 答over the 别ゐpaling; and юwhen she ゐ拆ヰclimbed to ゐlook for it, the 佛ball ran ゐalong the 梆green grass, and it ran 拆right 桂拣forward to the door of a ｐhouse that stood there, and the 佛ball юwent into the ｐhouse and she saw it no ヰmore.

So she was 别taken away to be ｐhanged by the юneck till she was юdead, because she ｐhad ゐlost ｐher 佛ball.

仇But the ゐlass ｐhad a 梆ｐ葛sweetheart, and ｐhe юsaid ｐhe would go and юget the 佛ball. So ｐhe юwent to the 葛park 别gate, 仇but'twas仇shut; юthen ｐhe ゐ拆ヰclimbed the 别ゐrailing, and юwhen ｐhe got to the top of it an 答ゐold ヰwoman 答rose 仇up out of the ditch before ｐhim and юsaid that if ｐhe wanted to юget the 佛ball ｐhe ヰ仇must ゐ梆sleep three 拆nights in the ｐhouse: So ｐhe юsaid ｐhe would.

юWell! юWhen it was 梆evening, ｐhe юwent into the ｐhouse, and ゐlooked юeverywhere for the 佛ball, 仇but ｐhe could not 拆find it, nor юany 仇one in the ｐhouse at 佛all; 仇but юwhen 拆night 别came on ｐhe 佛thought ｐhe ｐ火heard {bogles} ヰ叼moving about in the 桂葛courtyard; so ｐhe ゐlooked out 答o's window, and, sure 仇enough, the 葛yard was full of юthem!

юゐPresently ｐhe ｐ火heard юsteps 仇ヰcoming 仇吼upstairs, so ｐhe ｐhid ｐ拆behind the door, and was as still as a ヰmouse. юThen in 别came a big ○拆giant 拆five 拆ヰtimes as 佛tall as the ゐlad, and ゐlooked 拣around; 仇but 梆seeing 仇nothing ｐhe юwent to the window and 答bowed ｐヰюゐhimself to ゐlook out; and as ｐhe 答bowed on ｐhis юゐ答elbows to see the {bogles} in the 葛yard, the ゐlad юstepped ｐ拆behind ｐhim, and with 仇one ゐblow of ｐhis 桂sword ｐhe 仇cut ｐhim in 别twain, so that the top 葛part of ｐhim юfell in the 葛yard, and the bottom 葛part ヰ别remained standing ゐlooking out of the window.

юWell! There was a 别great cry from the {bogles} юwhen they saw ｐhalf the ○拆giant 仇come 仇ヰゐtumbling down to юthem, and they 佛ゐcalled out, "路There 仇ヰcomes ｐhalf our ヰmaster; give 仇us the 仇other ｐhalf."

юThen the ゐlad юsaid, "路It's no 筐use of thee, thou pair of ゐюlegs, standing ゐ答alone at the window, as thou ｐhast no eye to see with, so go ○娥join thy 仇brother"; and ｐhe cast the ゐ答lower 葛part of the ○拆giant after the top 葛part. Now юwhen the {bogles} ｐhad gotten 佛all the ○拆giant they were 拆quiet.

юNext 拆night the ゐlad юwent to ゐ梆sleep in the ｐhouse юagain, and this 拆time a юsecond ○拆giant 别came in at the door, and as ｐhe 别came in the ゐlad 仇cut ｐhim in 别twain; 仇but the ゐюlegs 佛walked on to the 拆fire and юwent 别straight 仇up the ヰchimney.

"go, юget thee after thy ゐюlegs," юsaid the ゐlad to the ｐюhead, and ｐhe cast the 仇other ｐhalf of the ○拆giant 仇up the ヰchimney.

Now the 火third 拆night 仇nothing ｐhappened, so the ゐlad got into юbed; 仇but before ｐhe юwent to ゐ梆sleep ｐhe ｐ火heard the {bogles} 拆striving 仇under the юbed, and ｐhe 仇拣wondered what they were at. So ｐhe 梆peeped, and saw that they ｐhad the 佛ball there, and were ゐ别playing with it, casting it to and fro.

Now after a 拆time 仇one of юthem 仇thrust ｐhis ゐюleg out from 仇under the юbed, and quick as юanything the ゐlad brings ｐhis 桂sword down, and 仇cuts it off. юThen 仇another {bogle} 仇thrust ｐhis 葛arm out at {t'other} 拆side of the юbed, and in a ゐtwinkling the ゐlad 仇cuts that off too. So it юwent on, till at ゐlast ｐhe ｐhad ヰ别ヰmaimed юthem 佛all, and they 佛all юwent off, 拆crying and 别ゐwailing, and 拣forgot the 佛ball! юThen the ゐlad got out of юbed, found the 佛ball, and юwent off at 仇once to 梆seek ｐhis true ゐ仇love.

Now the ゐlass ｐhad 梆been 别taken to 路桂York to be ｐhanged; she was 佛brought out on the 答ゐscaffold, and the ｐヰhangman юsaid, "路Now, ゐlass, thou ヰ仇must ｐhang by the юneck till thou {be'st} юdead." 仇But she 拆cried out:

"stop, stop, I think I see ヰmy ヰ仇mother 仇ヰcoming! O ヰ仇mother, ｐhast thou 佛brought ヰmy 答ゐgolden 佛ball 路And 仇come to юset ヰme free?"

And the ヰ仇mother 拣answered:

"拆I've 拆neither 佛brought thy 答ゐgolden 佛ball 路Nor 仇come to юset thee free, 路仇But I ｐhave 仇come to see thee ｐ仇hung 路Upon this ゐ答gallows-tree."

юThen the ｐヰhangman юsaid, "路Now, ゐlass, say thy 吼prayers for thou ヰ仇must die." 仇But she юsaid:

"stop, stop, I think I see ヰmy father 仇ヰcoming! O father, ｐhast thou 佛brought ヰmy 答ゐgolden 佛ball 路And 仇come to юset ヰme free?"

And the father 拣answered:

"拆I've 拆neither 佛brought thy 答ゐgolden 佛ball 路Nor 仇come to юset thee free, 路仇But I ｐhave 仇come to see thee ｐ仇hung 路Upon this ゐ答gallows-tree."

юThen the ｐヰhangman юsaid, "路ｐHast thee 仇done thy 吼prayers? Now, ゐlass, put thy ｐюhead into the 叼noose."

仇But she 拣answered, "路Stop, stop, I think I see ヰmy 仇brother 仇ヰcoming!" And юagain she sang ｐher ゐlittle 火verse, and the 仇brother sang back the 别same 火words. And so with ｐher sister, ｐher 仇uncle, ｐher aunt, and ｐher 仇cousin. 仇But they 佛all юsaid the 别same:

"拆I've 拆neither 佛brought thy 答ゐgolden 佛ball 路Nor 仇come to юset thee free, 路仇But I ｐhave 仇come to see thee ｐ仇hung 路Upon this ゐ答gallows-tree."

юThen the ｐヰhangman юsaid, "I will stop no ゐlonger, {thou'rt} ヰ别making 别game of ヰme. Thou ヰ仇must be ｐ仇hung at 仇once."

仇But now, at ゐlong ゐlast, she saw ｐher 梆ｐ葛sweetheart 仇ヰcoming through the crowd, so she 拆cried to ｐhim:

"stop, stop, I see ヰmy 梆ｐ葛sweetheart 仇ヰcoming! 梆ｐ葛Sweetheart, ｐhast thou 佛brought ヰmy 答ゐgolden 佛ball 路And 仇come to юset ヰme free?"

юThen ｐher 梆ｐ葛sweetheart ｐюゐheld 仇up ｐher 答ゐgolden 佛ball and 拆cried:
