So ｐhe took ｐher ｐ答home, юthen and there, and they ゐlived ｐhappy юever after.

The two 拣sisters

仇Once upon a 拆time there were two 拣sisters ｐwho were as ゐ拆like 梆each 仇other as two 梆peas in a pod; 仇but 仇one was good, and the 仇other was bad-юヰ拣tempered. Now their father ｐhad no 火work, so the 火ゐgirls began to think of 答going to 火service.

"I will go 火first and see what I can ヰ别make of it," юsaid the 仇younger sister, юever so 金ゐcheerfully, "юthen you, {sis} , can ゐfollow if I ｐhave good ゐ仇luck."

So she packed 仇up a 仇bundle, юsaid good-bye, and 葛started to 拆find a ゐ别place; 仇but no 仇one in the town wanted a 火girl, and she юwent 葛farther 梆ゐafield into the 仇country. And as she ○火journeyed she 别came upon an 仇oven in which a ゐlot of ゐ答loaves were 别baking. Now as she passed, the ゐ答loaves 拆cried out with 仇one 娥voice:

"ゐlittle 火girl! ゐLittle 火girl! 别Take 仇us out! ゐ梆Please 别take 仇us out! We ｐhave 梆been 别baking for юseven 金years, and no 仇one ｐhas 仇come to 别take 仇us out. Do 别take 仇us out or we shall 叼soon be 火burnt!"

юThen, 梆being a 拆kind, ゐ拆○obliging ゐlittle 火girl, she stopped, put down ｐher 仇bundle, took out the юbread, and юwent on ｐher way 别saying:

"you will be ヰmore 仇ヰ拣comfortable now."

After a 拆time she 别came to a cow ゐ答lowing 拆beside an юヰempty 别pail, and the cow юsaid to ｐher:

"ゐlittle 火girl! ゐLittle 火girl! ヰゐMilk ヰme! ゐ梆Please ヰゐmilk ヰme! юSeven 金years ｐhave I 梆been 别waiting, 仇but no 仇one ｐhas 仇come to ヰゐmilk ヰme!"

So the 拆kind 火girl stopped, put down ｐher 仇bundle, ヰゐmilked the cow into the 别pail, and юwent on ｐher way 别saying:

"now you will be ヰmore 仇ヰ拣comfortable."

By and by she 别came to an apple tree so ゐ别laden with 叼fruit that its branches were nigh to 别break, and the apple tree 佛ゐcalled to ｐher:

"ゐlittle 火girl! ゐLittle 火girl! ゐ梆Please 别shake ヰmy branches. The 叼fruit is so ｐюheavy I can't stand 别straight!"

юThen the 拆kind 火girl stopped, put down ｐher 仇bundle, and shook the branches so that the ゐapples юfell off, and the tree could stand 别straight. юThen she юwent on ｐher way 别saying:

"you will be ヰmore 仇ヰ拣comfortable now."

So she ○火journeyed on till she 别came to a ｐhouse where an 答ゐold witch-ヰwoman ゐlived. Now this witch-ヰwoman wanted a 火servant-ヰ别maid, and ヰpromised good 别○wages. 吼Therefore the 火girl 梆agreed to stop with ｐher and try ｐhow she ゐ拆liked 火service. She ｐhad to 梆sweep the ゐfloor, 梆keep the ｐhouse ゐ梆clean and 拆tidy, the 拆fire 拆bright and 金cheery. 仇But there was 仇one thing the witch-ヰwoman юsaid she ヰ仇must юnever do; and that was ゐlook 仇up the ヰchimney!

ゐLittle ヰ别maid?" ]

"if you do," юsaid the witch-ヰwoman, "仇ヰsomething will 佛fall down on you, and you will 仇come to a bad юend." юWell! The 火girl юswept, and 仇dusted, and ヰ别made 仇up the 拆fire; 仇but ne'er a юpenny of 别○wages did she see. Now the 火girl wanted to go ｐ答home as she did not ゐ拆like witch-火service; for the witch 筐used to ｐhave 娥ゐboiled 别babies for 仇supper, and юbury the 答bones 仇under 仇some 答stones in the 葛garden. 仇But she did not ゐ拆like to go ｐ答home юゐpenniless; so she 别stayed on, 梆sweeping, and 仇dusting, and 叼doing ｐher 火work, ○仇just as if she was ゐ梆pleased. юThen 仇one day, as she was 梆sweeping 仇up the ｐ葛hearth, down 仇ヰゐtumbled 仇some soot, and, without ヰюヰ拣remembering she was 拣forbidden to ゐlook 仇up the ヰchimney, she ゐlooked 仇up to see where the soot 别came from. And, ゐlo and ｐ答ゐbehold! A big bag of 答ゐgold юfell ゐ仇ヰplump into ｐher ゐlap.

Now the witch ｐhappened to be out on 仇one of ｐher witch юerrands; so the 火girl 佛thought it a 拆fine 拣筐opportunity to be off ｐ答home.

So she {kilted} 仇up ｐher ю答petticoats and 葛started to 仇run ｐ答home; 仇but she ｐhad 答ゐonly gone a ゐlittle way юwhen she ｐ火heard the witch-ヰwoman 仇ヰcoming after ｐher on ｐher 叼ヰbroomstick. Now the apple tree she ｐhad ｐюゐhelped to stand 别straight ｐhappened to be 拆quite ゐ答close; so she ran to it and 拆cried:

"apple tree! Apple tree, ｐ拆hide ヰme 路So the 答ゐold witch can't 拆find ヰme, 路For if she 答does 梆she'll pick ヰmy 答bones, 路And юbury ヰme 仇under the 葛garden 答stones."

юThen the apple tree юsaid, "路Of 桂course I will. You ｐюゐhelped ヰme to stand 别straight, and 仇one good 火turn 火deserves 仇another."

So the apple tree ｐhid ｐher 拆ゐfinely in its 梆green branches; and юwhen the witch ゐflew past 别saying:

"tree of ヰ拆mine! O 路Tree of ヰ拆mine! ｐHave you 梆seen ヰmy 佛naughty ゐlittle ヰ别maid 路With a ゐwilly ゐwilly wag and a 别great big bag, 路梆She's 答ゐstolen ヰmy ヰ仇money--佛all I ｐhad?"

"no, ヰ仇mother dear, 路Not for юseven year!"

So the witch ゐflew on the wrong way, and the 火girl got down, thanked the tree ゐ拆ゐpolitely, and 葛started юagain. 仇But ○仇just as she got to where the cow was standing 拆beside the 别pail, she ｐ火heard the witch 仇ヰcoming юagain, so she ran to the cow and 拆cried:

"cow! Cow, ゐ梆please ｐ拆hide ヰme 路So the witch can't 拆find ヰme; 路If she 答does 梆she'll pick ヰmy 答bones, 路And юbury ヰme 仇under the 葛garden 答stones!"

And юwhen the witch ゐflew by and 佛ゐcalled to the cow:

юThen the 仇oven юsaid, "I 别юam 别afraid there is no 叼room for you, as 仇another batch of юbread is 别baking; 仇but there is the 别baker--ask ｐhim."

So she asked the 别baker, and ｐhe юsaid, "路Of 桂course I will. You 别saved ヰmy ゐlast batch from 梆being 火burnt; so 仇run into the {bakehouse} , you will be 拆quite 别safe there, and I will юsettle the witch for you."

юThen the 别baker ゐ拆replied, "路ゐLook in the 仇oven. She ヰmay be there."

And the witch ゐ拆alighted from ｐher 叼ヰbroomstick and 金peered into the 仇oven: 仇But she could see no 仇one.

"梆creep in and ゐlook in the 葛farthest 桂corner," юsaid the 别baker ゐ拆ゐslyly, and the witch юcrept in, юwhen----

Bang! ----

ｐHe 仇shut the door in ｐher 别face, and there she was 答roasting. And юwhen she 别came out with the юbread she was 佛all crisp and brown, and ｐhad to go ｐ答home as юbest she could and put 答ゐcold 梆cream 佛all 答over ｐher!

仇But the 拆kind, ゐ拆○obliging ゐlittle 火girl got 别safe ｐ答home with ｐher bag of ヰ仇money.

Now the ill-юヰ拣tempered юゐelder sister was юvery ○юゐjealous of this good ゐ仇luck, and 火ヰdetermined to юget a bag of 答ゐgold for ｐ火юゐherself. So she in ｐher 火turn packed 仇up a 仇bundle and 葛started to 梆seek 火service by the 别same 答road. 仇But юwhen she 别came to the 仇oven, and the ゐ答loaves юbegged ｐher to 别take юthem out because they ｐhad 梆been 别baking юseven 金years and were nigh to 火burning, she tossed ｐher ｐюhead and юsaid:

"a ゐ拆ゐlikely 桂story 梆indeed, that I should 火burn ヰmy 拣fingers to 别save your 仇crusts. No, thank you!"

And with that she юwent on till she 别came across the cow standing 别waiting to be ヰゐmilked 拆beside the 别pail. 仇But юwhen the cow юsaid:

"ゐlittle 火girl! ゐLittle 火girl! ヰゐMilk ヰme! ゐ梆Please ヰゐmilk ヰme, 拆I've 别waited юseven 金years to be ヰゐmilked----"

She 答ゐonly ゐlaughed and ゐ拆replied, "路You ヰmay 别wait 仇another юseven 金years for 佛all I care. 拆I'm not your {dairymaid} !"

And with that she юwent on till she 别came to the apple tree, 佛all 答拣火overburdened by its 叼fruit. 仇But юwhen it юbegged ｐher to 别shake its branches, she 答ゐonly ゐgiggled, and ゐ仇plucking 仇one 拆ripe apple, юsaid:

"仇one is 仇enough for ヰme: You can 梆keep the юrest 桂юゐyourself." And with that she юwent on ヰ仇munching the apple, till she 别came to the witch-ヰwoman's ｐhouse.

Now the witch-ヰwoman, though she ｐhad got 答over 梆being crisp and brown from the 仇oven, was юゐdreadfully angry with 佛all ゐlittle ヰ别maid-火servants, and ヰ别made 仇up ｐher ヰ拆mind this 仇one should not trick ｐher. So for a ゐlong 拆time she юnever юwent out of the ｐhouse; 仇thus the ill-юヰ拣tempered sister юnever ｐhad a chance of ゐlooking 仇up the ヰchimney, as she ｐhad ヰюmeant to do at 仇once. And she ｐhad to 仇dust, and ゐ梆clean, and 仇brush, and 梆sweep юever so ｐ葛hard, until she was 拆quite 拆拣tired out.

仇But 仇one day, юwhen the witch-ヰwoman юwent into the 葛garden to юbury ｐher 答bones, she 梆seized the ヰ答ヰmoment, ゐlooked 仇up the ヰchimney, and, sure 仇enough, a bag of 答ゐgold юfell ゐ仇ヰplump into ｐher ゐlap!

юWell! She was off with it in a ヰ答ヰmoment, and ran and ran till she 别came to the apple tree, юwhen she ｐ火heard the witch-ヰwoman ｐ拆behind ｐher. So she 拆cried as ｐher sister ｐhad 仇done:

"apple tree! Apple tree, ｐ拆hide ヰme 路So the 答ゐold witch can't 拆find ヰme, 路For if she 答does 梆she'll 别break ヰmy 答bones, 路Or юbury ヰme 仇under the 葛garden 答stones."

仇But the apple tree юsaid:

"no 叼room ｐhere! 拆I've too ヰюmany ゐapples."

So she ｐhad to 仇run on; and юwhen the witch-ヰwoman on ｐher 叼ヰbroomstick 别came ゐ拆flying by and 佛ゐcalled:

"o 路Tree of ヰ拆mine! Tree of ヰ拆mine! ｐHave you 梆seen a 佛naughty ゐlittle ヰ别maid 路With a ゐwilly ゐwilly wag and a 别great big bag, 路ｐ叼Who's 答ゐstolen ヰmy ヰ仇money--佛all I ｐhad?"

The apple tree ゐ拆replied:

"юyes, ヰ仇mother dear, 路梆She's gone down there."

юThen the witch-ヰwoman юwent after ｐher, 佛caught ｐher, 别gave ｐher a 仇thorough good 梆beating, took the bag of ヰ仇money away from ｐher, and юsent ｐher ｐ答home without a юpenny 别ヰpayment for 佛all ｐher 仇dusting, and 梆sweeping, and 仇brushing, and ゐ梆cleaning.

The ゐ别ゐlaidly 火worm

In {Bamborough} 路Castle there 仇once ゐlived a 路King ｐwho ｐhad two ゐchildren, a 仇son 别ヰnamed 路拆ゐChilde 路拆Wynde, and a 佛daughter ｐwho was 佛ゐcalled 路ヰMay 路ヰ葛Margret. Their ヰ仇mother, a fair ヰwoman, was юdead, and the 路King ヰ桂mourned ｐher ゐlong and 别ゐfaithfully. 仇But, after ｐhis 仇son 路拆ゐChilde 路拆Wynde юwent to 梆seek ｐhis 桂叼fortune, the 路King, ｐ仇hunting in the forest, 别came across a ゐ别lady of 仇such 别great 筐beauty that ｐhe юfell in ゐ仇love with ｐher at 仇once and 火ヰdetermined to ヰmarry ｐher.

Now 路юPrincess 路ヰMay 路ヰ葛Margret was not 答over-ゐ梆pleased to think that ｐher ヰ仇拣mother's ゐ别place should be 别taken by a 别strange ヰwoman, nor was she ゐ梆pleased to think that she would ｐhave to give 仇up 梆keeping ｐhouse for ｐher father the 路King. For she ｐhad 佛ゐ别always 别taken a 拆pride in ｐher 火work. 仇But she юsaid 仇nothing, though she stood ゐlong on the castle 佛ゐwalls ゐlooking out across the sea wishing for ｐher dear 仇拣brother's 火return; for, see you, they ｐhad ヰ仇拣mothered 梆each 仇other.

Still no 筐news 别came of 路拆ゐChilde 路拆Wynde; so on the day юwhen the 答ゐold 路King was to bring the new 路梆Queen ｐ答home, 路ヰMay 路ヰ葛Margret counted 答over the 梆keys of the castle 别ヰ拣chambers, knotted юthem on a string, and after casting юthem 答over ｐher ゐюleft 答ゐshoulder for ゐ仇luck--ヰmore for ｐher 拣father's 别sake than for the new 路梆Queen 葛regard--she stood at the castle 别gate юready to ｐhand 答over the 梆keys to ｐher юヰ仇stepmother.

Now as the 拆bridal юprocession 答approached with 佛all the ゐ桂lords of the 桂north {countrie} , and 仇some of the 路Scots ゐ桂lords in юattendance, she ゐlooked so fair and so 梆sweet, that the ゐ桂lords 拣whispered to 仇one 仇another of ｐher 筐beauty. And юwhen, after 别saying in a 娥voice ゐ拆like a ヰ别mavis--

"oh юゐwelcome, юゐwelcome, father, 路仇Unto your ｐ佛ゐhalls and 拣towers! And юゐwelcome too, ヰmy юヰ仇stepmother, 路For 佛all that's ｐhere is 桂yours!"

She 火turned upon the юstep and tripped into the 葛yard, the 路Scots ゐ桂lords юsaid ゐaloud:

"桂叼forsooth! 路ヰMay 路ヰ葛Margret's 别grace 路拣Surpasses 佛all that we ｐhave ヰюmet, she ｐhas so fair a 别face!"

Now the new 路梆Queen 答拣ｐ火overheard this, and she ヰstamped ｐher foot and ｐher 别face ゐ仇flushed with anger as she 火turned ｐher about and 佛ゐcalled:

"you ヰ拆might ｐhave юexcepted ヰme, 路仇But I will bring 路ヰMay 路ヰ葛Margret to a 路ゐ别ゐLaidly 路火Worm degree; 拆I'll bring ｐher ゐlow as a 路ゐ别ゐLaidly 路火Worm 路That 桂warps about a 答stone, 路And not till the 路拆ゐChilde of 路拆Wynde 仇come back 路Will the witching be 仇仇undone."

юWell! ｐ金Hearing this 路ヰMay 路ヰ葛Margret ゐlaughed, not 答knowing that ｐher new юヰ仇stepmother, for 佛all ｐher 筐beauty, was a witch; and the ゐlaugh ヰ别made the wicked ヰwoman still ヰmore angry. So that 别same 拆night she ゐюleft ｐher 娥royal юbed, and, 火returning to the ゐ答ゐlonely 别cave where she ｐhad юever 仇done ｐher ヰ○magic, she cast 路юPrincess 路ヰMay 路ヰ葛Margret 仇under a юspell with 葛ヰcharms three 拆ヰtimes three, and passes 拆nine 拆ヰtimes 拆nine. And this was ｐher юspell:

"I 金weird ye to a 路ゐ别ゐLaidly 路火Worm, 路And 仇such 别sail ye юever be 路Until 路拆ゐChilde 路拆Wynde the 路King dear 仇son 路仇ヰComes ｐ答home across the sea. Until the 火ゐworld 仇ヰcomes to an юend {Unspelled} {ye'll} юnever be, 路ゐюUnless 路拆ゐChilde 路拆Wynde of ｐhis 答own free will 路别Sail give you kisses three!"

So it 别came to pass that 路юPrincess 路ヰMay 路ヰ葛Margret юwent to ｐher юbed a 筐攫beauteous ヰ别maiden, full of 别grace, and 答rose юnext ヰ桂morning a 路ゐ别ゐLaidly 路火Worm; for юwhen ｐher 拆tire-ヰwomen 别came to юdress ｐher they found 娥ゐcoiled 仇up in ｐher юbed an 佛awesome dragon, which {uncoiled} юゐitself and 别came 桂towards юthem. And юwhen they ran away ю拆terrified, the 路ゐ别ゐLaidly 路火Worm 佛ゐcrawled and юcrept, and юcrept and 佛ゐcrawled down to the sea till it 梆reached the rock of the {Spindlestone} which is 佛ゐcalled the {Heugh} . And there it 火ゐcurled юゐitself round the 答stone, and ゐlay basking in the 仇sun.

юThen for юseven ヰ拆ゐmiles 梆east and юseven ヰ拆ゐmiles юwest and юseven ヰ拆ゐmiles 桂north and south the ｐ答whole 仇country-拆side knew the ｐ仇hunger of the 路ゐ别ゐLaidly 路火Worm of {Spindlestone} {Heugh} , for it 答drove the 佛awesome 梆beast to ゐ梆leave its юresting-ゐ别place at 拆night and devour юeverything it 别came across.

At ゐlast a 拆wise {warlock} 答ゐtold the 梆people that if they wished to be quit of 梆these ｐ拣horrors, they ヰ仇must 别take юevery drop of the ヰゐmilk of юseven 拆white ヰゐmilch 拆kine юevery ヰ桂morn and юevery 梆eve to the trough of 答stone at the foot of the {Heugh} , for the 路ゐ别ゐLaidly 路火Worm to drink. And this they did, and after that the 路ゐ别ゐLaidly 路火Worm 仇ゐtroubled the 仇country-拆side no ゐlonger; 仇but ゐlay 桂warped about the {Heugh} , ゐlooking out to sea with its юterrible snout in the air.

仇But the 火word of its 叼doings ｐhad gone 梆east and ｐhad gone юwest; it ｐhad 梆even gone 答over the sea and ｐhad 仇come to 路拆ゐChilde 路拆Wynde's 金ears; and the 筐news of it 拣angered ｐhim; for ｐhe 佛thought 拣perchance it ｐhad 仇ヰsomething to do with ｐhis ゐ仇beloved sister 路ヰMay 路ヰ葛Margret's 金disappearance. So ｐhe 佛ゐcalled ｐhis ヰюmen-at-葛ヰarms юtogether and юsaid:

"we ヰ仇must 别sail to {Bamborough} and ゐland by {Spindlestone} , so as to юquell and kill this 路ゐ别ゐLaidly 路火Worm."

юThen they ゐbuilt a ship without ゐdelay, ゐ别laying the 梆keel with wood from the 答rowan tree. And they ヰ别made ヰmasts of 答rowan wood 佛ゐalso, and 桂oars ゐ拆拆likewise; and, so 火furnished, юset 桂forth.

Now the wicked 路梆Queen knew by ｐher 葛arts they were 仇ヰcoming, so she юsent out ｐher ヰimps to still the 拆winds so that the ゐ仇拣fluttering 别ゐsails of ゐsilk ｐ仇hung 拆idle on the ヰmasts. 仇But 路拆ゐChilde 路拆Wynde was not to be юbested; so ｐhe 佛ゐcalled out the 桂ヰюoarsmen. 仇Thus it 别came to pass that 仇one ヰ桂morn the wicked 路梆Queen, ゐlooking from the 路梆Keep, saw the ゐgallant ship in {Bamborough} 路Bay, and she юsent out 佛all ｐher witch-拆wives and ｐher {impets} to 别raise a 桂storm and sink the ship; 仇but they 别came back 仇别unable to ｐ火hurt it, for, see you, it was ゐbuilt of 答rowan wood, 答over which witches ｐhave no power.

юThen, as a ゐlast 拆device, the 路Witch 路梆Queen ゐ别laid юゐspells upon the 路ゐ别ゐLaidly 路火Worm 别saying:

"oh! ゐ别ゐLaidly 路火Worm! Go ヰ别make their ヰtopmast ｐ梆heel, 路Go! 火Worm the sand, and 梆creep 梆beneath the 梆keel."

Now the 路ゐ别ゐLaidly 路火Worm ｐhad no 娥choice 仇but to obey. So:

"the 路火Worm ゐюleapt 仇up, the 路火Worm ゐюleapt down 路And ゐplaited round 梆each ゐplank, 路And aye as the ship 别came ゐ答close to shore 路She ｐ梆ゐheeled as if she sank."

Three 拆ヰtimes three did 路拆ゐChilde 路拆Wynde юヰattempt to ゐland, and three 拆ヰtimes three the 路ゐ别ゐLaidly 路火Worm юkept the good ship from the shore. At ゐlast 路拆ゐChilde 路拆Wynde 别gave the 火word to put the ship about, and the 路Witch 路梆Queen, ｐwho was watching from the 路梆Keep, 佛thought ｐhe ｐhad given 仇up: 仇But ｐhe was not to be юbested: For ｐhe 答ゐonly rounded the юnext 娥point to {Budley} sands. And there, ○仇ヰjumping into the 答shoal 佛water, ｐhe got 别ゐsafely to ゐland, and 佛drawing ｐhis 桂sword of 叼proof, 仇rushed 仇up to 拆fight the 佛awesome 路火Worm. 仇But as ｐhe 别raised ｐhis 桂sword to 拆strike ｐhe ｐ火heard a 娥voice, soft as the ю拣western 拆wind:

"oh quit thy 桂sword, 仇юunbend thy bow, 路And give ヰme kisses three, 路For though I 梆seem a 路ゐ别ゐLaidly 路火Worm 路No ｐ葛harm 拆I'll do to thee!"

And the 娥voice 梆ヰseemed to ｐhim ゐ拆like the 娥voice of ｐhis dear sister 路ヰMay 路ヰ葛Margret. So ｐhe 别stayed ｐhis ｐhand. юThen 仇once юagain the 路ゐ别ゐLaidly 路火Worm юsaid:

"oh quit thy 桂sword, 仇юunbend thy bow, 路ヰMy ゐ别ゐlaidly 桂form 拣юforget. 拣Forgive the wrong and kiss ヰme 拆thrice 路For ゐ仇love of 路ヰMay 路ヰ葛Margret."

юThen 路拆ゐChilde 路拆Wynde, ヰюヰ拣remembering ｐhow ｐhe ｐhad ゐ仇loved ｐhis sister, put ｐhis 葛ヰarms round the 路ゐ别ゐLaidly 路火Worm and kissed it 仇once. And ｐhe kissed the {loathly} thing 拆twice. And ｐhe kissed it юyet a 火third 拆time as ｐhe stood with the юwet sand at ｐhis 梆feet.

юThen with a ｐhiss and a roar the 路ゐ别ゐLaidly 路火Worm sank to the sand, and in ｐhis 葛ヰarms was 路ヰMay 路ヰ葛Margret!

ｐHe wrapped ｐher in ｐhis ヰmantle, for she юヰゐtrembled in the 答ゐcold sea air, and carried ｐher to {Bamborough} 路Castle, where the wicked 路梆Queen, 答knowing ｐher hour was 仇come, stood, 佛all 火deserted by ｐher ヰimps and witch-拆wives, on the 吼stairs, twisting ｐher ｐhands.

юThen 路拆ゐChilde 路拆Wynde ゐlooking at ｐher 拆cried:

"woe! Woe to thee, thou wicked 路Witch! An ill 别fate ゐshalt 拆thine be! The 叼doom thou {dreed} on 路ヰMay 路ヰ葛Margret 路The 别same 叼doom ゐshalt thou {dree} .

ｐю桂Henceforth {thou'lt} be a 路ゐ别ゐLaidly 路答Toad 路That in the ゐclay 仇doth юwend, 路And {unspelled} thou ゐwilt юnever be 路Till this 火ゐworld ｐhath an юend."

And as ｐhe 答spoke the wicked 路梆Queen began to shrivel, and she ゐshrivelled and ゐshrivelled to a ｐhorrid ゐwrinkled 答toad that ｐhopped down the castle юsteps and 金disappeared in a юcrevice.

仇But to this day a ゐ答loathsome 答toad is 仇ヰ拆ヰsometimes 梆seen ｐ佛haunting {Bamborough} 路梆Keep; and that 路ゐ别ゐLaidly 路答Toad is the wicked 路Witch 路梆Queen!

仇But 路拆ゐChilde 路拆Wynde and 路юPrincess 路ヰMay 路ヰ葛Margret ゐ仇loved 梆each 仇other as ヰ仇much as юever, and ゐlived ｐゐhappily юever after.

Titty ヰmouse and tatty ヰmouse

Titty 路ヰMouse and 路Tatty 路ヰMouse 答both ゐlived in a ｐhouse.

Titty 路ヰMouse юwent a-ゐ梆gleaning, and 路Tatty 路ヰMouse юwent a-ゐ梆gleaning.

So they 答both юwent a-ゐ梆gleaning.

Titty 路ヰMouse ゐ梆gleaned an ear of 桂corn, and 路Tatty 路ヰMouse ゐ梆gleaned an ear of 桂corn.

So they 答both ゐ梆gleaned an ear of 桂corn.

Titty 路ヰMouse ヰ别made a pudding, and 路Tatty 路ヰMouse ヰ别made a pudding.

So they 答both ヰ别made a pudding.

And 路Tatty 路ヰMouse put ｐher pudding into the pot to 娥boil.

仇But юwhen 路Titty юwent to put ｐ火hers in, the pot 仇ヰゐtumbled 答over, and 佛ゐscalded ｐher to юdeath, and 路Tatty 拣sat down and юwept.

юThen the three-ゐюlegged 叼stool юsaid, "路Tatty, why do you 梆weep?"

"titty юdead," юsaid 路Tatty, "and so I 梆weep."

"юthen," юsaid the 叼stool, "拆I'll ｐhop," so the 叼stool ｐhopped.

юThen a 叼broom in the 桂corner of the 叼room юsaid, "路叼Stool, why do you ｐhop?"

"oh!" юSaid the 叼stool, "路Titty юdead, and 路Tatty 梆weeps, and so I ｐhop."

"юthen," юsaid the 叼broom, "拆I'll 梆sweep," so the 叼broom began to 梆sweep.

юThen юsaid the door, "路叼Broom, why do you 梆sweep?"

"oh!" юSaid the 叼broom, "路Titty юdead, and 路Tatty 梆weeps, and the 叼stool ｐhops, and so I 梆sweep."

"юthen," юsaid the door, "拆I'll ○jar," so the door ○葛jarred.

юThen the window юsaid, "路Door, why do you ○jar?"

"oh!" юSaid the door, "路Titty юdead, and 路Tatty 梆weeps, and the 叼stool ｐhops, and the 叼broom 梆sweeps, and so I ○jar."

"юthen," юsaid the window, "拆I'll 梆creak," so the window 梆creaked.

Now there was an 答ゐold 桂form 拆outside the ｐhouse, and юwhen the window 梆creaked, the 桂form юsaid, "路Window, why do you 梆creak?"

"oh!" юSaid the window, "路Titty юdead, and 路Tatty 梆weeps, and the 叼stool ｐhops, and the 叼broom 梆sweeps, the door ○葛jars, and so I 梆creak!"

"юthen," юsaid the 答ゐold 桂form, "拆I'll ゐgallop round the ｐhouse." So the 答ゐold 桂form ゐgalloped round the ｐhouse.

Now there was a 拆fine ゐ葛large 佛ゐ仇walnut tree 答growing by the cottage, and the tree юsaid to the 桂form, "路桂Form, why do you ゐgallop round the ｐhouse?"

"oh!" юSays the 桂form, "路Titty юdead, and 路Tatty 梆weeps, and the 叼stool ｐhops, and the 叼broom 梆sweeps, the door ○葛jars, and the window 梆creaks, and so I ゐgallop round the ｐhouse."

"юthen," юsaid the 佛ゐ仇walnut tree, "拆I'll юshed ヰmy ゐ梆leaves." So the 佛ゐ仇walnut tree юshed 佛all its 筐beautiful 梆green ゐ梆leaves.

Now there was a ゐlittle 火bird 火perched on 仇one of the boughs of the tree, and юwhen 佛all the ゐ梆leaves юfell, it юsaid, "路佛ゐ仇Walnut tree, why do you юshed your ゐ梆leaves?"

"oh!" юSaid the tree, "路Titty юdead, and 路Tatty 梆weeps, the 叼stool ｐhops, and the 叼broom 梆sweeps, the door ○葛jars, and the window 梆creaks, the 答ゐold 桂form ゐgallops round the ｐhouse, and so I юshed ヰmy ゐ梆leaves."

"юthen," юsaid the ゐlittle 火bird, "拆I'll ヰ答ゐmoult 佛all ヰmy ю拣feathers," so ｐhe ヰ答ゐmoulted 佛all ｐhis gay ю拣feathers.

Now there was a ゐlittle 火girl 佛walking ゐbelow, carrying a ○仇jug of ヰゐmilk for ｐher 仇拣brothers' and 拣sisters' 仇supper, and юwhen she saw the poor ゐlittle 火bird ヰ答ゐmoult 佛all its ю拣feathers, she юsaid, "路ゐLittle 火bird, why do you ヰ答ゐmoult 佛all your ю拣feathers?"

"oh!" юSaid the ゐlittle 火bird, "路Titty юdead, and 路Tatty 梆weeps, the 叼stool ｐhops, and the 叼broom 梆sweeps, the door ○葛jars, and the window 梆creaks, the 答ゐold 桂form ゐgallops round the ｐhouse, the 佛ゐ仇walnut tree юsheds its ゐ梆leaves, and so I ヰ答ゐmoult 佛all ヰmy ю拣feathers."

"юthen," юsaid the ゐlittle 火girl, "拆I'll spill the ヰゐmilk." So she dropt the pitcher and ゐspilt the ヰゐmilk.

Now there was an 答ゐold ヰman ○仇just by on the top of a ゐladder thatching a rick, and юwhen ｐhe saw the ゐlittle 火girl spill the ヰゐmilk, ｐhe юsaid, "路ゐLittle 火girl, what do you ヰ梆mean by ゐspilling the ヰゐmilk? Your ゐlittle 仇拣brothers and 拣sisters ヰ仇must go without their 仇拣suppers."

юThen юsaid the ゐlittle 火girl, "路Titty юdead, and 路Tatty 梆weeps, the 叼stool ｐhops, and the 叼broom 梆sweeps, the door ○葛jars, and the window 梆creaks, the 答ゐold 桂form ゐgallops round the ｐhouse, the 佛ゐ仇walnut tree юsheds 佛all its ゐ梆leaves, the ゐlittle 火bird ヰ答ゐmoults 佛all its ю拣feathers, and so I spill the ヰゐmilk."

"oh!" юSaid the 答ゐold ヰman, "юthen 拆I'll 仇ヰtumble off the ゐladder and 别break ヰmy юneck."

So ｐhe 仇ヰゐtumbled off the ゐladder and 答broke ｐhis юneck; and юwhen the 答ゐold ヰman 答broke ｐhis юneck, the 别great 佛ゐ仇walnut tree юfell down with a crash and 仇юupset the 答ゐold 桂form and ｐhouse, and the ｐhouse 佛ゐfalling knocked the window out, and the window knocked the door down, and the door 仇юupset the 叼broom, and the 叼broom 仇юupset the 叼stool, and poor ゐlittle 路Tatty 路ヰMouse was юburied 梆beneath the 叼ruins.

路○Jack and the 梆佛beanstalk

A ゐlong ゐlong 拆time ago, юwhen ヰ答most of the 火ゐworld was 仇young and 答folk did what they ゐ拆liked because 佛all things were good, there ゐlived a boy 佛ゐcalled 路○Jack.

ｐHis father was юbed-ridden, and ｐhis ヰ仇mother, a good 答soul, was busy 火ゐearly ヰ桂morns and ゐ别late 梆eves ゐplanning and ゐ别placing ｐhow to 桂support ｐher sick ｐ仇husband and ｐher 仇young 仇son by юゐselling the ヰゐmilk and 仇butter which 路ヰゐMilky-路拆White, the 筐beautiful cow, 别gave юthem without stint. For it was 仇ヰsummer-拆time. 仇But winter 别came on; the ｐ火herbs of the 梆ゐfields took ю筐refuge from the frosts in the 桂warm 火earth, and though ｐhis ヰ仇mother юsent 路○Jack to gather what fodder ｐhe could юget in the ｐю○答hedgerows, ｐhe 别came back as often as not with a юvery юヰempty sack; for 路○Jack's 拆eyes were so often full of 仇wonder at 佛all the things ｐhe saw that 仇ヰ拆ヰsometimes ｐhe 拣forgot to 火work!

So it 别came to pass that 仇one ヰ桂morning 路ヰゐMilky-路拆White 别gave no ヰゐmilk at 佛all--not 仇one 别drain! юThen the good ｐ葛hard-火working ヰ仇mother threw ｐher 别apron 答over ｐher ｐюhead and sobbed:

"what shall we do? What shall we do?"

Now 路○Jack ゐ仇loved ｐhis ヰ仇mother; 拆besides, ｐhe юゐfelt ○仇just a bit 梆sneaky at 梆being 仇such a big boy and 叼doing so ゐlittle to ｐюゐhelp, so ｐhe юsaid, "路Cheer 仇up! Cheer 仇up! 拆I'll go and юget 火work 仇ヰsomewhere." And ｐhe юゐfelt as ｐhe 答spoke as if ｐhe would 火work ｐhis 拣fingers to the 答bone; 仇but the good ヰwoman shook ｐher ｐюhead ヰ桂ゐmournfully.

"筐you've 拆tried that before, 路○Jack," she юsaid, "and 答nobody would 梆keep you. You are 拆quite a good ゐlad 仇but your wits go a-wool-拣gathering. No, we ヰ仇must юsell 路ヰゐMilky-路拆White and ゐ拆live on the ヰ仇money. It is no 筐use 拆crying 答over ヰゐmilk that is not ｐhere to spill!"

You see, she was a 拆wise as юwell as a ｐ葛hard-火working ヰwoman, and 路○Jack's spirits 答rose.

"○仇just so," ｐhe 拆cried. "we will юsell 路ヰゐMilky-路拆White and be richer than юever. It's an ill 拆wind that ゐ答blows no 仇one good. So, as it is ヰ葛market-day, 拆I'll ○仇just 别take ｐher there and we shall see what we shall see."

"仇but--" began ｐhis ヰ仇mother.

"仇but 仇doesn't 仇butter 葛parsnips," ゐlaughed 路○Jack. "仇trust ヰme to ヰ别make a good 葛bargain."

So, as it was washing-day, and ｐher sick ｐ仇husband was ヰmore 别ゐailing than 筐usual, ｐhis ヰ仇mother ゐюlet 路○Jack юset off to юsell the cow.

"not ゐюless than юten pounds," she 佛ゐbawled after ｐhim as ｐhe 火turned the 桂corner.

юTen pounds, 梆indeed! 路○Jack ｐhad ヰ别made 仇up ｐhis ヰ拆mind to юtwenty! юTwenty ゐsolid 答ゐgolden sovereigns!

ｐHe was ○仇just юゐsettling what ｐhe should buy ｐhis ヰ仇mother as a {fairing} out of the ヰ仇money, юwhen ｐhe saw a queer ゐlittle 答ゐold ヰman on the 答road ｐwho 佛ゐcalled out, "路Good-ヰ桂morning, 路○Jack!"

"good-ヰ桂morning," ゐ拆replied 路○Jack, with a ゐ拆polite bow, 仇拣wondering ｐhow the queer ゐlittle 答ゐold ヰman ｐhappened to know ｐhis 别name; though, to be sure, 路○Jacks were as ゐюplentiful as ゐ拣blackberries.

"and where ヰmay you be 答going?" Asked the queer ゐlittle 答ゐold ヰman. 路○Jack 仇拣wondered юagain--ｐhe was 佛ゐ别always 仇拣wondering, you know--what the queer ゐlittle 答ゐold ヰman ｐhad to do with it; 仇but, 梆being 佛ゐ别always ゐ拆polite, ｐhe ゐ拆replied:

"I 别юam 答going to ヰ葛market to юsell 路ヰゐMilky-路拆White--and I ヰ梆mean to ヰ别make a good 葛bargain."

"so you will! So you will!" 仇ゐChuckled the queer ゐlittle 答ゐold ヰman. "you ゐlook the 桂sort of chap for it. I юbet you know ｐhow ヰюmany 梆beans ヰ别make 拆five?"

"two in 梆each ｐhand and 仇one in ヰmy ヰmouth," 拣answered 路○Jack юゐreadily. ｐHe 攫ゐreally was 葛sharp as a 梆needle.

"○仇just so, ○仇just so!" 仇ゐChuckled the queer ゐlittle 答ゐold ヰman; and as ｐhe 答spoke ｐhe drew out of ｐhis pocket 拆five 梆beans. "юwell, ｐhere they are, so give 仇us 路ヰゐMilky-路拆White."

路○Jack was so ゐ拣flabbergasted that ｐhe stood with ｐhis ヰmouth 答open as if ｐhe юexpected the fifth 梆bean to ゐfly into it.

"仇but they 葛aren't ヰcommon 梆beans," put in the queer ゐlittle 答ゐold ヰman, and there was a queer ゐlittle ヰ拆smile on ｐhis queer ゐlittle 别face. "if you ゐplant 梆these 梆beans 答over-拆night, by ヰ桂morning they will ｐhave 答grown 仇up 拆right into the юvery sky."

路○Jack was too ゐ拣flabbergasted this 拆time 梆even to 答open ｐhis ヰmouth; ｐhis 拆eyes 答opened юinstead.

"_拆right 仇up into the юvery sky_" 梆repeated the queer 答ゐold ヰman, with a nod 梆between 梆each 火word. "it's a good 葛bargain, 路○Jack; and, as fair ゐ别play's a ○叼jewel, if they 答don't--why! ヰ梆Meet ヰme ｐhere to-ヰmorrow ヰ桂morning and you shall ｐhave 路ヰゐMilky-路拆White back юagain. 路Will that ゐ梆please you?"

"拆right as a trivet," 拆cried 路○Jack, without stopping to think, and the юnext ヰ答ヰmoment ｐhe found ｐヰюゐhimself standing on an юヰempty 答road.

"two in 梆each ｐhand and 仇one in ヰmy ヰmouth," 梆repeated 路○Jack. "that is what I юsaid, and what 拆I'll do. юEverything in 桂order, and if what the queer ゐlittle 答ゐold ヰman юsaid isn't true, I shall юget 路ヰゐMilky-路拆White back to-ヰmorrow ヰ桂morning."

"what a ゐlong 拆time 筐you've 梆been!" ゐ别ヰExclaimed ｐhis ヰ仇mother, ｐwho was watching ゐanxiously for ｐhim at the 别gate. "it is past 仇sun-юsetting; 仇but I see you ｐhave 答ゐsold 路ヰゐMilky-路拆White. юTell ヰme quick ｐhow ヰ仇much you got for ｐher."

"ゐ佛laws-a-ヰ火mercy! You 答don't say so," 拣仇interrupted the good ヰwoman. "and I {worriting} 佛all day ゐюlest they should 别take you in. What was it? юTen pounds--梆fifteen--sure it can't_ be юtwenty!"

路○Jack ｐюゐheld out the 梆beans 拆仇ヰゐtriumphantly.

"there," ｐhe юsaid. "that's what I got for ｐher, and a ○ゐjolly good 葛bargain too!"

For 路○Jack's ヰ仇mother for 仇once ｐhad ゐlost ｐher юヰtemper, and was {belabouring} the boy for 佛all she was 火worth. And юwhen she ｐhad finished 答ゐscolding and 梆beating, she ゐ仇flung the ヰ拣miserable 梆beans out of window and юsent ｐhim, {supperless} , to юbed.

If this was the ヰ○magical юeffect of the 梆beans, 佛thought 路○Jack 叼ゐruefully, ｐhe didn't want юany ヰmore ヰ○magic, if you ゐ梆please.

ｐюHowever, 梆being ｐюゐhealthy and, as a 叼rule, ｐhappy, ｐhe 叼soon юfell ゐ梆asleep and ゐюslept ゐ拆like a top.

юWhen ｐhe 答woke ｐhe 佛thought at 火first it was ヰ叼ゐ拆moonlight, for юeverything in the 叼room 答showed 梆greenish. юThen ｐhe 吼stared at the ゐlittle window. For what the queer ゐlittle 答ゐold ヰman ｐhad юsaid was true! 仇One of the 梆beans which ｐhis ヰ仇mother ｐhad 仇chucked into the 葛garden ｐhad found 娥soil, 别taken 叼root, and 答grown in the 拆night....

Where?...

仇Up to the юvery sky? 路○Jack ヰюmeant to see at юany 别rate.

So ｐhe ゐ拆ヰclimbed, and ｐhe ゐ拆ヰclimbed, and ｐhe ゐ拆ヰclimbed. And on the 桂юdoorstep stood a 别great big ヰwoman with a ゐblack porridge-pot in ｐher ｐhand. Now 路○Jack, ｐhaving ｐhad no 仇supper, was ｐ仇hungry as a ｐ仇hunter, and юwhen ｐhe saw the porridge-pot ｐhe юsaid 拆quite ゐ拆ゐpolitely:

"юbreakfast!" ю答Echoed the ヰwoman, ｐwho, in 叼truth, was an 答拣ogre's 拆wife. "if it is юbreakfast 筐you're wanting, it's юbreakfast 筐you'll ゐ拆ゐlikely be; for I юexpect ヰmy ヰman ｐ答home юevery instant, and there is 仇nothing ｐhe ゐ拆likes юbetter for юbreakfast than a boy--a fat boy ゐgrilled on 答toast."

Now 路○Jack was not a bit of a 拣coward, and юwhen ｐhe wanted a thing ｐhe ○ю拣ゐgenerally got it, so ｐhe юsaid 金cheerful-ゐ拆like:

"拆I'd be fatter if 拆I'd ｐhad ヰmy юbreakfast!" 吼Whereat the 答拣ogre's 拆wife ゐlaughed and bade 路○Jack 仇come in; for she was not, 攫ゐreally, ｐhalf as bad as she ゐlooked. 仇But ｐhe ｐhad ｐ葛ゐhardly finished the 别great 答bowl of porridge and ヰゐmilk she 别gave ｐhim юwhen the ｐ答whole ｐhouse began to юヰtremble and 别quake. 仇ヰThump! 仇ヰThump!! 仇ヰThump!!!

ｐHe was a big 仇one for sure. ｐHe ｐhad three 梆sheep 仇strung to ｐhis юゐbelt, and 梆these ｐhe threw down on the 别table. юThen 路○Jack nipped out of the 仇oven and, 梆seizing 仇one of the bags of 答ゐgold, юcrept away, and ran ゐalong the 别straight, 拆wide, 拆shining 拆white 答road as fast as ｐhis ゐюlegs would carry ｐhim till ｐhe 别came to the 梆佛beanstalk. ｐHe couldn't ゐ拆climb down it with the bag of 答ゐgold, it was so ｐюheavy, so ｐhe ○仇just ゐ仇flung ｐhis 火burden down 火first, and, ｐюゐhelter-юゐskelter, ゐ拆ヰclimbed after it.

After that they ゐlived ｐゐhappily on the 答ゐgold 梆pieces for a ゐlong 拆time, and the юbed-ridden father got 佛all 桂sorts of 拆nice things to 梆eat; 仇but, at ゐlast, a day 别came юwhen 路○Jack's ヰ仇mother 答showed a 答ゐdoleful 别face as she put a big юゐyellow sovereign into 路○Jack's ｐhand and bade ｐhim be 吼careful ヰ葛marketing, because there was not 仇one ヰmore in the coffer. That 拆night 路○Jack юwent {supperless} to юbed of ｐhis 答own 桂accord. If ｐhe couldn't ヰ别make ヰ仇money, ｐhe 佛thought, at юany 别rate ｐhe could 梆eat ゐюless ヰ仇money. It was a 别shame for a big boy to 仇stuff ｐヰюゐhimself and bring no grist to the ヰmill.

ｐHe ゐюslept ゐ拆like a top, as 娥boys do юwhen they 答don't 答拣梆overeat ヰюゐthemselves, and юwhen ｐhe 答woke....

ｐHey, юpresto! The ｐ答whole 叼room 答showed 梆greenish, and there was a 火curtain of ゐ梆leaves 答over the window! 仇Another 梆bean ｐhad 答grown in the 拆night, and 路○Jack was 仇up it ゐ拆like a ゐヰlamp-ゐ拆lighter before you could say 拆knife.

"go away, bad boy!" ゐ拆Replied the 答拣ogre's 拆wife. "ゐlast 拆time I 别gave a boy юbreakfast ヰmy ヰman ヰmissed a ｐ答whole bag of 答ゐgold. I ゐ梆believe you are the 别same boy."

"ヰ别maybe I 别юam, ヰ别maybe 拆I'm not," юsaid 路○Jack, with a ゐlaugh. "拆I'll юtell you true юwhen 拆I've ｐhad ヰmy юbreakfast; 仇but not till юthen."

So the 答拣ogre's 拆wife, ｐwho was юゐdreadfully 拣攫curious, 别gave ｐhim a big 答bowl full of porridge; 仇but before ｐhe ｐhad ｐhalf finished it ｐhe ｐ火heard the 答ogre 仇ヰcoming--

仇ヰThump! 仇ヰThump! 仇ヰThump!

"in with you to the 仇oven," 梆shrieked the 答拣ogre's 拆wife. "you shall юtell ヰme юwhen ｐhe ｐhas gone to ゐ梆sleep."

This 拆time 路○Jack saw through the 梆steam 梆peep-ｐ答hole that the 答ogre ｐhad three fat calves 仇strung to ｐhis юゐbelt.

"юbetter ゐ仇luck to-day, 拆wife!" ｐHe 拆cried, and ｐhis 娥voice shook the ｐhouse. "quick! 答Roast 梆these 拆ゐtrifles for ヰmy юbreakfast! I ｐ答hope the 仇oven's ｐhot?"

And ｐhe юwent to 梆feel the ｐhandle of the door, 仇but ｐhis 拆wife 拆cried out 葛ゐsharply:

" {Umph} !" ゐGrowled the 答ogre. And юthen ｐhe began sniffing and 佛ゐcalling out:

юThen the 答ogre юsaid to the ｐюhen, "路ゐLay!" And it ヰゐpromptly ゐ别laid--what do you think? --a 筐beautiful, 拆shiny, юゐyellow, 答ゐgolden юegg!

梆佛Beanstalk]

Goody ヰme!

The ゐblack bull of 路桂答Norroway

ゐLong ago in 路桂答Norroway there ゐlived a ゐ别lady ｐwho ｐhad three 佛拣daughters. Now they were 佛all pretty, and 仇one 拆night they юfell a-佛talking of ｐ叼whom they ヰюmeant to ヰmarry.

And the юゐeldest юsaid, "I will ｐhave no 仇one ゐ答lower than an 路火Earl."

And the юsecond юsaid, "I will ｐhave 仇none ゐ答lower than a 路ゐ桂Lord."

仇But the 火third, the prettiest and the ヰюmerriest, tossed ｐher ｐюhead and юsaid, with a twinkle in ｐher eye, "路Why so proud? As for ヰme I would be юcontent with the 路ゐBlack 路Bull of 路桂答Norroway."

At that the 仇other 拣sisters bade ｐher be 拆ゐsilent and not 佛talk ゐ拆ゐlightly of 仇such a ヰmonster. For, see you, is it not written:

To 拆ゐwilder ヰю拣measures now they 火turn, 路The ゐblack ゐblack 路Bull of 路桂答Norroway; 路仇Sudden the 别拣tapers 梆cease to 火burn, 路The ヰゐminstrels 梆cease to ゐplay.

So, no doubt, the 路ゐBlack 路Bull of 路桂答Norroway was ｐюゐheld to be a ｐhorrid ヰmonster.

仇But the 仇youngest 佛daughter would ｐhave ｐher ゐlaugh, so she юsaid three 拆ヰtimes that she would be юcontent with the 路ゐBlack 路Bull of 路桂答Norroway.

юWell! It so ｐhappened that the юvery юnext ヰ桂morning a 答coach-and-six 别came swinging ゐalong the 答road, and in it 别sate an 路火Earl ｐwho ｐhad 仇come to ask the ｐhand of the юゐeldest 佛daughter in ヰmarriage. So there were 别great ○娥rejoicings 答over the юwedding, and the 拆bride and 拆叼bridegroom 答drove away in the 答coach-and-six.

юThen the юnext thing that ｐhappened was that a 答coach-and-four with a 路ゐ桂Lord in it 别came swinging ゐalong the 答road; and ｐhe wanted to ヰmarry the юsecond 佛daughter. So they were юwed, and there were 别great ○娥rejoicings, and the 拆bride and 拆叼bridegroom 答drove away in the 答coach-and-four.

Now after this there was 答ゐonly the 仇youngest, the prettiest and the ヰюmerriest, of the 拣sisters ゐюleft, and she 别became the apple of ｐher ヰ仇拣mother's eye. So you ヰmay ヰ○imagine ｐhow the ヰ仇mother юゐfelt юwhen 仇one ヰ桂morning a юterrible юゐ答bellowing was ｐ火heard at the door, and there was a 别great big 路ゐBlack 路Bull 别waiting for ｐhis 拆bride.

She юwept and she 别ゐwailed, and at 火first the 火girl ran away and ｐhid ｐ火юゐherself in the юゐcellar for fear, 仇but there the 路Bull stood 别waiting, and at ゐlast the 火girl 别came 仇up and юsaid:

юThen she ヰmounted on the 路ゐBlack 路Bull back, and it 佛walked away with ｐher 拆quite 拆ゐquietly. And юever it 答chose the ヰ叼smoothest paths and the 梆easiest 答roads, so that at ゐlast the 火girl grew ゐюless 别afraid. 仇But she 别became юvery ｐ仇hungry and was nigh to 别faint юwhen the 路ゐBlack 路Bull юsaid to ｐher, in 拆quite a soft 娥voice that wasn't a юゐbellow at 佛all:

仇Thus they ○火journeyed on, and they ○火journeyed on, through ヰюmany юdreadful forests and ヰюmany ゐ答ゐlonely 别wastes, and the 路ゐBlack 路Bull юnever 佛paused for 拆bite or 仇sup, 仇but юever the 火girl ｐhe carried 别ate out of ｐhis ゐюleft ear and drank out of ｐhis 拆right, and юset by what she ゐюleft to 火serve the ヰ答morrow's 拆night. 仇But юwhen the юnext ヰ桂morning 别came, there ｐhe was юready for ｐhis 火burden юagain. So this was 仇done, and the юnext ヰ桂morning ｐhe was 别waiting before the ｐ佛hall-door for ｐhis 火burden; and she, though 仇ヰsomewhat ゐ答loth at ゐ梆leaving the 拆fine 仇ヰcompany, ヰmounted ｐhim 金ゐcheerfully 仇enough, and they 答rode away, and they 答rode away, and they 答rode away, through thick 拆briar 别brakes and 仇up 金fearsome ゐcliffs. 仇But юever the 路ゐBlack 路Bull trod the ヰゐbrambles 仇拣underfoot and 答chose the 梆easiest paths, 拆while she 别ate out of ｐhis ゐюleft ear and drank out of ｐhis 拆right, and wanted for 仇nothing, though ｐhe ｐhad 拆neither 拆bite nor 仇sup. Now, though the 仇ヰcompany 别ゐgreatly 仇拣wondered at the 别strange ヰcompanions, they asked the 火girl to ○娥join юthem, and 桂拣ordered the 叼ヰgrooms to ゐ梆lead away the 路ゐBlack 路Bull to a 梆ゐfield.

仇But she, ヰюヰ拣remembering 佛all ｐhe ｐhad 仇done for ｐher, юsaid, "路Not so! ｐHe will stay with ヰme!" юThen 梆seeing a ゐ葛large 桂thorn in the foot with which ｐhe ｐhad 梆been ゐヰlimping, she 叼stooped down and ゐpulled it out.

And, ゐlo and ｐ答ゐbehold! In an instant, to юevery 仇one's 拣拆surprise, there 金appeared, not a 拆frightful ヰmonstrous bull, 仇but 仇one of the ヰ答most 筐beautiful 路Princes юever ｐюゐbeheld, ｐwho юfell at ｐhis ゐ拣拣deliverer's 梆feet, thanking ｐher for ｐhaving 答broken ｐhis 叼cruel ヰenchantment.

A wicked witch-ヰwoman ｐwho wanted to ヰmarry ｐhim ｐhad, ｐhe юsaid, юゐspelled ｐhim until a 筐beautiful ヰ别maiden of ｐher 答own free will should do ｐhim a 别favour.

"仇but," ｐhe юsaid, "the 别○danger is not 佛all 答over. You ｐhave 答broken the ヰenchantment by 拆night; that by day ｐhas юyet to be 答拣仇overcome."

So the юnext ヰ桂morning the 路Prince ｐhad to ю筐ヰresume the 桂form of a bull, and they юset out юtogether; and they 答rode, and they 答rode, and they 答rode, till they 别came to a 葛dark and {ugsome} ゐюglen. And ｐhere ｐhe bade ｐher ヰdismount and sit on a 别great rock.

"ｐhere you ヰ仇must stay," ｐhe юsaid, "拆while I go yonder and 拆fight the 路答ゐOld 路仇One. And ヰ拆mind! ヰ叼Move 拆neither ｐhand nor foot 拆ゐwhilst I 别юam away, юゐelse I shall юnever 拆find you юagain. If юeverything 拣around you 火turns ゐblue, I shall ｐhave 梆beaten the 路答ゐOld 路仇One; 仇but if юeverything 火turns юred, ｐhe will ｐhave 拣conquered ヰme."

And with that, and a ヰюtremendous 桂roaring юゐbellow, ｐhe юset off to 拆find ｐhis foe.

юWell, she 别sate as still as a ヰmouse, ヰ叼moving 拆neither ｐhand nor foot, nor 梆even ｐher 拆eyes, and 别waited, and 别waited, and 别waited. юThen at ゐlast юeverything 火turned ゐblue. 仇But she was so 答拣仇overcome with ○joy to think that ｐher ゐ仇lover was 桂攫victorious that she 拣forgot to 梆keep still, and ゐlifting 仇one of ｐher 梆feet, crossed it 答over the 仇other!

So she 别waited, and 别waited, and 别waited. ゐLong she 别sate, and aye she 金wearied; and 佛all the 拆time ｐhe was 梆seeking for ｐher, 仇but ｐhe юnever found ｐher.

At ゐlast she 答rose and юwent she knew not whither, 火ヰdetermined to 梆seek for ｐher ゐ仇lover through the ｐ答whole 拆wide 火ゐworld. So she ○火journeyed on, and she ○火journeyed on, and she ○火journeyed on, until 仇one day in a 葛dark wood she 别came to a ゐlittle ｐ仇hut where ゐlived an 答ゐold, 答ゐold ヰwoman ｐwho 别gave ｐher 叼food and юゐshelter, and bid ｐher 路God-梆speed on ｐher юerrand, giving ｐher three 仇nuts, a 佛ゐ仇walnut, a ゐ拣filbert, and a ｐ别hazel 仇nut, with 梆these 火words:

"юwhen your ｐ葛heart is ゐ拆like to 别break, 路And 仇once юagain is ゐ拆like to 别break, 路Crack a 仇nut and in its юshell 路That will be that 叼suits you юwell."

After this she юゐfelt ｐ葛heartened 仇up, and 拣wandered on till ｐher 答road was ゐblocked by a 别great ｐhill of ゐglass; and though she 拆tried 佛all she could to ゐ拆climb it, she could not; for aye she ゐslipped back, and ゐslipped back, and ゐslipped back; for it was ゐ拆like 拆ice.

юThen she 佛sought a passage юゐelsewhere, and round and about the foot of the ｐhill she юwent sobbing and 别ゐwailing, 仇but ne'er a ｐ答ゐfoothold could she 拆find. At ゐlast she 别came to a ヰsmithy; and the ヰsmith ヰpromised if she would 火serve ｐhim 别ゐfaithfully for юseven 金years and юseven 别days, that ｐhe would ヰ别make ｐher 拆拣iron {shoon} 吼wherewith to ゐ拆climb the ｐhill of ゐglass. So for юseven ゐlong 金years and юseven 桂short 别days she 娥ゐtoiled, and span, and юswept, and washed in the ヰsmith's ｐhouse. Now she ｐhad not gone far before a 仇ヰcompany of 拆fine ゐ桂lords and ゐ别ladies 答rode past ｐher 佛talking of 佛all the grand 叼doings that were to be 仇done at the 仇young 路筐Duke of 路桂答别Norroway's юwedding. юThen she passed a 仇ヰnumber of 梆people carrying 佛all 桂sorts of good things which they 答ゐtold ｐher were for the 路筐Duke юwedding. юThen she ｐ火heard the ｐ桂horns of ｐ仇拣hunters and 拆cries of 路叼Room! 叼Room for the 路筐Duke of 路桂答Norroway and ｐhis 拆bride!"

And ｐwho should 拆ride past 仇but the 筐beautiful 路Prince she ｐhad 仇but ｐhalf {unspelled} , and by ｐhis 拆side was the witch-ヰwoman ｐwho was 火ヰdetermined to ヰmarry ｐhim that юvery day.

юWell! At the 拆sight she юゐfelt that ｐher ｐ葛heart was 梆indeed ゐ拆like to 别break, and 答over юagain was ゐ拆like to 别break, so that the 拆time ｐhad 仇come for ｐher to crack 仇one of the 仇nuts. Now юwhen the witch-ヰwoman saw this 仇拣wonderful thing she 拣offered the 火girl ｐher 娥choice of юanything in the castle for it.

"if you will put off your юwedding with the 路筐Duke for a day, and ゐюlet ヰme watch in ｐhis 叼room to-拆night," юsaid the 火girl, "you shall ｐhave it."

Now, ゐ拆like 佛all witch-ヰwomen, the 拆bride wanted юeverything ｐher 答own way, and she was so sure she ｐhad ｐher 叼groom 别safe, that she юconsented; 仇but before the 路筐Duke юwent to юrest she 别gave ｐhim, with ｐher 答own ｐhands, a posset so ヰ别made that юany 仇one ｐwho drank it would ゐ梆sleep till ヰ桂morning.

仇Thus, though the 火girl was ゐallowed ゐ答alone into the 路筐Duke 别ヰchamber, and though she юspent the ゐゐlivelong 拆night 拆sighing and singing:

юThen 仇once юagain ｐher ｐ葛heart was ゐ拆like to 别break, and 答over and 答over юagain ゐ拆like to 别break, and she cracked the ゐ拣filbert 仇nut, because it was the юnext biggest. 仇But the 路筐Duke, ｐwho ｐhad 仇drunk the ゐ梆sleeping-draught from the ｐhands of ｐhis witch-拆bride, юnever 火stirred, and юwhen 佛dawn 别came the 火girl ｐhad to ゐ梆leave ｐhim without ｐhis юever 答knowing she ｐhad 梆been there.

юThen, 梆indeed, the 火ゐgirl's ｐ葛heart was ゐ拆like to 别break, and 答over and 答over and 答over юagain ゐ拆like to 别break, so she cracked the ゐlast 仇nut--the ｐ别hazel 仇nut--and out of it 别came the ヰ答most 仇拣wonderful wee, wee, wee- {est} ヰwoman 梆ゐreeling away at 葛yarn as fast as she could 梆reel.

And this ヰ葛marvel so ゐ拆delighted the witch-拆bride that 仇once юagain she юconsented to put off ｐher юwedding for a day, and ゐallow the 火girl to watch in the 路筐Duke 别ヰchamber the 拆night through, in 桂order to юpossess it.

Now it so ｐhappened that юwhen the 路筐Duke was юdressing that ヰ桂morning ｐhe ｐ火heard ｐhis 别○pages 佛talking ヰ仇amongst ヰюゐthemselves of the 别strange 拆sighing and singing they ｐhad ｐ火heard in the 拆night; and ｐhe юsaid to ｐhis 别faithful 答ゐold ゐvalet, "路What do the 别○pages ヰ梆mean?"

And the 答ゐold ゐvalet, ｐwho ｐ别hated the witch-拆bride, юsaid:

"if the ヰmaster will 别take no ゐ梆sleeping-draught to-拆night, {mayhap} ｐhe ヰmay 佛ゐalso ｐhear what for two 拆nights ｐhas юkept ヰme 别awake."

At this the 路筐Duke ヰ葛ゐmarvelled 别ゐgreatly, and юwhen the witch-拆bride 佛brought ｐhim ｐhis 梆evening posset, ｐhe ヰ别made 筐excuse it was not 梆sweet 仇enough, and 拆while she юwent away to юget ｐ仇honey to 梆sweeten it 佛withal, ｐhe 桂poured away the posset and ヰ别made ゐ梆believe ｐhe ｐhad ゐ答swallowed it.

So that 拆night юwhen 葛dark ｐhad 仇come, and the 火girl 答stole in to ｐhis 别ヰchamber with a ｐюheavy ｐ葛heart thinking it would be the юvery ゐlast 拆time she would юever see ｐhim, the 路筐Duke was 攫ゐreally 佛broad 别awake. And юwhen she 别sate down by ｐhis ю拆bedside and began to sing:

"far ｐhave I 佛sought for thee,"

ｐHe knew ｐher 娥voice at 仇once, and ゐclasped ｐher in ｐhis 葛ヰarms.

юThen ｐhe 答ゐtold ｐher ｐhow ｐhe ｐhad 梆been in the power of the witch-ヰwoman and ｐhad 拣forgotten юeverything, 仇but that now ｐhe ヰюヰ拣remembered 佛all and that the юspell was 答broken for юever and aye.

So the юwedding 梆feast 火served for their ヰmarriage, since the witch-拆bride, 梆seeing ｐher power was gone, ゐquickly ゐюfled the 仇country and was юnever ｐ火heard of юagain.

Catskin

仇Once upon a 拆time there ゐlived a ○юゐヰgentleman ｐwho 答owned 拆fine ゐlands and ｐhouses, and ｐhe юvery ヰ仇much wanted to ｐhave a 仇son to be heir to юthem. So юwhen ｐhis 拆wife 佛brought ｐhim a 佛daughter, though she was bonny as bonny could be, ｐhe 吼cared 佛nought for ｐher, and юsaid:

"ゐюlet ヰme юnever see ｐher 别face."

So she grew 仇up to be a 筐beautiful ヰ别maiden, though ｐher father юnever юset 拆eyes on ｐher till she was 梆fifteen 金years 答ゐold and was юready to be ヰmarried.

юThen ｐher father юsaid 仇ゐroughly, "路She shall ヰmarry the 火first that 仇ヰcomes for ｐher." Now юwhen this 别became 答known, ｐwho should 仇come ゐalong and be 火first 仇but a nasty, ｐhorrid 答ゐold ヰman! So she didn't know what to do, and юwent to the ｐюhen-拆wife and asked ｐher 拆advice. And the ｐюhen-拆wife юsaid, "路Say you will not 别take ｐhim ゐюunless they give you a 答coat of ゐsilver ゐcloth." юWell, they 别gave ｐher a 答coat of ゐsilver ゐcloth, 仇but she wouldn't 别take ｐhim for 佛all that, 仇but юwent юagain to the ｐюhen-拆wife, ｐwho юsaid, "路Say you will not 别take ｐhim ゐюunless they give you a 答coat of 梆beaten 答ゐgold." юWell, they 别gave ｐher a 答coat of 梆beaten 答ゐgold, 仇but still she would not 别take the 答ゐold ヰman, 仇but юwent юagain to the ｐюhen-拆wife, ｐwho юsaid, "路Say you will not 别take ｐhim ゐюunless they give you a 答coat ヰ别made of the ю拣feathers of 佛all the 火birds of the air." So they юsent out a ヰman with a 别great ｐ梆heap of 梆peas; and the ヰman 拆cried to 佛all the 火birds of the air, "路梆Each 火bird 别take a pea and put down a юfeather." So 梆each 火bird took a pea and put down 仇one of its ю拣feathers: And they took 佛all the ю拣feathers and ヰ别made a 答coat of юthem and 别gave it to ｐher; 仇but still she would not 别take the nasty, ｐhorrid 答ゐold ヰman, 仇but asked the ｐюhen-拆wife 仇once юagain what she was to do, and the ｐюhen-拆wife юsaid, "路Say they ヰ仇must 火first ヰ别make you a 答coat of catskin." юThen they ヰ别made ｐher a 答coat of catskin; and she put it on, and 拆tied 仇up ｐher 仇other 答coats into a 仇bundle, and юwhen it was 拆night-拆time ran away with it into the woods.

Now she юwent ゐalong, and юwent ゐalong, and юwent ゐalong, till at the юend of the wood she saw a 拆fine castle. юThen she ｐhid ｐher 拆fine юdresses by a crystal 佛拣佛waterfall and юwent 仇up to the castle 别gates and asked for 火work. The ゐ别lady of the castle saw ｐher, and 答ゐtold ｐher, "拆I'm sorry I ｐhave no юbetter ゐ别place, 仇but if you ゐ拆like you ヰmay be our 仇ゐ攫scullion." So down she юwent into the kitchen, and they 佛ゐcalled ｐher 路Catskin, because of ｐher юdress. 仇But the cook was юvery 叼cruel to ｐher, and ゐюled ｐher a sad ゐ拆life.

юWell, 叼soon after that it ｐhappened that the 仇young ゐ桂lord of the castle 别came ｐ答home, and there was to be a grand 佛ball in honour of the 别occasion. And юwhen they were 梆speaking about it ヰ仇among the 火servants, "路Dear ヰme, 路ヰMrs. Cook," юsaid 路Catskin, "ｐhow ヰ仇much I should ゐ拆like to go!"

"what! You 火dirty, ヰimpudent ゐ仇slut," юsaid the cook, "you go ヰ仇among 佛all the 拆fine ゐ桂lords and ゐ别ladies with your ゐfilthy catskin? A 拆fine figure 筐you'd 仇cut!" And with that she took a 别basin of 佛water and dashed it into 路Catskin 别face. 仇But 路Catskin 答ゐonly shook ｐher 金ears and юsaid 仇nothing.

Now юwhen the day of the 佛ball 拣拆arrived, 路Catskin ゐslipped out of the ｐhouse and юwent to the юedge of the forest where she ｐhad ｐhidden ｐher юdresses. юThen she 别bathed ｐ火юゐherself in a crystal 佛拣佛waterfall, and put on ｐher 答coat of ゐsilver ゐcloth, and ｐ别hastened away to the 佛ball. As 叼soon as she ю拣entered 佛all were 答拣仇overcome by ｐher 筐beauty and 别grace, 拆while the 仇young ゐ桂lord at 仇once ゐlost ｐhis ｐ葛heart to ｐher. ｐHe asked ｐher to be ｐhis 葛partner for the 火first dance; and ｐhe would dance with 仇none 仇other the ゐゐlivelong 拆night.

юWhen it 别came to 葛parting 拆time, the 仇young ゐ桂lord юsaid, "路Pray юtell ヰme, fair ヰ别maid, where you ゐ拆live?"

仇But 路Catskin 火curtsied and юsaid:

"拆kind sir, if the 叼truth I ヰ仇must юtell, 路At the 拆sign of the'Basinof 路佛Water I юdwell."

юThen she ゐflew from the castle and donned ｐher catskin 答robe юagain, and ゐslipped into the 仇ゐ拣scullery, 仇答unbeknown to the cook.

The 仇young ゐ桂lord юwent the юvery юnext day and 火searched for the 拆sign of the 路别Basin of 路佛Water"; 仇but ｐhe could not 拆find it. So ｐhe юwent to ｐhis ヰ仇mother, the ゐ别lady of the castle, and ゐ吼declared ｐhe would юwed 仇none 仇other 仇but the ゐ别lady of the ゐsilver юdress, and would юnever юrest till ｐhe ｐhad found ｐher. So 仇another 佛ball was 叼soon 拣别○arranged in ｐ答hopes that the 筐beautiful ヰ别maid would appear юagain.

So 路Catskin юsaid to the cook, "路Oh, ｐhow I should ゐ拆like to go!" 吼Whereupon the cook 梆ヰscreamed out in a 别rage, "路What, you, you 火dirty, ヰimpudent ゐ仇slut! You would 仇cut a 拆fine figure ヰ仇among 佛all the 拆fine ゐ桂lords and ゐ别ladies." And with that she 仇up with a ゐ别ladle and 答broke it across 路Catskin back. 仇But 路Catskin 答ゐonly shook ｐher 金ears, and ran off to the forest, where, 火first of 佛all, she 别bathed, and юthen she put on ｐher 答coat of 梆beaten 答ゐgold, and off she юwent to the 佛ball-叼room.

As 叼soon as she ю拣entered 佛all 拆eyes were upon ｐher; and the 仇young ゐ桂lord at 仇once ю拆recognised ｐher as the ゐ别lady of the 路别Basin of 路佛Water," ゐ别ヰclaimed ｐher ｐhand for the 火first dance, and did not ゐ梆leave ｐher till the ゐlast. юWhen that 别came, ｐhe юagain asked ｐher where she ゐlived. 仇But 佛all that she would say was:

"拆kind sir, if the 叼truth I ヰ仇must юtell, 路At the 拆sign of the'Broken路ゐ别Ladle I юdwell";

And with that she 火curtsied and ゐflew from the 佛ball, off with ｐher 答ゐgolden 答robe, on with ｐher catskin, and into the 仇ゐ拣scullery without the cook's 答knowing.

юNext day, юwhen the 仇young ゐ桂lord could not 拆find where the 拆sign of the 路别Basin of 路佛Water" was, ｐhe юbegged ｐhis ヰ仇mother to ｐhave 仇another grand 佛ball, so that ｐhe ヰ拆might ヰ梆meet the 筐beautiful ヰ别maid 仇once ヰmore.

юThen 路Catskin юsaid to the cook, "路Oh, ｐhow I wish I could go to the 佛ball!" 吼Whereupon the cook 佛ゐcalled out: "a 拆fine figure 筐you'd 仇cut!" And 答broke the ヰskimmer across ｐher ｐюhead. 仇But 路Catskin 答ゐonly shook ｐher 金ears, and юwent off to the forest, where she 火first 别bathed in the crystal spring, and юthen donned ｐher 答coat of ю拣feathers, and so off to the 佛ball-叼room.

юWhen she ю拣entered юevery 仇one was 拣拆surprised at so 筐beautiful a 别face and 桂form юdressed in so rich and rare a юdress; 仇but the 仇young ゐ桂lord at 仇once ю拆recognised ｐhis 筐beautiful 梆ｐ葛sweetheart, and would dance with 仇none 仇but ｐher the ｐ答whole 梆evening. юWhen the 佛ball 别came to an юend ｐhe юpressed ｐher to юtell ｐhim where she ゐlived, 仇but 佛all she would answer was:

"拆kind sir, if the 叼truth I ヰ仇must юtell, 路At the 拆sign of the'Broken路ヰSkimmer I юdwell";

And with that she 火curtsied, and was off to the forest. 仇But this 拆time the 仇young ゐ桂lord ゐ答followed ｐher, and watched ｐher 别change ｐher 拆fine юdress of ю拣feathers for ｐher catskin юdress, and юthen ｐhe knew ｐher for ｐhis 答own 仇ゐ拣scullery-ヰ别maid.

юNext day ｐhe юwent to ｐhis ヰ仇mother, and 答ゐtold ｐher that ｐhe wished to ヰmarry the 仇ゐ拣scullery-ヰ别maid, 路Catskin.

"юnever," юsaid the ゐ别lady of the castle--"юnever so ゐlong as I ゐ拆live."

юWell, the 仇young ゐ桂lord was so 梆grieved that ｐhe took to ｐhis юbed and was юvery ill 梆indeed. The doctor 拆tried to 拣cure ｐhim, 仇but ｐhe would not 别take юany ヰюmedicine ゐюunless from the ｐhands of 路Catskin. At ゐlast the doctor юwent to the ヰ仇mother, and юsaid that ｐher 仇son would die if she did not юconsent to ｐhis ヰmarriage with 路Catskin; so she ｐhad to give way. юThen she 仇ヰsummoned 路Catskin to ｐher, and 路Catskin put on ｐher 答coat of 梆beaten 答ゐgold before she юwent to see the ゐ别lady; and she, of 桂course, was 答拣仇overcome at 仇once, and was 答ゐonly too ゐglad to юwed ｐher 仇son to so 筐beautiful a ヰ别maid.

So they were ヰmarried, and after a 拆time a ゐlittle 仇son was 桂born to юthem, and grew 仇up a 拆fine ゐlittle ゐlad. Now 仇one day, юwhen ｐhe was about four 金years 答ゐold, a юbeggar ヰwoman 别came to the door, and 路ゐ别Lady 路Catskin 别gave 仇some ヰ仇money to the ゐlittle ゐ桂lord and 答ゐtold ｐhim to go and give it to the юbeggar ヰwoman. This 仇ゐinsult ｐ火hurt 路Catskin юゐdreadfully: And she юwent to ｐher ｐ仇husband, the 仇young ゐ桂lord, and 答ゐtold ｐhim 佛all about ｐher father, and юbegged ｐhe would go and 拆find out what ｐhad 仇become of ｐher 吼parents. Now ｐher father ｐhad юnever ｐhad юany 仇other 拆ゐchild, and ｐhis 拆wife ｐhad 拆died; so ｐhe was 佛all ゐ答alone in the 火ゐworld, and 别sate ヰ答moping and ヰ拣miserable. юWhen the 仇young ゐ桂lord 别came in ｐhe ｐ葛ゐhardly ゐlooked 仇up, ｐhe was so ヰ拣miserable. юThen 路Catskin ｐ仇husband drew a chair ゐ答close 仇up to ｐhim, and asked ｐhim, "路Pray, sir, ｐhad you not 仇once a 仇young 佛daughter ｐ叼whom you would юnever see or 答own?"

юThen the 仇young ゐ桂lord 答ゐtold ｐhim what ｐhad ｐhappened to 路Catskin, and took ｐhim to the inn, and 拣拣afterwards 佛brought ｐhis father-in-ゐlaw to ｐhis 答own castle, where they ゐlived ｐhappy юever 拣拣afterwards.

The three ゐlittle pigs

仇Once upon a 拆time there was an 答ゐold sow ｐwho ｐhad three ゐlittle pigs, and as she ｐhad not 仇enough for юthem to 梆eat, she юsaid they ｐhad юbetter go out into the 火ゐworld and 梆seek their 桂叼fortunes.

Now the юゐeldest pig юwent 火first, and as ｐhe trotted ゐalong the 答road ｐhe ヰюmet a ヰman carrying a 仇bundle of straw. So ｐhe юsaid юvery ゐ拆ゐpolitely:

"if you ゐ梆please, sir, could you give ヰme that straw to ゐbuild ヰme a ｐhouse?"

And the ヰman, 梆seeing what good ヰ拣manners the ゐlittle pig ｐhad, 别gave ｐhim the straw, and the ゐlittle pig юset to 火work and ゐbuilt a 筐beautiful ｐhouse with it.

ゐBlow the ｐhouse down]

юWell! ｐHe ｐ仇huffed and ｐhe 仇puffed. ｐHe 仇puffed and ｐhe ｐ仇huffed. And ｐhe ｐ仇huffed, ｐ仇huffed, and ｐhe 仇puffed, 仇puffed; 仇but ｐhe could not_ ゐblow the ｐhouse down. At ゐlast ｐhe was so out of юbreath that ｐhe couldn't ｐ仇huff and ｐhe couldn't 仇puff юany ヰmore. So ｐhe 佛thought a bit. юThen ｐhe юsaid:

юThen the ゐwolf grew юred with 别rage; 仇but ｐhe was 火ヰdetermined to 梆eat ゐlittle piggy, so ｐhe юsaid, as if ｐhe didn't care:

юWell, the ゐwolf was fair angry; 仇but ｐhe юwent юnext day to the ゐlittle piggy's ｐhouse and 佛ゐcalled through the door, as ヰ拆ゐmild as ヰゐmilk:

"拆I'll be юready before three," 拣sniggered the ゐlittle piggy. And ｐhe was! ｐHe 葛started 火ゐearly in the ヰ桂morning and юwent to the fair, and 答rode in a swing, and ○娥enjoyed ｐヰюゐhimself юever so ヰ仇much, and 佛bought ｐヰюゐhimself a 仇butter-火churn as a {fairing} , and trotted away 桂towards ｐ答home ゐlong before three ゐo'clock. 仇But ○仇just as ｐhe got to the top of the ｐhill, what should ｐhe see 仇but the ゐwolf 仇ヰcoming 仇up it, 佛all panting and юred with 别rage!

Nix 佛naught 仇nothing

仇Once upon a 拆time there ゐlived a 路King and a 路梆Queen ｐwho didn't differ ヰ仇much from 佛all the 仇other kings and 梆queens ｐwho ｐhave ゐlived since 路拆Time began. 仇But they ｐhad no ゐchildren, and this ヰ别made юthem юvery sad 梆indeed. So ゐlittle 路Prince 路Nix 路佛Naught 路仇Nothing grew into a strong, ｐ葛hearty ゐlittle ゐlad; for ｐhis father did not 仇come back for a ゐlong 拆time, and did not 梆even know that ｐhe ｐhad a 仇son.

仇But at ゐlong ゐlast ｐhe 火turned ｐhis 别face ｐ答ヰ拣homewards. So they were stopped, until a ｐ筐huge ○拆giant 金appeared, ｐwho could 别take the river, 火ゐ叼whirlpool and 佛all, in ｐhis 拆stride; and ｐhe юsaid 拆ゐkindly, "拆I'll carry you 佛all 答over, if you ゐ拆like." "pay?" ю答Echoed the ○拆giant, with a grin, "what do you 别take ヰme for? Give ヰme 路Nix 路佛Naught 路仇Nothing, and 拆I'll do the ○job with a ゐglad ｐ葛heart."

Now the 路King юゐfelt ○仇just a 拆trifle 别ヰashamed at the ○拆giant's ○ю拣generosity; so ｐhe юsaid, "路火ゐCertainly, 火ゐcertainly. 拆I'll give you nix 佛naught 仇nothing and ヰmy thanks into the 葛bargain."

So the ○拆giant carried юthem 别ゐsafely 答over the 梆stream and past the 火ゐ叼ゐwhirlpools, and the 路King ｐ别hastened ｐ答ヰ拣homewards. If ｐhe was ゐglad to see ｐhis dear 拆wife, the 路梆Queen, you ヰmay ヰ○imagine ｐhow ｐhe юゐfelt юwhen she 答showed ｐhim ｐhis 仇young 仇son, 佛tall and strong for ｐhis 别age.

"and what's your 别name, 仇young sir?" ｐHe asked of the 拆ゐchild fast ゐclasped in ｐhis 葛ヰarms.

"nix 路佛Naught 路仇Nothing," 拣answered the boy; "that's what they 佛call ヰme till ヰmy father gives ヰme a 别name."

юWell! The 路King 金ゐnearly dropped the 拆ゐchild, ｐhe was so ｐ拆horrified. "what ｐhave I 仇done?" ｐHe 拆cried. "I ヰpromised to give nix 佛naught 仇nothing to the ○拆giant ｐwho carried 仇us 答over the 火ゐ叼ゐwhirlpools where the {nixies} and 佛water-别wraiths ゐ拆live."

At this the 路梆Queen юwept and 别ゐwailed; 仇but 梆being a ゐюclever ヰwoman she 佛thought out a ゐplan 吼whereby to 别save ｐher 仇son. So she юsaid to ｐher ｐ仇husband the 路King, "路If the ○拆giant 仇ヰcomes to ゐ别claim ｐhis ヰpromise, we will give ｐhim the ｐюhen-拆wife's 仇youngest boy. Now sure 仇enough the юvery юnext ヰ桂morning the ○拆giant 金appeared to ゐ别claim 路Nix 路佛Naught 路仇Nothing, and they юdressed 仇up the ｐюhen-拆wife's boy in the 路Prince ゐ答clothes and юwept and 别ゐwailed юwhen the ○拆giant, 拆fine and 拆satisfied, carried ｐhis 拆prize off on ｐhis back. 仇But after a 拆while ｐhe 别came to a big 答stone and 拣sat down to 梆ease ｐhis 答ゐ拣shoulders. " {Hodge} , {Hodge} , on ヰmy 答ゐ拣shoulders! Say 路What {d'ye} ヰ别make the 拆time 答o's day?"

And the ｐюhen-拆wife's ゐlittle boy ゐ拆replied:

"拆time that ヰmy ヰ仇mother the ｐюhen-拆wife 别takes 路The юeggs for the 拆wise 路梆Queen юbreakfast 别cakes!"

юThen the ○拆giant saw at 仇once the trick that ｐhad 梆been ゐ别played on ｐhim, and ｐhe threw the ｐюhen-拆wife's boy on the ground, so that ｐhis ｐюhead ｐhit on the 答stone and ｐhe was ゐkilled.

юThen the ○拆giant 答strode back to the ゐpalace in a tower of a юヰtemper, and ヰdemanded 路Nix 路佛Naught 路仇Nothing." Now юwhen the ｐюhen-拆wife witch ｐ火heard ｐher 别tale, she 佛thought it would be a rare юrevenge to ヰmarry the 路King and 路梆Queen ゐlong-ゐlost 仇son to a 葛拣gardener's 仇ゐugly 佛daughter; so she 别straightway took the 火ゐgirl's 别savings and 别gave ｐher a 葛charm by which she could {unspell} the 路Prince or юspell ｐhim юagain at ｐher ゐюpleasure.

So away юwent the 葛拣gardener's 佛daughter to the castle, and sure 仇enough, no 叼sooner ｐhad she 仇sung ｐher 葛charm, than 路Nix 路佛Naught 路仇Nothing 答awoke.

Now the 葛gardener ｐhad, of 桂course, to draw the 佛water ｐヰюゐhimself, since ｐhis 佛daughter would not 火work. And ｐhe took the pitcher to the 叼pool; and ｐhe 佛ゐalso saw the 路ヰ○Magician 佛拣daughter's shadow in the 佛water; 仇but ｐhe did not think the 别face was ｐhis 答own, for, see you, ｐhe ｐhad a 金beard!

юThen ｐhe ゐlooked 仇up and saw the ゐ别lady in the tree.

She, poor thing, was ｐhalf юdead with sorrow, and ｐ仇hunger, and 梆fatigue, so, 梆being a 拆kind ヰman, ｐhe took ｐher to ｐhis ｐhouse and 别gave ｐher 叼food. And ｐhe 答ゐtold ｐher that that юvery day_ ｐhis 佛daughter was to ヰmarry a ｐhandsome 仇young 别○stranger at the castle, and to юget a ｐhandsome 拣dowry to 叼boot from the 路King and 路梆Queen, in ヰюヰ拣memory of their 仇son, 路Nix 路佛Naught 路仇Nothing, ｐwho ｐhad 梆been carried off by a ○拆giant юwhen ｐhe was a ゐlittle boy.

юThen the 路ヰ○Magician 佛daughter юゐfelt sure that 仇ヰsomething ｐhad ｐhappened to ｐher ゐ仇lover; so she юwent to the castle, and there she found ｐhim fast ゐ梆asleep in a chair.

仇But she could not 别waken ｐhim, for, see you, ｐher ヰ○magic ｐhad gone from ｐher with the ヰ○magic ゐflask which 路Nix 路佛Naught 路仇Nothing ｐhad юヰemptied.

So, though she put ｐher {fingerless} ｐhands on ｐhis and юwept and sang:

"I ゐ梆cleaned the 别stable for ゐ仇love 答o's thee, I {laved} the ゐ别lake and I {clomb} the tree, 路ゐWilt thou not 别waken for ゐ仇love 答o's ヰme?"

ｐHe юnever 火stirred nor 答woke.

Now 仇one of the 答ゐold 火servants there, 梆seeing ｐhow she юwept, took pity on ｐher and юsaid, "路She that is to ヰmarry the 仇young ヰman will be back ere ゐlong, and {unspell} ｐhim for the юwedding. ｐ拆Hide 桂юゐyourself and ゐlisten to ｐher 葛charm."

So the 路ヰ○Magician 佛daughter ｐhid ｐ火юゐherself, and, by and by, in 仇ヰcomes the 葛拣gardener's 佛daughter in ｐher 拆fine юwedding-юdress, and begins to sing ｐher 葛charm. 仇But the 路ヰ○Magician 佛daughter didn't 别wait for ｐher to finish it; for the ヰ答ヰmoment 路Nix 路佛Naught 路仇Nothing 答opened ｐhis 拆eyes, she 仇rushed out of ｐher ｐ拆hiding-ゐ别place, and put ｐher {fingerless} ｐhands in ｐhis.

юThen 路Nix 路佛Naught 路仇Nothing ヰюヰ拣remembered юeverything. ｐHe ヰюヰ拣remembered the castle, ｐhe ヰюヰ拣remembered ｐhis father and ヰ仇mother, ｐhe ヰюヰ拣remembered the 路ヰ○Magician 佛daughter and 佛all that she ｐhad 仇done for ｐhim.

юThen ｐhe drew out the ヰ○magic ゐflask and юsaid, "路拣ゐSurely, 拣ゐsurely there ヰ仇must be 仇enough ヰ○magic in it to ヰюmend your ｐhands." And there was. There were ○仇just 桂梆fourteen drops ゐюleft, юten for the 拣fingers and four for the 答toes; 仇but there was not 仇one for the ゐlittle toe, so it could not be 佛brought back. Of 桂course, after that there was 别great ○娥rejoicing, and 路Prince 路Nix 路佛Naught 路仇Nothing and the 路ヰ○Magician 佛daughter were ヰmarried and ゐlived ｐhappy юever after, 梆even though she 答ゐonly ｐhad four 答toes on 仇one foot. As for the ｐюhen-拆wife witch, she was 火burnt, and so the 葛拣gardener's 佛daughter got back ｐher 火earnings; 仇but she was not ｐhappy, because ｐher shadow in the 佛water was 仇ゐugly юagain.

ヰMr. and 路ヰMrs. 路Vinegar

ヰMr. And 路ヰMrs. Vinegar, a 火worthy 仇couple, ゐlived in a ゐglass pickle-○jar. The ｐhouse, though ヰ佛small, was 仇snug, and so ゐ拆light that 梆each юspeck of 仇dust on the 火furniture 答showed ゐ拆like a ヰ答mole-ｐhill; so 拆while 路ヰMr. Vinegar ゐtilled ｐhis 葛garden with a pickle-桂fork and grew ю○ゐvegetables for ゐpickling, 路ヰMrs. Vinegar, ｐwho was a 葛sharp, 仇ゐbustling, 拆tidy ヰwoman, юswept, 仇brushed, and 仇dusted, 仇brushed and 仇dusted and юswept to 梆keep the ｐhouse ゐ梆clean as a new pin. Now 仇one day she ゐlost ｐher юヰtemper with a юcobweb and юswept so ｐ葛hard after it that bang! Bang! The 叼broom-ｐhandle юwent 拆right through the ゐglass, and crash! Crash! {clitter} ! ゐClatter! There was the pickle-○jar ｐhouse about ｐher 金ears 佛all in ゐ拣splinters and bits.

She picked ｐher way 答over 梆these as юbest she ヰ拆might, and 仇rushed into the 葛garden.

"oh, 路Vinegar, 路Vinegar!" She 拆cried. "we are ゐ梆clean 叼ruined and 仇done for! Quit 梆these ю○ゐvegetables! They 答won't be wanted! What is the 筐use of ゐpickles if you ｐhaven't a pickle-○jar to put юthem in, and--拆I've 答broken 拣ours--into ゐlittle bits!" And with that she юfell to 拆crying 拣ゐbitterly.

仇But 路ヰMr. Vinegar was of 拣different ヰюmettle; though a ヰ佛small ヰman, ｐhe was a 金cheerful 仇one, 佛ゐ别always ゐlooking at the юbest 拆side of things, so ｐhe юsaid, "路Accidents will ｐhappen, {lovey} ! 仇But there are as good pickle-ゐbottles in the shop as юever 别came out of it. 佛All we 梆need is ヰ仇money to buy 仇another. So ゐюlet 仇us go out into the 火ゐworld and 梆seek our 桂叼fortunes."

"仇but what about the 火furniture?" Sobbed 路ヰMrs. Vinegar.

"I will 别take the door of the ｐhouse with ヰme, {lovey} ," 答quoth 路ヰMr. Vinegar ゐstoutly. "юthen no 仇one will be 别able to 答open it, will they?"

ヰMrs. Vinegar did not 拆quite see ｐhow this fact would ヰюmend ヰ拣matters, 仇but, 梆being a good 拆wife, she ｐюゐheld ｐher 梆peace. So off they 仇○trudged into the 火ゐworld to 梆seek 桂叼fortune, 路ヰMr. Vinegar 吼bearing the door on ｐhis back ゐ拆like a 别snail carries its ｐhouse.

юWell, they 佛walked 佛all day ゐlong, 仇but not a brass 葛farthing did they ヰ别make, and юwhen 拆night юfell they found ヰюゐthemselves in a 葛dark, thick forest. Now 路ヰMrs. Vinegar, for 佛all she was a ヰ葛smart, strong ヰwoman, was 拆拣tired to юdeath, and ゐfilled with fear of 拆ゐwild 梆beasts, so she began 仇once ヰmore to cry 拣ゐbitterly; 仇but 路ヰMr. Vinegar was 金cheerful as юever.

"答don't ゐ葛alarm 桂юゐyourself, {lovey} ," ｐhe юsaid. "I will ゐ拆climb into a tree, fix the door 火ヰゐfirmly in a 桂fork, and you can ゐ梆sleep there as 别safe and 仇ヰ拣comfortable as in your 答own юbed."

So ｐhe ゐ拆ヰclimbed the tree, fixed the door, and 路ヰMrs. Vinegar ゐlay down on it, and 梆being юdead 拆拣tired was 叼soon fast ゐ梆asleep. 仇But ｐher 别weight ゐtilted the door 拆别sideways, so, after a 拆time, 路ヰMr. Vinegar, 梆being 别afraid she ヰ拆might ゐslip off, 别sate down on the 仇other 拆side to ゐbalance ｐher and 梆keep watch.

Now in the юvery ヰmiddle of the 拆night, ○仇just as ｐhe was beginning to nod, what should ｐhappen 仇but that a band of 拣robbers should ヰ梆meet 梆beneath that юvery tree in 桂order to 拆divide their 娥ゐspoils. ヰMr. Vinegar could ｐhear юevery 火word юsaid 拆quite ゐdistinctly, and began to юヰtremble ゐ拆like an aspen as ｐhe ゐlistened to the юterrible 梆deeds the 梆thieves ｐhad 仇done to 别gain their юends.

"答don't 别shake so!" ヰ火ヰ拣Murmured 路ヰMrs. Vinegar, ｐhalf ゐ梆asleep. "筐you'll ｐhave ヰme off the юbed."

"拆I'm not 别shaking, {lovey} ," 拣whispered back 路ヰMr. Vinegar in a 别quaking 娥voice. "it is 答ゐonly the 拆wind in the 梆trees."

仇But for 佛all ｐhis 金ゐcheerfulness ｐhe was not 攫ゐreally юvery_ 别brave 拆inside_, so ｐhe юwent on юヰゐtrembling and 别shaking, and 别shaking and юヰゐtrembling, till, ○仇just as the 拣robbers were beginning to 葛parcel out the ヰ仇money, ｐhe ゐactually shook the door 拆right out of the tree-桂fork, and down it 别came--with 路ヰMrs. Vinegar still ゐ梆asleep upon it--拆right on top of the 拣robbers' ｐюheads!

As you ヰmay ヰ○imagine, they 佛thought the sky ｐhad 佛ゐfallen, and ヰ别made off as fast as their ゐюlegs would carry юthem, ゐ梆leaving their 叼booty ｐ拆behind юthem. 仇But 路ヰMr. Vinegar, ｐwho ｐhad 别saved ｐヰюゐhimself from the 佛fall by ゐclinging to a branch, was far too 拆frightened to go down in the 葛dark to see what ｐhad ｐhappened. So 仇up in the tree ｐhe 别sate ゐ拆like a big 火bird until 佛dawn 别came.

юThen 路ヰMrs. Vinegar 答woke, 仇rubbed ｐher 拆eyes, 佛yawned, and юsaid, "路Where 别юam I?"

"on the ground, {lovey} ," 拣answered 路ヰMr. Vinegar, ヰゐscrambling down.

And юwhen they ゐlifted 仇up the door, what do you think they found?

仇One robber squashed ゐflat as a 别pancake, and 桂forty 答ゐgolden guineas 佛all 拣scattered about!

ヰMy goodness! ｐHow 路ヰMr. And 路ヰMrs. Vinegar ○仇ヰjumped for ○joy!

"now, 路Vinegar!" юSaid ｐhis 拆wife юwhen they ｐhad 拣gathered 仇up 佛all the 答ゐgold 梆pieces, "I will юtell you what we ヰ仇must do.
