The 答bogey-梆beast

There was 仇once a ヰwoman ｐwho was юvery, юvery 金cheerful, though she ｐhad ゐlittle to ヰ别make ｐher so; for she was 答ゐold, and poor, and ゐ答ゐlonely. She ゐlived in a ゐlittle bit of a cottage and 火earned a scant ゐliving by 仇running юerrands for ｐher 别拣neighbours, юgetting a 拆bite ｐhere, a 仇sup there, as 桂reward for ｐher 火services. So she ヰ别made shift to юget on, and 佛ゐ别always ゐlooked as spry and 金cheery as if she ｐhad not a want in the 火ゐworld.

Now 仇one 仇ヰsummer 梆evening, as she was trotting, full of ヰ拆ゐsmiles as юever, ゐalong the ｐhigh 答road to ｐher ｐhovel, what should she see 仇but a big ゐblack pot ゐ拆lying in the ditch!

"goodness ヰme!" She 拆cried, "that would be ○仇just the юvery thing for ヰme if I 答ゐonly ｐhad 仇ヰsomething to put in it! 仇But I ｐhaven't! Now ｐwho could ｐhave ゐюleft it in the ditch?"

And she ゐlooked about ｐher юexpecting the 答owner would not be far off; 仇but she could see 答nobody.

"ヰ别maybe there is a ｐ答hole in it," she юwent on, "and that's why it ｐhas 梆been cast away. 仇But it would do 拆fine to put a ゐflower in for ヰmy window; so 拆I'll ○仇just 别take it ｐ答home with ヰme."

And with that she ゐlifted the ゐlid and ゐlooked 拆inside. "ヰ火mercy ヰme!" She 拆cried, fair ヰ别amazed. "if it isn't full of 答ゐgold 梆pieces. ｐ金Here's ゐ仇luck!"

And so it was, ヰbrimful of 别great 答ゐgold 娥coins. юWell, at 火first she ヰゐsimply stood stock-still, 仇拣wondering if she was standing on ｐher ｐюhead or ｐher ｐ梆ゐheels. юThen she began 别saying:

" {Lawks} ! 仇But I do 梆feel rich. I 梆feel 佛awful rich!"

After she ｐhad юsaid this ヰюmany 拆ヰtimes, she began to 仇wonder ｐhow she was to юget ｐher юtreasure ｐ答home. It was too ｐюheavy for ｐher to carry, and she could see no юbetter way than to tie the юend of ｐher 佛shawl to it and drag it ｐ拆behind ｐher ゐ拆like a go-葛cart.

"it will 叼soon be 葛dark," she юsaid to ｐ火юゐherself as she trotted ゐalong. "so ヰ仇much the юbetter! The 别拣neighbours will not see what 拆I'm bringing ｐ答home, and I shall ｐhave 佛all the 拆night to ヰ拆юゐmyself, and be 别able to think what 拆I'll do! {Mayhap} 拆I'll buy a grand ｐhouse and ○仇just sit by the 拆fire with a 仇cup 答o's tea and do no 火work at 佛all ゐ拆like a 梆queen. Or ヰ别maybe 拆I'll юbury it at the 葛garden foot and ○仇just 梆keep a bit in the 答ゐold 拆china 梆teapot on the ヰchimney-梆piece. Or ヰ别maybe--路Goody! Goody! I 梆feel that grand I 答don't know ヰ拆юゐmyself."

By this 拆time she was a bit 拆拣tired of dragging 仇such a ｐюheavy 别weight, and, stopping to юrest a 拆while, 火turned to ゐlook at ｐher юtreasure.

And ゐlo! It wasn't a pot of 答ゐgold at 佛all! It was 仇nothing 仇but a ゐ仇ヰlump of ゐsilver.

She 吼stared at it, and 仇rubbed ｐher 拆eyes, and 吼stared at it юagain.

"юwell! I юnever!" She юsaid at ゐlast. "and ヰme thinking it was a pot of 答ゐgold! I ヰ仇must ｐhave 梆been 梆ヰdreaming. 仇But this is ゐ仇luck! ゐSilver is far ゐюless 仇trouble--梆easier to ヰ拆mind, and not so 梆easy 答ゐstolen. юThem 答ゐgold 梆pieces would ｐhave 梆been the юdeath 答o's ヰme, and with this 别great ゐ仇ヰlump of ゐsilver--"

So she юwent off юagain ゐplanning what she would do, and 梆ゐfeeling as rich as rich, until 仇ヰbecoming a bit 拆拣tired юagain she stopped to юrest and 别gave a ゐlook round to see if ｐher юtreasure was 别safe; and she saw 仇nothing 仇but a 别great ゐ仇ヰlump of 拆拣iron!

"юwell! I юnever!" юSays she юagain. "and I ヰ别mistaking it for ゐsilver! I ヰ仇must ｐhave 梆been 梆ヰdreaming. 仇But this is ゐ仇luck! It's 攫real 梆攫convenient. I can юget юpenny 梆pieces for 答ゐold 拆拣iron, and юpenny 梆pieces are a 梆deal ｐhandier for ヰme than your 答ゐgold and ゐsilver. Why! I should юnever ｐhave ゐюslept a wink for fear of 梆being robbed. 仇But a юpenny 梆piece 仇ヰcomes in 筐useful, and I shall юsell that 拆拣iron for a ゐlot and be 攫real rich--答ゐrolling rich."

So on she trotted full of ゐplans as to ｐhow she would юspend ｐher юpenny 梆pieces, till 仇once ヰmore she stopped to юrest and ゐlooked round to see ｐher юtreasure was 别safe. And this 拆time she saw 仇nothing 仇but a big 答stone.

"юwell! I юnever!" She 拆cried, full of ヰ拆ゐsmiles. "and to think I ヰmistook it for 拆拣iron. It's a 拆fine thing to ｐhave good ゐ仇luck."

So, 佛all in a ｐ仇hurry to see ｐhow the 答stone would 梆keep the 别gate 答open, she trotted off down the ｐhill till she 别came to ｐher 答own cottage. She 仇ゐunlatched the 别gate and юthen 火turned to 仇unfasten ｐher 佛shawl from the 答stone which ゐlay on the path ｐ拆behind ｐher. Aye! It was a 答stone sure 仇enough. So she юbent 答over it to 仇unfasten the 佛shawl юend, юwhen--"路Oh ヰmy!" 佛All of a 仇sudden it 别gave a ○仇ヰjump, a 梆squeal, and in 仇one ヰ答ヰmoment was as big as a ｐ别haystack. юThen it ゐюlet down four 别great ゐlanky ゐюlegs and threw out two ゐlong 金ears, 仇nourished a 别great ゐlong 别tail and ヰromped off, kicking and 梆ゐsquealing and whinnying and ゐlaughing ゐ拆like a 佛naughty, ヰmischievous boy!

The 答ゐold ヰwoman 吼stared after it till it was 吼ゐfairly out of 拆sight, юthen she 火burst out ゐlaughing too.

"юwell!" She 仇ゐchuckled, "I 别юam in ゐ仇luck! 拆Quite the ゐ仇luckiest body ｐ金hereabouts. Fancy ヰmy 梆seeing the 路答Bogey-路梆Beast 佛all to ヰ拆юゐmyself; and ヰ别making ヰ拆юゐmyself so free with it too! ヰMy goodness! I do 梆feel that 仇ゐuplifted--that grand_!" --

So she юwent into ｐher cottage and юspent the 梆evening 仇ゐchuckling 答over ｐher good ゐ仇luck.

ゐLittle юred 拆riding-ｐhood

仇Once upon a 拆time there was a ゐlittle 火girl ｐwho was 佛ゐcalled ゐlittle 路юRed 路拆Riding-路ｐHood, because she was 拆quite ヰ佛small and because she 佛ゐ别always wore a юred ゐ答cloak with a big юred ｐhood to it, which ｐher ヰ仇grandmother ｐhad ヰ别made for ｐher.

Now 仇one day ｐher ヰ仇mother, ｐwho ｐhad 梆been 火churning and 别baking 别cakes, юsaid to ｐher:

"ヰmy dear, put on your юred ゐ答cloak with the ｐhood to it, and 别take this 别cake and this pot of 仇butter to your 路Grannie, and ask ｐhow she is, for I ｐhear she is 别ゐailing."

Now ゐlittle 路юRed 路拆Riding-路ｐHood was юvery fond of ｐher ヰ仇grandmother, ｐwho ヰ别made ｐher so ヰюmany 拆nice things, so she put on ｐher ゐ答cloak ○娥ゐjoyfully and 葛started on ｐher юerrand. 仇But ｐher ヰ仇grandmother ゐlived 仇some way off, and to 梆reach the cottage ゐlittle 路юRed 路拆Riding-路ｐHood ｐhad to pass through a vast ゐ答ゐlonely forest. ｐюHowever, 仇some wood-仇拣cutters were at 火work in it, so ゐlittle 路юRed 路拆Riding-路ｐHood was not so юvery ヰ仇much ゐ葛ヰalarmed юwhen she saw a 别great big ゐwolf 仇ヰcoming 桂towards ｐher, because she knew that ゐwolves were 拣ゐcowardly things.

And sure 仇enough the ゐwolf, though 仇but for the wood-仇拣cutters ｐhe would 拣ゐsurely ｐhave 梆eaten ゐlittle 路юRed 路拆Riding-路ｐHood, 答ゐonly stopped and asked ｐher ゐ拆ゐpolitely where she was 答going.

"I 别юam 答going to see 路Grannie, 别take ｐher this 别cake and this pot of 仇butter, and ask ｐhow she is," юsays ゐlittle 路юRed 路拆Riding-路ｐHood.

"答does she ゐ拆live a юvery ゐlong way off?" Asks the ゐwolf ゐcraftily.

"not so юvery far if you go by the 别straight 答road," ゐ拆replied ゐlittle 路юRed 路拆Riding-路ｐHood. "you 答ゐonly ｐhave to pass the ヰmill and the 火first cottage on the 拆right is 路Grannie; 仇but I 别юam 答going by the wood path because there are 仇such a ゐlot of 仇nuts and ゐ拣flowers and 仇拣ゐ拆butterflies."

"I wish you good ゐ仇luck," юsays the ゐwolf ゐ拆ゐpolitely. "give ヰmy юrespects to your ヰ仇grandmother and юtell ｐher I ｐ答hope she is 拆quite юwell."

And with that ｐhe trotted off. 仇But юinstead of 答going ｐhis 别ways ｐhe 火turned back, took the 别straight 答road to the 答ゐold ヰwoman's cottage, and knocked at the door.

Rap! Rap! Rap!

"ｐ叼who's there?" Asked the 答ゐold ヰwoman, ｐwho was in юbed.

"ゐlittle 路юRed 路拆Riding-路ｐHood," sings out the ゐwolf, ヰ别making ｐhis 娥voice as shrill as ｐhe could. "拆I've 仇come to bring dear 路Grannie a pot of 仇butter and a 别cake from ヰ仇mother, and to ask ｐhow you are."

"pull the bobbin, and the ゐlatch will go 仇up," юsays the 答ゐold ヰwoman, юwell 拆satisfied.

So the ゐwolf ゐpulled the bobbin, the ゐlatch юwent 仇up, and--oh ヰmy! --it wasn't a ヰ拆筐minute before ｐhe ｐhad ゐgobbled 仇up 答ゐold 路Grannie, for ｐhe ｐhad ｐhad 仇nothing to 梆eat for a 梆week.

юThen ｐhe 仇shut the door, put on 路Grannie 拆nightcap, and, юgetting into юbed, 答ゐrolled ｐヰюゐhimself юwell 仇up in the ゐ答clothes.

By and by ゐalong 仇ヰcomes ゐlittle 路юRed 路拆Riding-路ｐHood, ｐwho ｐhad 梆been ヰ筐amusing ｐ火юゐherself by 拣gathering 仇nuts, 仇running after 仇拣ゐ拆butterflies, and picking ゐ拣flowers.

So she knocked at the door.

Rap! Rap! Rap!

"ｐ叼who's there?" юSays the ゐwolf, ヰ别making ｐhis 娥voice as soft as ｐhe could.

Now ゐlittle 路юRed 路拆Riding-路ｐHood ｐ火heard the 娥voice was юvery 仇gruff, 仇but she 佛thought ｐher ヰ仇grandmother ｐhad a 答ゐcold; so she юsaid:

So ゐlittle 路юRed 路拆Riding-路ｐHood ゐpulled the bobbin, the ゐlatch юwent 仇up, and there, she 佛thought, was ｐher ヰ仇grandmother in the юbed; for the cottage was so 葛dark 仇one could not see юwell. 拆Besides, the crafty ゐwolf 火turned ｐhis 别face to the 佛wall at 火first. And ｐhe ヰ别made ｐhis 娥voice as soft, as soft as ｐhe could, юwhen ｐhe юsaid:

"仇come and kiss ヰme, ヰmy dear."

юThen ゐlittle 路юRed 路拆Riding-路ｐHood took off ｐher ゐ答cloak and юwent to the юbed.

"oh, 路ヰヰGrandmamma, 路ヰヰGrandmamma," юsays she, "what big 葛ヰarms 筐you've got!"

"佛all the юbetter to ｐ仇hug you with," юsays ｐhe.

"仇but, 路ヰヰGrandmamma, 路ヰヰGrandmamma, what big ゐюlegs you ｐhave!"

"佛all the юbetter to 仇run with, ヰmy dear."

"oh, 路ヰヰGrandmamma, 路ヰヰGrandmamma, what big 金ears 筐you've got!"

"佛all the юbetter to ｐhear with, ヰmy dear."

"仇but, 路ヰヰGrandmamma, 路ヰヰGrandmamma, what big 拆eyes 筐you've got!"

"佛all the юbetter to see you with, ヰmy dear!"

"oh, 路ヰヰGrandmamma, 路ヰヰGrandmamma, what big 梆teeth 筐you've got!"

"佛all the юbetter to 梆eat you with, ヰmy dear!" юSays that wicked, wicked ゐwolf, and with that ｐhe ゐgobbled 仇up ゐlittle 路юRed 路拆Riding-路ｐHood.

路拆ゐChilde 路答ゐRowland

路拆ゐChilde 路答ゐRowland and ｐhis 仇拣brothers 别twain 路Were ゐ别playing at the 佛ball. Their sister, 路火Burd 路ｐюゐHelen, she ゐ别played 路In the ヰmidst ヰ仇among юthem 佛all.

For 路火Burd 路ｐюゐHelen ゐ仇loved ｐher 仇拣brothers, and they ゐ仇loved ｐher 梆ゐexceedingly. At ゐplay she was юever their ヰcompanion and they 吼cared for ｐher as 仇拣brothers should. And 仇one day юwhen they were at 佛ball ゐ答close to the 火葛churchyard--

路拆ゐChilde 路答ゐRowland kicked it with ｐhis foot 路And 佛caught it on ｐhis knee. At ゐlast as ｐhe ゐ仇○plunged ヰ仇among юthem 佛all, 路答O'er the 火church ｐhe ヰ别made it ゐflee.

Now 路拆ゐChilde 路答ゐRowland was 路火Burd 路ｐюゐHelen's 仇youngest, 金dearest 仇brother, and there was юever a ゐ仇loving 拆ゐrivalry 梆between юthem as to which should win. So with a ゐlaugh--

火Burd 路ｐюゐHelen round about the 拆aisle 路To 梆seek the 佛ball is gone.

Now the 佛ball ｐhad 仇ゐtrundled to the 拆right of the 火church; so, as 路火Burd 路ｐюゐHelen ran the 金nearest way to юget it, she ran 拣contrary to the 仇sun's 桂course, and the ゐ拆light, 拆shining full on ｐher 别face, юsent ｐher shadow ｐ拆behind ｐher. 仇Thus that ｐhappened which will ｐhappen at 拆ヰtimes юwhen 答folk 拣юforget and 仇run {widershins} , that is юagainst the ゐ拆light, so that their 答shadows are out of 拆sight and cannot be 别taken care of 拣ゐproperly.

Now what ｐhappened you will ゐ火learn by and by; ヰ梆拆meanwhile, 路火Burd 路ｐюゐHelen's three 仇拣brothers 别waited for ｐher 火return.

仇But ゐlong they 别waited, and ゐlonger still, 路And she 别came not back юagain.

юThen they grew ゐ葛ヰalarmed, and--

They 佛sought ｐher 梆east, they 佛sought ｐher юwest, 路They 佛sought ｐher 仇up and down. And woe were the ｐ葛hearts of ｐher юbrethren, 路Since she was not to be found.

"fair 路火Burd 路ｐюゐHelen," юsaid the 路ヰ○Magician, "ヰ仇must ｐhave 梆been carried off with ｐher shadow by the 吼fairies юwhen she was 仇running round the 火church {widershins} ; for 吼fairies ｐhave power юwhen 答folk go юagainst the ゐ拆light. "possible it is," 答quoth 路ヰ火ゐMerlin the 路ヰ○Magician 别ゐgravely. "仇but woe be to the ヰman or ヰ仇拣mother's 仇son ｐwho юヰattempts the task if ｐhe be not юwell 佛taught 桂ｐbeforehand what ｐhe is to do."

Now the юゐeldest 仇brother of fair 路火Burd 路ｐюゐHelen was 别brave 梆indeed, 别○danger did not ヰdismay ｐhim, so ｐhe юbegged the 路ヰ○Magician to юtell ｐhim ゐexactly what ｐhe should do, and what ｐhe should not do, as ｐhe was 火ヰdetermined to go and 梆seek ｐhis sister. юThen ｐhe did as the ｐюhen-拆wife ｐhad 答ゐtold ｐhim, not 拣юforgetting to go round {widershins} , so that the 仇sun was 佛ゐ别always on ｐhis 别face.

It was юvery 葛dark at 火first, 拣ｐperhaps because the 仇sun ｐhad 葛part ゐ拆blinded ｐhis 拆eyes; for after a 拆while it 别became 拆ゐ拆twilight, though where the ゐ拆light 别came from 仇none could юtell, ゐюunless through the 佛ゐwalls and the 叼roof; for there were 拆neither 答windows nor ゐcandles. 仇But in the ゐ答ヰgloaming ゐ拆light ｐhe could see a ゐlong passage of 仇rough 葛arches ヰ别made of rock that was transparent and 佛all 仇encrusted with 梆sheep-ゐsilver, rock-spar, and ヰюmany 拆bright 答stones. Now at 仇one юend of the ｐ佛hall was a ヰ葛ゐmarvelous, 仇wondrous, ゐ桂攫glorious couch of юゐvelvet, ゐsilk and 答ゐgold, and on it 别sate fair 路火Burd 路ｐюゐHelen 答ヰcombing ｐher 筐beautiful 答ゐgolden ｐhair with a 答ゐgolden 答comb. 仇But ｐher 别face was 佛all юset and wan, as if it were ヰ别made of 答stone. юWhen she saw 路拆ゐChilde 路答ゐRowland she юnever ヰ叼moved, and ｐher 娥voice 别came ゐ拆like the 娥voice of the юdead as she юsaid:

And ゐlo, юwhen ｐhe 火turned to ゐlook in fear and юヰゐtrembling, there she was ｐher 答own юゐself, ｐher ○joy 拆fighting with ｐher 金fears. And she ゐclasped ｐhim in ｐher 葛ヰarms and 拆cried:

"仇but sit you down, ヰmy 金dearest dear, 路Oh! Woe that ye were 桂born, 路For, 仇come the 路King of 路юゐゐElfland in, 路Your 桂叼fortune is 拣ゐ桂forlorn."

So with 金tears and ヰ拆ゐsmiles she 梆seated ｐhim 拆beside ｐher on the 仇wondrous couch, and they 答ゐtold 梆each 仇other what they 梆each ｐhad 仇拣suffered and 仇done. ｐHe 答ゐtold ｐher ｐhow ｐhe ｐhad 仇come to 路юゐゐElfland. Now after a 拆time 路拆ゐChilde 路答ゐRowland, ｐwho ｐhad ゐtravelled far and ゐtravelled fast, 别became юvery ｐ仇hungry, and 拣юforgetting 佛all about the юsecond ゐюlesson of the 路ヰ○Magician 路ヰ火ゐMerlin, asked ｐhis sister for 仇some 叼food; and she, 梆being still 仇under the юspell of 路юゐゐElfland, could not 桂warn ｐhim of ｐhis 别○danger. She could 答ゐonly ゐlook at ｐhim ゐsadly as she 答rose 仇up and 佛brought ｐhim a 答ゐgolden 别basin full of юbread and ヰゐmilk.

Now in 答those 别days it was ヰ拣manners before 别taking 叼food from ю仇anyone to say thank you with your 拆eyes, and so ○仇just as 路拆ゐChilde 路答ゐRowland was about to put the 答ゐgolden 答bowl to ｐhis ゐlips, ｐhe 别raised ｐhis 拆eyes to ｐhis 拣sister's.

And in an instant ｐhe ヰюヰ拣remembered what the 路别Great 路ヰ○Magician ｐhad юsaid: "拆bite no bit, 仇sup no drop, for if in 路юゐゐElfland you 仇sup 仇one drop or 拆bite 仇one bit, юnever юagain will you see 路ヰMiddle 路火Earth."

So ｐhe dashed the 答bowl to the ground, and standing square and fair, ゐ拆lithe and 仇young and strong, ｐhe 拆cried ゐ拆like a ゐchallenge:

"not a 仇sup will I ゐswallow, not a bit will I 拆bite, till fair 路火Burd 路ｐюゐHelen is юset free."

юThen ヰ梆攫ゐimmediately there was a ゐloud 娥noise ゐ拆like 仇thunder, and a 娥voice was ｐ火heard 别saying:

"fee, {fi} , юfo, {fum} , I ヰюsmell the ゐ仇blood of a 路Christian 路ヰMan. Be ｐhe ゐ拆alive or юdead, ヰmy brand 路Shall dash ｐhis 别brains from ｐhis 别brain-pan."

юThen the 答ゐfolding-桂doors of the vast ｐ佛hall 火burst 答open and the 路King of 路юゐゐElfland ю拣entered ゐ拆like a 桂storm of 拆wind. What ｐhe was 攫ゐreally ゐ拆like 路拆ゐChilde 路答ゐRowland ｐhad not 拆time to see, for with a 答ゐbold cry:

"拆strike, {Bogle} ! Thy ｐ葛hardest if thou {darest} !" ｐHe 仇rushed to ヰ梆meet the foe, ｐhis good 桂sword, that юnever юyet did 别fail, in ｐhis ｐhand.

And 路拆ゐChilde 路答ゐRowland and the 路King of 路юゐゐElfland 佛fought, and 佛fought, and 佛fought, 拆while 路火Burd 路ｐюゐHelen, with ｐher ｐhands ゐclasped, watched юthem in fear and ｐ答hope.

So they 佛fought, and 佛fought, and 佛fought, until at ゐlast 路拆ゐChilde 路答ゐRowland 梆beat the 路King of 路юゐゐElfland to ｐhis 梆knees. 吼Whereupon ｐhe 拆cried, "I 梆ゐyield ヰme. Thou ｐhast 梆beaten ヰme in fair 拆fight."

юThen 路拆ゐChilde 路答ゐRowland юsaid, "I grant thee ヰ火mercy if thou ゐwilt ゐ梆release ヰmy sister and ヰmy 仇拣brothers from 佛all юゐspells and ヰenchantments, and ゐюlet 仇us go back to 路ヰMiddle 路火Earth."

So that was 梆agreed; and the 路юゐElfin 路King юwent to a 答ゐgolden юchest юwhence ｐhe took a 拆phial that was ゐfilled with a ゐ仇blood-юred ゐliquor. And with this ゐliquor ｐhe 娥anointed the 金ears and the 拆ゐeyelids, the ゐnostrils, the ゐlips, and the finger-tips of the bodies of 路火Burd 路ｐюゐHelen's two 仇拣brothers that ゐlay as юdead in two 答ゐgolden 拣coffers.

And ヰ梆攫ゐimmediately they sprang to ゐ拆life and ゐ吼declared that their 答ゐsouls 答ゐonly ｐhad 梆been away, 仇but ｐhad now 火returned.

After this the 路юゐElfin 路King юsaid a 葛charm which took away the юvery ゐlast bit of ヰenchantment, and {adown} the ｐ筐huge ｐ佛hall that 答showed as if it were ゐlit by the юsetting 仇sun, and through the ゐlong passage of 仇rough 葛arches ヰ别made of rock that was transparent and 佛all 仇encrusted with 梆sheep-ゐsilver, rock-spar, and ヰюmany 拆bright 答stones, where 拆ゐ拆twilight 别reigned, the three 仇拣brothers and their sister passed. юThen the door 答opened in the 梆green ｐhill, it ゐclicked ｐ拆behind юthem, and they ゐюleft the 路葛Dark 路Tower of the 路King of 路юゐゐElfland юnever to 火return.

For, no 叼sooner were they in the ゐ拆light of day, than they found ヰюゐthemselves at ｐ答home.

仇But fair 路火Burd 路ｐюゐHelen took care юnever to go {widershins} round a 火church юagain.

The 拆wise ヰюmen of 路答Gotham

Of 拆buying of 梆sheep

There were two ヰюmen of 路答Gotham, and 仇one of юthem was 答going to ヰ葛market to 路Nottingham to buy 梆sheep, and the 仇other 别came from the ヰ葛market, and they 答both ヰюmet юtogether upon 路Nottingham bridge.

"where are you 答going?" юSaid the 仇one ｐwho 别came from 路Nottingham.

"ヰmarry," юsaid ｐhe that was 答going to 路Nottingham, "I 别юam 答going to buy 梆sheep."

"buy 梆sheep?" юSaid the 仇other; "and which way will you bring юthem ｐ答home?"

"ヰmarry," юsaid the 仇other, "I will bring юthem 答over this bridge."

"by 路Robin 路ｐHood," юsaid ｐhe that 别came from 路Nottingham, "仇but thou ゐshalt not."

"by 路ヰ别Maid 路ヰ攫Marion," юsaid ｐhe that was 答going thither, "仇but I will."

"you will not," юsaid the 仇one.

"I will."

юThen they 梆beat their 别staves юagainst the ground, 仇one юagainst the 仇other, as if there ｐhad 梆been a ｐ仇hundred 梆sheep 梆between юthem.

"ｐ答ゐhold in," юsaid 仇one; "beware ゐюlest ヰmy 梆sheep ゐ梆leap 答over the bridge."

"I care not," юsaid the 仇other; "they shall not 仇come this way."

"仇but they shall," юsaid the 仇other.

юThen the 仇other юsaid, "路If that thou ヰ别make ヰ仇much to do, I will put ヰmy 拣fingers in thy ヰmouth."

"路Will you?" юSaid the 仇other.

Now, as they were at their юcontention, 仇another ヰman of 路答Gotham 别came from the ヰ葛market with a sack of ヰ梆meal upon a ｐ桂horse, and 梆seeing and ｐ金hearing ｐhis 别拣neighbours at 拆strife about 梆sheep, though there were 仇none 梆between юthem, юsaid:

"ah, 叼ゐfools! Will you юever ゐ火learn wisdom? ｐюゐHelp ヰme, and ゐlay ヰmy sack upon ヰmy 答ゐ拣shoulders."

They did so, and ｐhe юwent to the 拆side of the bridge, {unloosened} the ヰmouth of the sack, and shook 佛all ｐhis ヰ梆meal out into the river.

"now, 别拣neighbours," ｐhe юsaid, "ｐhow ヰ仇much ヰ梆meal is there in ヰmy sack?"

"ヰmarry," юsaid they, "there is 仇none at 佛all."

"now, by ヰmy 别faith," юsaid ｐhe, "梆even as ヰ仇much wit as is in your two ｐюheads to stir 仇up 拆strife about a thing you ｐhave not."

Which was the 拆wisest of 梆these three 火persons, ○仇judge 桂юゐyourself.

ｐюHedge ｐhigh 仇enough"]

Of ｐю○hedging a cuckoo

仇Once upon a 拆time the ヰюmen of 路答Gotham would ｐhave юkept the 路Cuckoo so that she ヰ拆might sing 佛all the year, and in the ヰmidst of their town they ヰ别made a ｐюhedge round in 仇ヰcompass and they got a 路Cuckoo, and put ｐher into it, and юsaid, "路Sing there 佛all through the year, or thou ゐshalt ｐhave 拆neither ヰ梆meat nor 佛water." The 路Cuckoo, as 叼soon as she 拣梆perceived ｐ火юゐherself within the ｐюhedge, ゐflew away. "a ю○vengeance on ｐher!" юSaid they. "we did not ヰ别make our ｐюhedge ｐhigh 仇enough."

Of юsending 梆cheeses

There was a ヰman of 路答Gotham ｐwho юwent to the ヰ葛market at 路Nottingham to юsell 梆cheese, and as ｐhe was 答going down the ｐhill to 路Nottingham bridge, 仇one of ｐhis 梆cheeses юfell out of ｐhis ゐwallet and 答ゐrolled down the ｐhill. "ah, gaffer," юsaid the юゐfellow, "can you 仇run to ヰ葛market ゐ答alone? I will юsend 仇one after 仇another after you." юThen ｐhe ゐ别laid down ｐhis ゐwallet and took out the 梆cheeses and 答ゐrolled юthem down the ｐhill. 仇Some юwent into 仇one bush, and 仇some юwent into 仇another.

"I 葛charge you 佛all to ヰ梆meet ヰme near the ヰ葛market-ゐ别place," 拆cried ｐhe; and юwhen the юゐfellow 别came to the ヰ葛market to ヰ梆meet ｐhis 梆cheeses, ｐhe 别stayed there till the ヰ葛market was 金ゐnearly 仇done. юThen ｐhe юwent about to 拆inquire of ｐhis юfriends and 别拣neighbours, and 仇other ヰюmen, if they did see ｐhis 梆cheeses 仇come to the ヰ葛market.

"路飧扳ｐWho should bring юthem?" юSaid 仇one of the ヰ葛market ヰюmen.

"ヰmarry, ヰюゐthemselves," юsaid the юゐfellow; "they know the way юwell 仇enough."

ｐHe юsaid, "路A ю○vengeance on юthem 佛all. I did fear, to see юthem 仇run so fast, that they would 仇run beyond the ヰ葛market. I 别юam now ゐfully 拣别persuaded that they ヰ仇must be now 佛ゐヰ答almost at 路桂York." 吼Whereupon ｐhe 桂forthwith ｐ拆拣hired a ｐ桂horse to 拆ride to 路桂York, to 梆seek ｐhis 梆cheeses where they were not; 仇but to this day no ヰman can юtell ｐhim of ｐhis 梆cheeses.

Of drowning 梆ゐeels

юWhen 路Good {Friday} 别came, the ヰюmen of 路答Gotham cast their ｐюheads юtogether what to do with their 拆white ｐюherrings, their юred ｐюherrings, their sprats, and 仇other 佛ゐsalt fish. 仇One 仇ゐconsulted with the 仇other, and 梆agreed that 仇such fish should be cast into their pond which was in the ヰmiddle of the town), that they ヰ拆might 梆breed юagainst the юnext year, and юevery ヰman that ｐhad 佛ゐsalt fish ゐюleft cast юthem into the 叼pool.

"I ｐhave ヰюmany 拆white ｐюherrings," юsaid 仇one.

"I ｐhave ヰюmany sprats," юsaid 仇another.

"I ｐhave ヰюmany юred ｐюherrings," юsaid the 仇other.

"I ｐhave ヰ仇much 佛ゐsalt fish. ゐюLet 佛all go into the pond or 叼pool, and we shall fare ゐ拆like ゐ桂lords юnext year."

At the beginning of юnext year ゐ答following the ヰюmen drew near the pond to ｐhave their fish, and there was 仇nothing 仇but a 别great 梆eel. "ah," юsaid they 佛all, "a ヰmischief on this 梆eel, for ｐhe ｐhas 梆eaten 仇up 佛all our fish."

"what shall we do to ｐhim?" юSaid 仇one to the 仇other.

"kill ｐhim," юsaid 仇one.

"chop ｐhim into 梆pieces," юsaid 仇another.

"not so," юsaid 仇another; "ゐюlet 仇us drown ｐhim."

"be it so," юsaid 佛all. And they юwent to 仇another pond, and cast the 梆eel into the pond. "ゐlie there and shift for 桂юゐyourself, for no ｐюゐhelp thou ゐshalt ｐhave from 仇us"; and they ゐюleft the 梆eel to drown.

Of юsending юrent

仇Once on a 拆time the ヰюmen of 路答Gotham ｐhad 拣forgotten to pay their ゐゐ桂landlord. 仇One юsaid to the 仇other, "路To-ヰmorrow is our pay-day, and what shall we 拆find to юsend our ヰ仇money to our ゐゐ桂landlord?"

The 仇one юsaid, "路This day I ｐhave 佛caught a ｐhare, and ｐhe shall carry it, for ｐhe is ゐ拆light of foot."

"be it so," юsaid 佛all; "ｐhe shall ｐhave a ゐюletter and a 火purse to put our ヰ仇money in, and we shall юdirect ｐhim the 拆right way." So юwhen the ゐю拣letters were written and the ヰ仇money put in a 火purse, they 拆tied it round the ｐ吼hare's юneck, 别saying, "路火First you go to 路ゐLancaster, юthen thou ヰ仇must go to 路ゐ仇拣Loughborough, and {Newarke} is our ゐゐ桂landlord, and ヰюcommend 仇us to ｐhim, and there is ｐhis 筐dues."

The ｐhare, as 叼soon as ｐhe was out of their ｐhands, ran on ゐalong the 仇country way. 仇Some 拆cried, "路Thou ヰ仇must go to 路ゐLancaster 火first."

"ゐюlet the ｐhare ゐ答alone," юsaid 仇another; "ｐhe can юtell a 金nearer way than the юbest of 仇us 佛all. ゐюLet ｐhim go."

仇Another юsaid, "路It is a 仇subtle ｐhare; ゐюlet ｐher ゐ答alone; she will not 梆keep the ｐ拆highway for fear of dogs."

梆Seeking]

Of counting

On a 火certain 拆time there were юゐtwelve ヰюmen of 路答Gotham ｐwho юwent fishing, and 仇some юwent into the 佛water and 仇some on dry ground; and, as they were 仇ヰcoming back, 仇one of юthem юsaid, "路We ｐhave ю拣ventured ヰ仇much this day 别wading; I pray 路God that 仇none of 仇us that did 仇come from ｐ答home be drowned."

"ヰmarry," юsaid 仇one, "ゐюlet 仇us see about that. юゐTwelve of 仇us 别came out." And юevery ヰman did count ゐюeleven, and the юゐtwelfth ヰman did юnever count ｐヰюゐhimself.

"ゐalas!" юSaid 仇one to 仇another, "仇one of 仇us is drowned." They юwent back to the brook where they ｐhad 梆been fishing, and ゐlooked 仇up and down for ｐhim that was drowned, and ヰ别made 别great ゐヰю别lamentation. A 桂courtier 别came 拆riding by, and ｐhe did ask what they were 梆seeking, and why they were so 答sorrowful. "oh," юsaid they, "this day we 别came to fish in this brook, and there were юゐtwelve of 仇us, and 仇one is drowned."

"why," юsaid the 桂courtier, "count ヰme ｐhow ヰюmany of you there be"; and 仇one counted ゐюeleven and did not count ｐヰюゐhimself. "юwell," юsaid the 桂courtier, "what will you give ヰme if I 拆find the юゐtwelfth ヰman?"

"sir," юsaid they, "佛all the ヰ仇money we ｐhave."

"give ヰme the ヰ仇money," юsaid the 桂courtier; and ｐhe began with the 火first, and 别gave ｐhim a whack 答over the 答ゐ拣shoulders that ｐhe 答groaned, and юsaid, "路There is 仇one," and ｐhe 火served 佛all of юthem that they 答groaned; 仇but юwhen ｐhe 别came to the ゐlast ｐhe 别gave ｐhim a good ゐblow, 别saying, "路ｐHere is the юゐtwelfth ヰman."

"路God ゐюbless you on your ｐ葛heart," юsaid 佛all the 仇ヰcompany; "you ｐhave found our 别neighbour."

答仇Caporushes

仇Once upon a 拆time, a ゐlong, ゐlong 拆while ago, юwhen 佛all the 火ゐworld was 仇young and 佛all 桂sorts of 别strange things ｐhappened, there ゐlived a юvery rich ○юゐヰgentleman ｐ叼whose 拆wife ｐhad 拆died ゐ梆leaving ｐhim three ゐ仇ゐlovely 佛拣daughters. They were as the apple of ｐhis eye, and ｐhe ゐ仇loved юthem 梆ゐexceedingly.

Now 仇one day ｐhe wanted to 拆find out if they ゐ仇loved ｐhim in 火return, so ｐhe юsaid to the юゐeldest, "路ｐHow ヰ仇much do you ゐ仇love ヰme, ヰmy dear?"

And she 拣answered as pat as ヰmay be, "路As I ゐ仇love ヰmy ゐ拆life."

"юvery good, ヰmy dear," юsaid ｐhe, and 别gave ｐher a kiss. юThen ｐhe юsaid to the юsecond 火girl, "路ｐHow ヰ仇much do you ゐ仇love ヰme, ヰmy dear?"

And she 拣answered as swift as 佛thought, "路юBetter than 佛all the 火ゐworld 拆beside."

"good!" ｐHe ゐ拆replied, and patted ｐher on the 梆cheek. юThen ｐhe 火turned to the 仇youngest, ｐwho was 佛ゐalso the prettiest.

"and ｐhow ヰ仇much do you_ ゐ仇love ヰme, ヰmy 金dearest?"

Now the 仇youngest 佛daughter was not 答ゐonly pretty, she was ゐюclever. So she 佛thought a ヰ答ヰmoment, юthen she юsaid ゐ答ゐslowly:

"I ゐ仇love you as юfresh ヰ梆meat ゐ仇loves 佛ゐsalt!"

Now юwhen ｐher father ｐ火heard this ｐhe was юvery angry, because ｐhe 攫ゐreally ゐ仇loved ｐher ヰmore than the 仇拣others.

"what!" ｐHe юsaid. "if that is 佛all you give ヰme in 火return for 佛all 拆I've given you, out of ヰmy ｐhouse you go." So there and юthen ｐhe 火turned ｐher out of the ｐ答home where she ｐhad 梆been 桂born and юbred, and 仇shut the door in ｐher 别face.

Not 答knowing where to go, she 拣wandered on, and she 拣wandered on, till she 别came to a big юfen where the 梆reeds grew юever so 佛tall and the 仇rushes 别swayed in the 拆wind ゐ拆like a 梆ゐfield of 桂corn. There she 别sate down and ゐplaited ｐ火юゐherself an 答拣佛overall of 仇rushes and a cap to ヰmatch, so as to ｐ拆hide ｐher 拆fine ゐ答clothes, and ｐher 筐beautiful 答ゐgolden ｐhair that was 佛all юset with ヰゐmilk-拆white 火ゐpearls. For she was a 拆wise 火girl, and 佛thought that in 仇such ゐ答ゐlonely 仇country, {mayhap} , 仇some robber ヰ拆might 佛fall in with ｐher and kill ｐher to юget ｐher 拆fine ゐ答clothes and ○叼ゐjewels.

It took a ゐlong 拆time to ゐplait the юdress and cap, and 拆while she ゐplaited she sang a ゐlittle song:

"ｐ拆hide ヰmy ｐhair, 路O cap 答o's 仇rushes, 路ｐ拆Hide ヰmy ｐ葛heart, 路O 答robe 答o's 仇rushes. Sure! ヰMy answer ｐhad no 佛ゐfault, I ゐ仇love ｐhim ヰmore than ｐhe ゐ仇loves 佛ゐsalt."

And the юfen 火birds 别sate and ゐlistened and sang back to ｐher:

"cap 答o's 仇rushes, юshed no tear, 路答Robe 答o's 仇rushes, ｐhave no fear; 路With 梆these 火words if 佛ゐfault ｐ梆he'd 拆find, 路Sure your father ヰ仇must be ゐ拆blind."

юWhen ｐher task was finished she put on ｐher 答robe of 仇rushes and it ｐhid 佛all ｐher 拆fine ゐ答clothes, and she put on the cap and it ｐhid 佛all ｐher 筐beautiful ｐhair, so that she ゐlooked 拆quite a ヰcommon 仇country 火girl. 仇But the юfen 火birds ゐflew away, singing as they ゐflew:

"cap-o-仇rushes! We can see, 路答Robe 答o's 仇rushes! What you be, 路Fair and ゐ梆clean, and 拆fine and 拆tidy, 路So 筐you'll be whate'er 拆betide ye."

By this 拆time she was юvery, юvery ｐ仇hungry, so she 拣wandered on, and she 拣wandered on; 仇but ne'er a cottage or a ｐヰゐhamlet did she see, till ○仇just at 仇sun-юsetting she 别came on a 别great ｐhouse on the юedge of the юfen. It ｐhad a 拆fine 仇front door to it; 仇but ヰ拆mindful of ｐher юdress of 仇rushes she юwent round to the back. And there she saw a strapping fat 仇ゐ攫scullion washing pots and pans with a юvery 仇ゐsulky 别face. So, 梆being a ゐюclever 火girl, she юguessed what the ヰ别maid was wanting, and юsaid:

"if I ヰmay ｐhave a 拆night's ゐ○lodging, I will 仇scrub the pots and pans for you."

"why! ｐ金Here's ゐ仇luck," ゐ拆replied the 仇ゐ拣scullery-ヰ别maid, юever so ゐ梆pleased. "I was ○仇just wanting ゐbadly to go a-佛walking with ヰmy 梆ｐ葛sweetheart. So if you will do ヰmy 火work you shall share ヰmy юbed and ｐhave a 拆bite of ヰmy 仇supper. 答ゐOnly ヰ拆mind you 仇scrub the pots ゐ梆clean or cook will be at ヰme."

Now юnext ヰ桂morning the pots were 别scraped so ゐ梆clean that they ゐlooked ゐ拆like new, and the 佛saucepans were ゐpolished ゐ拆like ゐsilver, and the cook юsaid to the 仇ゐ攫scullion, "路飧扳ｐWho ゐ梆cleaned 梆these pots? Not you, 拆I'll swear." So the ヰ别maid ｐhad to 仇up and out with the 叼truth. юThen the cook would ｐhave 火turned away the 答ゐold ヰ别maid and put on the new, 仇but the ゐlatter would not ｐhear of it.

"the ヰ别maid was 拆kind to ヰme and 别gave ヰme a 拆night's ゐ○lodging," she юsaid. "so now I will stay without 别wage and do the 火dirty 火work for ｐher."

So 路答仇Caporushes--for so they 佛ゐcalled ｐher since she would give no 仇other 别name--别stayed on and ゐ梆cleaned the pots and 别scraped the 佛saucepans.

Now it so ｐhappened that ｐher ヰ拣master's 仇son 别came of 别age, and to юゐ别celebrate the 别occasion a 佛ball was given to the 别拣ｐneighbourhood, for the 仇young ヰman was a grand dancer, and ゐ仇loved 仇nothing so юwell as a 仇country ヰюmeasure. It was a юvery 拆fine 葛party, and after 仇supper was 火served, the 火servants were ゐallowed to go and watch the ゐquality from the ゐ拣gallery of the 佛ball-叼room.

仇But 路答仇Caporushes 筐refused to go, for she 佛ゐalso was a grand dancer, and she was 别afraid that юwhen she ｐ火heard the ゐfiddles 葛starting a ヰюmerry ○jig, she ヰ拆might 葛start dancing. So she 筐excused ｐ火юゐherself by 别saying she was too 拆拣tired with 别scraping pots and washing 佛saucepans; and юwhen the 仇拣others юwent off, she юcrept 仇up to ｐher юbed.

仇But ゐalas! And ゐalack-a-day! The door ｐhad 梆been ゐюleft 答open, and as she ゐlay in ｐher юbed she could ｐhear the ゐ拣fiddlers ゐfiddling away and the ヰtramp of dancing 梆feet.

юThen she 仇upped and off with ｐher cap and 答robe of 仇rushes, and there she was юever so 拆fine and 拆tidy. She was in the 佛ball-叼room in a 拆trice ○娥joining in the ○jig, and 仇none was ヰmore 筐beautiful or юbetter юdressed than she. 拆While as for ｐher dancing...!

ｐHer ヰ拣master's 仇son ゐsingled ｐher out at 仇once, and with the 拆finest of 答bows 别○engaged ｐher as ｐhis 葛partner for the юrest of the 拆night. So she danced away to ｐher ｐ葛heart's юcontent, 拆while the ｐ答whole 叼room was agog, 拆trying to 拆find out ｐwho the 筐beautiful 仇young 别○stranger could be. 仇But she юkept ｐher 答own counsel and, ヰ别making 仇some 筐excuse, ゐslipped away before the 佛ball finished; so юwhen ｐher юゐfellow-火servants 别came to юbed, there she was in ｐ火hers in ｐher cap and 答robe of 仇rushes, юpretending to be fast ゐ梆asleep.

юNext ヰ桂morning, ｐюhowever, the ヰ别maids could 佛talk of 仇nothing 仇but the 筐beautiful 别○stranger.

"you should ｐha's 梆seen ｐher," they юsaid. "oh юyes, you will," they ゐ拆replied, "for 仇young ヰmaster ｐhas 桂拣ordered 仇another 佛ball to-拆night in ｐ答hopes she will 仇come to dance юagain."

仇But 仇once юagain 路答仇Caporushes юkept ｐher 答own counsel and ○仇just ゐslipped away on 仇some 筐excuse in 拆time, so that юwhen ｐher юゐfellow-火servants 别came to their юbeds they found ｐher in ｐ火hers, юpretending to be fast ゐ梆asleep; 仇but ｐher 梆cheeks were 佛all ゐ仇flushed and ｐher юbreath 别came fast. юThen 路答仇Caporushes 答ゐtold ｐ火юゐherself she would not dance юagain, since it was not fit for a gay 仇young ヰmaster to be in ゐ仇love with ｐhis 仇ゐ拣scullery-ヰ别maid; 仇but, ゐalas! 仇But ｐhe didn't. ｐHe юspent ｐhis ｐ答whole 拆time ゐlooking for ｐhis 筐beautiful dancer, 仇but go where ｐhe ヰ拆might, and ask ｐ叼whom ｐhe would, ｐhe юnever ｐ火heard юanything about ｐher. And day by day ｐhe grew thinner and thinner, and 别ゐpaler and 别ゐpaler, until at ゐlast ｐhe took to ｐhis юbed.

And the ｐ梆housekeeper 别came to the cook and юsaid, "路Cook the 拆nicest dinner you can cook, for 仇young ヰmaster 梆eats 仇nothing."

юThen the cook 吼prepared 叼soups, and ○юゐjellies, and 梆ヰcreams, and 答roast chicken, and юbread 佛sauce; 仇but the 仇young ヰman would 仇none of юthem.

юThen the ｐ梆housekeeper 别came 拆crying and юsaid to the cook, "路Prepare 仇some 叼gruel for 仇young ヰmaster. {Mayhap} ｐ梆he'd 别take that. If not ｐhe will die for ゐ仇love of the 筐beautiful dancer. If she could see ｐhim now she would ｐhave pity on ｐhim."

So 路答仇Caporushes 火stirred the 叼gruel, and what did she do 仇but ゐslips 仇young ヰ拣master's ring into it before the cook 别came back!

юThen the 仇ゐbutler took the 仇cup 仇吼upstairs on a ゐsilver ゐsalver. 仇But юwhen the 仇young ヰmaster saw it ｐhe 别waved it away, till the 仇ゐbutler with 金tears юbegged ｐhim ○仇just to 别taste it.

So the 仇young ヰmaster took a ゐsilver 叼spoon and 火stirred the 叼gruel; and ｐhe юゐfelt 仇ヰsomething ｐ葛hard at the bottom of the 仇cup. And юwhen ｐhe fished it 仇up, ゐlo! "I did," she юsaid, for she was ｐhalf-ゐ梆pleased and ｐhalf-拆frightened.

юThen ｐhe ゐlooked at ｐher 佛all 答over and юsaid, "路No, you didn't! 筐You're too stout! юTell ヰme ｐwho ヰ别made it and you shan't be ｐ葛ヰharmed!"

юThen the cook began to cry. "if you ゐ梆please, sir, I did_ ヰ别make it; 仇but 路答仇Caporushes 火stirred it."

"and ｐwho is 路答仇Caporushes?" Asked the 仇young ヰman.

юThen the 仇young ヰman 拆sighed and юfell back on ｐhis ゐpillow. "юsend 路答仇Caporushes ｐhere," ｐhe юsaid in a 别faint 娥voice; for ｐhe 攫ゐreally was юvery near 拆dying.

And юwhen 路答仇Caporushes 别came ｐhe ○仇just ゐlooked at ｐher cap and ｐher 答robe of 仇rushes and 火turned ｐhis 别face to the 佛wall; 仇but ｐhe asked ｐher in a 梆weak ゐlittle 娥voice, "路From ｐ叼whom did you юget that ring?"

Now the ヰmarriage 梆feast was to be the 拆finest юever 梆seen; 仇but 路答仇Caporushes юwent to ｐher юfriend the cook and юsaid:

Now юwhen the 仇ヰcompany 别sate down to 别table their 别faces were full of ヰ拆ゐsmiles and юcontent, for 佛all the dishes ゐlooked so 拆nice and 别tasty; 仇but no 叼sooner ｐhad the юguests 仇begun to 梆eat than their 别faces юfell; for 仇nothing can be 别tasty without 佛ゐsalt.

юThen 路答仇Caporushes ゐ拆blind father, ｐ叼whom ｐhis 佛daughter ｐhad 梆seated юnext to ｐher, 火burst out 拆crying.

юThen the 答ゐold ヰman sobbed, "I ｐhad a 佛daughter ｐ叼whom I ゐ仇loved 金ゐdearly, 金ゐdearly. And I asked ｐher ｐhow ヰ仇much she ゐ仇loved ヰme, and she ゐ拆replied, 'Asюfresh ヰ梆meat ゐ仇loves 佛ゐsalt. And a cap to ヰmatch]

The 别babes in the wood

Now ponder юwell, you 吼parents dear, 路梆These 火words which I shall 拆write; 路A 答ゐdoleful 桂story you shall ｐhear, 路In 拆time 佛brought 桂forth to ゐ拆light. A ○юゐヰgentleman of good account 路In 路桂Norfolk юゐdwelt of ゐ别late, 路飧扳ｐWho did in honour far 拣ヰsurmount 路ヰ答Most ヰюmen of ｐhis 别estate.

Sore sick ｐhe was and ゐ拆like to die, 路No ｐюゐhelp ｐhis ゐ拆life could 别save; 路ｐHis 拆wife by ｐhim as sick did ゐlie, 路And 答both {possest} 仇one 别grave. No ゐ仇love 梆between 梆these two was ゐlost, 路梆Each was to 仇other 拆kind; 路In ゐ仇love they ゐlived, in ゐ仇love they 拆died, 路And ゐюleft two 别babes ｐ拆behind:

The 仇one a 拆fine and pretty boy 路Not passing three 金years 答ゐold, 路The 仇other a 火girl ヰmore 仇young than ｐhe, 路And 别ヰframed in 筐beauty's ヰ答ゐmould. The father ゐюleft ｐhis ゐlittle 仇son, 路As ゐ别ゐplainly did appear, 路юWhen ｐhe to 火perfect 别age should 仇come, 路Three ｐ仇hundred pounds a year;

And to ｐhis ゐlittle 佛daughter 路○别Jane 路拆Five ｐ仇hundred pounds in 答ゐgold, 路To be 别paid down on ヰmarriage-day, 路Which ヰ拆might not be 答ゐcontrolled. 仇But if the ゐchildren chanced to die 路Ere they to 别age should 仇come, 路Their 仇uncle should юpossess their юゐwealth; 路For so the will did 仇run.

"now, 仇brother," юsaid the 拆dying ヰman, "路ゐLook to ヰmy ゐchildren dear; 路Be good 仇unto ヰmy boy and 火girl, 路No юfriends юゐelse ｐhave they ｐhere; 路To 路God and you I юヰюrecommend 路ヰMy ゐchildren dear this day; 路仇But ゐlittle 拆while be sure we ｐhave 路Within this 火ゐworld to stay.

"you ヰ仇must be father and ヰ仇mother 答both, 路And 仇uncle, 佛all in 仇one; 路God 答knows what will 仇become of юthem 路юWhen I 别юam юdead and gone." With that {bespake} their ヰ仇mother dear: "o 仇brother 拆kind," 答quoth she, "路You are the ヰman ヰ仇must bring our 别babes 路To юゐwealth or ヰ拣misery.

"and if you 梆keep юthem 吼ゐcarefully, 路юThen 路God will you 桂reward; 路仇But if you 仇拣拆otherwise should 梆deal, 路God will your 梆deeds 葛regard." With ゐlips as 答ゐcold as юany 答stone, 路They kissed their ゐchildren ヰ佛small: "路God ゐюbless you 答both, ヰmy ゐchildren dear!" With that the 金tears did 佛fall.

梆These 梆speeches юthen their 仇brother 别spake 路To this sick 仇couple there: "the 梆keeping of your ゐlittle 仇ones, 路梆Sweet sister, do not fear; 路God юnever prosper ヰme nor ヰ拆mine, 路Nor 佛aught юゐelse that I ｐhave, 路If I do wrong your ゐchildren dear 路юWhen you are ゐ别laid in 别grave!"

The 吼parents 梆being юdead and gone, 路The ゐchildren ｐ答home ｐhe 别takes, 路And brings юthem 别straight 仇unto ｐhis ｐhouse, 路Where ヰ仇much of юthem ｐhe ヰ别makes. ｐHe ｐhad not юkept 梆these pretty 别babes 路A юゐヰ仇twelvemonth and a day, 路仇But, for their юゐwealth, ｐhe did 拆devise 路To ヰ别make юthem 答both away.

ｐHe 葛bargained with two 仇攫ruffians strong, 路Which were of 拣攫furious ヰ叼mood, 路That they should 别take 梆these ゐchildren 仇young. And ゐslay юthem in a wood. ｐHe 答ゐtold ｐhis 拆wife an 葛artful 别tale 路ｐHe would the ゐchildren юsend 路To be 佛brought 仇up in 路ゐ仇London town 路With 仇one that was ｐhis юfriend.

Away юthen юwent 答those pretty 别babes, 路○娥Rejoicing at that 拆tide, 路○娥Rejoicing with a ヰюmerry ヰ拆mind 路They should on cock-ｐ桂horse 拆ride. They 别prate and prattle ゐюゐpleasantly, 路As they 拆ride on the way, 路To 答those that should their 拣butchers be 路And 火work their ゐ拆lives' decay:

So that the pretty 梆speech they ｐhad 路ヰ别Made 路ヰ火Murder ｐ葛heart ゐюrelent; 路And they that 仇拣undertook the 梆deed 路Full sore now did юrepent. юYet 仇one of юthem, ヰmore ｐ葛hard of ｐ葛heart, 路Did vow to do ｐhis 葛charge, 路Because the юwretch that ｐ拆拣hired ｐhim 路ｐHad 别paid ｐhim юvery ゐ葛large.

The 仇other 答won't agree 吼thereto, 路So there they 佛fall to 拆strife; 路With 仇one 仇another they did 拆fight 路About the ゐchildren's ゐ拆life; 路And ｐhe that was of ヰ拆ゐmildest ヰ叼mood 路Did ゐslay the 仇other there, 路Within an 仇юunfrequented wood; 路The 别babes did 别quake for fear!

ｐHe took the ゐchildren by the ｐhand, 路金Tears standing in their eye, 路And bade юthem 别straightway ゐfollow ｐhim, 路And ゐlook they did not cry; 路And two ゐlong ヰ拆ゐmiles ｐhe ゐюled юthem on, 路拆While they for 叼food ヰゐ别complain: "stay ｐhere," 答quoth ｐhe, "拆I'll bring you юbread, 路юWhen I 仇come back юagain."

梆These pretty 别babes, with ｐhand in ｐhand, 路юWent 拣wandering 仇up and down; 路仇But юnever ヰmore could see the ヰman 路答Approaching from the town. Their pretty ゐlips with ゐ拣blackberries 路Were 佛all {besmeared} and 拆dyed; 路And юwhen they saw the {darksome} 拆night, 路They 拣sat юthem down and 拆cried.

仇Thus 拣wandered 梆these poor innocents, 路Till юdeath did юend their 梆grief; 路In 仇one 仇拣another's 葛ヰarms they 拆died, 路As wanting due ゐ梆relief: No ю攫burial this pretty pair 路From юany ヰman 梆receives, 路Till 路Robin 路ююRedbreast 拆ゐpiously 路Did 仇cover юthem with ゐ梆leaves.

And now the ｐюheavy wrath of 路God 路Upon their 仇uncle юfell; 路Yea, 金fearful 梆fiends did ｐ佛haunt ｐhis ｐhouse, 路ｐHis conscience юゐfelt a ｐюhell: ｐHis 葛barns were 拆拣fired, ｐhis goods 筐ヰconsumed, 路ｐHis ゐlands were barren ヰ别made, 路ｐHis cattle 拆died within the 梆ゐfield, 路And 仇nothing with ｐhim 别stayed.

And in a 娥voyage to 路桂Portugal 路Two of ｐhis 仇sons did die; 路And to ゐ叼conclude, ｐヰюゐhimself was 佛brought 路To want and ヰ拣misery: ｐHe 佛pawned and ヰ桂○mortgaged 佛all ｐhis ゐland 路Ere юseven 金years 别came about. And now at ゐlast this wicked act 路Did by this ヰ梆means 仇come out.

The юゐfellow that did 别take in ｐhand 路梆These ゐchildren for to kill, 路Was for a 拣robbery ○仇○judged to die, 路仇Such was 路God's ゐюblessed will: 路飧扳ｐWho did юconfess the юvery 叼truth, 路As ｐhere ｐhath 梆been ゐ别displayed: The 仇uncle ｐhaving 拆died in ○别jail, 路Where ｐhe for юdebt was ゐ别laid.

You that ю拣executors be ヰ别made, 路And 答拣梆拣overseers 梆eke, 路Of ゐchildren that be 拣ゐfatherless, 路And infants ヰ拆ゐmild and ヰ梆meek, 路别Take you ヰexample by this thing, 路And 梆ゐyield to 梆each ｐhis 拆right, 路ゐюLest 路God with 仇ゐ拆suchlike ヰ拣misery 路Your wicked ヰ拆minds 拆requite.

The юred юettin

There was 仇once a widow that ゐlived on a ヰ佛small bit of ground, which she юrented from a 葛ヰfarmer. And she ｐhad two 仇sons; and by and by it was 拆time for the 拆wife to юsend юthem away to 梆seek their 桂叼fortune. So she 答ゐtold ｐher юゐeldest 仇son 仇one day to 别take a can and bring ｐher 佛water from the юwell, that she ヰ拆might 别bake a 别cake for ｐhim; and ｐюhowever ヰ仇much or ｐюhowever ゐlittle 佛water ｐhe ヰ拆might bring, the 别cake would be 别great or ヰ佛small 桂ゐaccordingly, and that 别cake was to be 佛all that she could give ｐhim юwhen ｐhe юwent on ｐhis ゐtravels.

The ゐlad юwent away with the can to the юwell, and ゐfilled it with 佛water, and юthen 别came away ｐ答home юagain; 仇but the can 梆being 答broken, the ヰ答most 葛part of the 佛water ｐhad 仇run out before ｐhe got back. So ｐhis 别cake was юvery ヰ佛small; юyet ヰ佛small as it was, ｐhis ヰ仇mother asked ｐhim if ｐhe was ゐwilling to 别take the ｐhalf of it with ｐher ゐюblessing, юゐtelling ｐhim that, if ｐhe 答chose rather to 别take the ｐ答whole, ｐhe would 答ゐonly юget it with ｐher 火curse. The 仇young ヰman, thinking ｐhe ヰ拆might ｐhave to travel a far way, and not 答knowing юwhen or ｐhow ｐhe ヰ拆might юget 仇other provisions, юsaid ｐhe would ゐ拆like to ｐhave the ｐ答whole 别cake, 仇come of ｐhis ヰ仇拣mother's {malison} what ヰ拆might; so she 别gave ｐhim the ｐ答whole 别cake, and ｐher {malison} ゐalong with it. юThen ｐhe took ｐhis 仇brother 拆aside, and 别gave ｐhim a 拆knife to 梆keep till ｐhe should 仇come back, 拆拣desiring ｐhim to ゐlook at it юevery ヰ桂morning, and as ゐlong as it 筐continued to be ゐclear, юthen ｐhe ヰ拆might be sure that the 答owner of it was юwell; 仇but if it grew dim and 仇rusty, юthen for 火certain 仇some ill ｐhad 佛ゐbefallen ｐhim.

So the 仇young ヰman юwent to 梆seek ｐhis 桂叼fortune. And ｐhe юwent 佛all that day, and 佛all the юnext day; and on the 火third day, in the 拣叼afternoon, ｐhe 别came 仇up to where a ю拣shepherd was sitting with a ゐflock of 梆sheep. And ｐhe юwent 仇up to the ю拣shepherd and asked ｐhim to ｐ叼whom the 梆sheep ゐbelonged; and ｐhe 拣answered:

"to the 路юRed 路юEttin of 路拆拣ゐIreland 路飧扳ｐWho ゐ拆lives in {Ballygan} , 路ｐHe 答stole 路King 路ヰゐヰMalcolm's 佛daughter, 路The king of fair 路ゐScotland. ｐHe 梆beats ｐher, ｐhe 拆binds ｐher, 路ｐHe ゐ别lays ｐher on a ｐhand; 路And юevery day ｐhe 拆strikes ｐher 路With a 拆bright ゐsilver wand. 'Tisюsaid 吼there's 仇one 梆ю别predestinate 路To be ｐhis ヰ桂mortal foe; 路仇But sure that ヰman is юyet 仇桂unborn, 路And ゐlong ヰmay it be so!"

After this the ю拣shepherd 答ゐtold ｐhim to beware of the 梆beasts ｐhe should юnext ヰ梆meet, for they were of a юvery 拣different 拆kind from юany ｐhe ｐhad юyet 梆seen.

So the 仇young ヰman юwent on, and by and by ｐhe saw a ヰ仇ゐ筐multitude of юvery юdreadful, юterrible, ｐhorrible 梆beasts, with two ｐюheads, and on юevery ｐюhead four ｐ桂horns! And ｐhe was sore 拆frightened, and ran away from юthem as fast as ｐhe could; and ゐglad was ｐhe юwhen ｐhe 别came to a castle that stood on a ｐゐhillock, with the door standing 拆wide 答open to the 佛wall. And ｐhe юwent in to the castle for юゐshelter, and there ｐhe saw an 答ゐold 拆wife sitting 拆beside the kitchen 拆fire. ｐHe asked the 拆wife if ｐhe ヰ拆might stay for the 拆night, as ｐhe was 拆拣tired with a ゐlong ○火journey; and the 拆wife юsaid ｐhe ヰ拆might, 仇but it was not a good ゐ别place for ｐhim to be in, as it ゐbelonged to the 路юRed 路юEttin, ｐwho was a юvery юterrible ヰmonster with three ｐюheads, ｐwho 吼spared no ゐliving ヰman it could юget ｐ答ゐhold of. The 仇young ヰman would ｐhave gone away, 仇but ｐhe was 别afraid of the two-ｐюheaded four-ｐ桂horned 梆beasts 拆outside; so ｐhe 梆beseeched the 答ゐold ヰwoman to ｐ拆hide ｐhim as юbest she could, and not юtell the 路юEttin ｐhe was there. ｐHe 佛thought, if ｐhe could put 答over the 拆night, ｐhe ヰ拆might юget away in the ヰ桂morning, without ヰ梆meeting with the юdreadful, юterrible, ｐhorrible 梆beasts, and so 别escape.

仇But ｐhe ｐhad not 梆been ゐlong in ｐhis ｐ拆hiding-ｐ答hole, before the 佛awful 路юEttin 别came in; and no 叼sooner was ｐhe in, than ｐhe was ｐ火heard 拆crying:

" {Snouk} 仇but! And {snouk} юben! I 拆find the ヰюsmell of an 火ゐearthly ヰman; 路Be ｐhe ゐliving, or be ｐhe юdead, 路ｐHis ｐ葛heart this 拆night shall kitchen ヰmy юbread."

юWell, the ヰmonster began to 火search about, and ｐhe 叼soon found the poor 仇young ヰman, and ゐpulled ｐhim from ｐhis ｐ拆hiding-ゐ别place. And юwhen ｐhe ｐhad got ｐhim out, ｐhe 答ゐtold ｐhim that if ｐhe could answer ｐhim three юquestions ｐhis ゐ拆life should be 吼spared.

So the 火first ｐюhead asked: "a thing without an юend; what's that?"

仇But the 仇young ヰman knew not.

юThen the юsecond ｐюhead юsaid: "the ヰ佛ゐsmaller the ヰmore 别○拣dangerous; what's that?"

仇But the 仇young ヰman knew not.

And юthen the 火third ｐюhead asked: "the юdead carrying the ゐliving? Riddle ヰme that."

仇But the 仇young ヰman knew not.

So the ゐlad not 梆being 别able to answer 仇one of 梆these юquestions, the 路юRed 路юEttin took a ヰゐmallet from ｐ拆behind the door, knocked ｐhim on the ｐюhead, and 火turned ｐhim into a ゐpillar of 答stone.

Now on the ヰ桂morning after this ｐhappened the 仇younger 仇brother took out the 拆knife to ゐlook at it, and ｐhe was 梆grieved to 拆find it 佛all brown with 仇rust. So ｐhe 答ゐtold ｐhis ヰ仇mother that the 拆time was now 仇come for ｐhim to go away upon ｐhis ゐtravels 佛ゐalso. At 火first she 筐refused to ゐюlet ｐhim go; 仇but at ゐlast she юrequested ｐhim to 别take the can to the юwell for 佛water, that she ヰ拆might ヰ别make a 别cake for ｐhim. So ｐhe юwent, 仇but as ｐhe was bringing ｐ答home the 佛water, a 别raven 答over ｐhis ｐюhead 拆cried to ｐhim to ゐlook, and ｐhe would see that the 佛water was 仇running out. Now 梆being a 仇young ヰman of юsense, and 梆seeing the 佛water 仇running out, ｐhe took 仇some ゐclay and patched 仇up the ｐ答ゐholes, so that ｐhe 佛brought ｐ答home 仇enough 佛water to 别bake a ゐ葛large 别cake. And юwhen ｐhis ヰ仇mother put it to ｐhim to 别take the ｐhalf 别cake with ｐher ゐюblessing, ｐhe took it юinstead of ｐhaving the ｐ答whole with ｐher {malison} .

So ｐhe юwent away on ｐhis ○火journey with ｐhis ヰ仇拣mother's ゐюblessing. Now after ｐhe ｐhad ゐtravelled a far way, ｐhe ヰюmet with an 答ゐold ヰwoman ｐwho asked ｐhim if ｐhe would give ｐher a bit of ｐhis 别cake. And ｐhe юsaid, "I will ゐゐgladly do that"; so ｐhe 别gave ｐher a 梆piece of the 别cake. юThen the 答ゐold ヰwoman, ｐwho was a 吼fairy, 别gave ｐhim a ヰ○magic wand, that ヰ拆might юyet be of 火service to ｐhim, if ｐhe took care to 筐use it 拆ゐrightly; and she 答ゐtold ｐhim a 别great 梆deal that would ｐhappen to ｐhim, and what ｐhe 佛ought to do in 佛all 火ヰcircumstances; and after that, she vanished in an instant, out of ｐhis 拆sight. юThen ｐhe юwent on ｐhis way until ｐhe 别came 仇up to the 答ゐold ヰman ｐwho was ｐ火herding the 梆sheep; and юwhen ｐhe asked ｐhim to ｐ叼whom the 梆sheep ゐbelonged, the answer was:

"to the 路юRed 路юEttin of 路拆拣ゐIreland 路飧扳ｐWho ゐ拆lives in {Ballygan} , 路ｐHe 答stole 路King 路ヰゐヰMalcolm's 佛daughter, 路The king of fair 路ゐScotland. ｐHe 梆beats ｐher, ｐhe 拆binds ｐher, 路ｐHe ゐ别lays ｐher on a band; 路And юevery day ｐhe 拆strikes ｐher 路With a 拆bright ゐsilver wand. 仇But now I fear ｐhis юend is near, 路And юdeath is ゐ答close at ｐhand; 路For 筐you're to be, I ゐ别ゐplainly see, 路The heir of 佛all ｐhis ゐland."

So the 仇younger 仇brother юwent on ｐhis way; 仇but юwhen ｐhe 别came to the ゐ别place where the юdreadful, юterrible, ｐhorrible 梆beasts were standing, ｐhe did not stop nor 仇run away, 仇but юwent 答ゐゐboldly through ヰ仇amongst юthem. 仇One 别came 仇up 桂roaring with 答open ヰmouth to devour ｐhim, юwhen ｐhe 仇struck it with ｐhis wand, and ゐ别laid it in an instant юdead at ｐhis 梆feet. ｐHe 叼soon 别came to the 路юEttin castle, where ｐhe found the door 仇shut, 仇but ｐhe knocked 答ゐゐboldly, and was ヰadmitted. юThen the 答ゐold ヰwoman ｐwho 拣sat by the 拆fire 桂warned ｐhim of the юterrible 路юEttin, and what ｐhad 梆been the 别fate of ｐhis 仇brother; 仇but ｐhe was not to be 佛daunted, and would not 梆even ｐ拆hide.

юThen by and by the ヰmonster 别came in, 拆crying as before:

" {Snouk} 仇but! And {snouk} юben! I 拆find the ヰюsmell of an 火ゐearthly ヰman; 路Be ｐhe ゐliving, or be ｐhe юdead, 路ｐHis ｐ葛heart this 拆night shall kitchen ヰmy юbread."

юWell, ｐhe ゐquickly 拆espied the 仇young ヰman, and bade ｐhim stand 桂forth on the ゐfloor, and 答ゐtold ｐhim that if ｐhe could answer three юquestions ｐhis ゐ拆life would be 吼spared.

So the 火first ｐюhead asked: "what's the thing without an юend?"

Now the 仇younger 仇brother ｐhad 梆been 答ゐtold by the 吼fairy to ｐ叼whom ｐhe ｐhad given a 梆piece of ｐhis 别cake what ｐhe 佛ought to say; so ｐhe 拣answered:

"a 答bowl."

юThen the 火first ｐюhead frowned, 仇but the юsecond ｐюhead asked:

"the ヰ佛ゐsmaller the ヰmore 别○拣dangerous; what's that?"

"a bridge," юsays the 仇younger 仇brother, 拆quite fast.

юThen the 火first and the юsecond ｐюheads frowned, 仇but the 火third ｐюhead asked:

"юwhen 答does the юdead carry the ゐliving? Riddle ヰme that."

At this the 仇young ヰman 拣answered 仇up at 仇once and юsaid:

"юwhen a ship 别ゐsails on the sea with ヰюmen 拆inside ｐher."

юWhen the 路юRed 路юEttin found 佛all ｐhis ゐriddles 拣answered, ｐhe knew that ｐhis power was gone, so ｐhe 拆tried to 别escape, 仇but the 仇young ヰman took 仇up an axe and ｐ筐hewed off the ヰ拣monster's three ｐюheads. юThen ｐhe asked the 答ゐold ヰwoman to show ｐhim where the king's 佛daughter ゐlay; and the 答ゐold ヰwoman took ｐhim 仇吼upstairs, and 答opened a 别great ヰюmany 桂doors, and out of юevery door 别came a 筐beautiful ゐ别lady ｐwho ｐhad 梆been ヰimprisoned there by the 路юRed 路юEttin; and ゐlast of 佛all the ゐ别ladies was the king's 佛daughter. юThen the 答ゐold ヰwoman took ｐhim down into a ゐlow 叼room, and there stood a 答stone ゐpillar; 仇but ｐhe ｐhad 答ゐonly to 仇touch it with ｐhis wand, and ｐhis 仇brother 葛started into ゐ拆life.

So the ｐ答whole of the 拣prisoners were 答拣○娥overjoyed at their ゐ拣deliverance, for which they thanked the 仇younger 仇brother юagain and юagain. юNext day they 佛all юset out for the king's 桂court, and a ゐgallant 仇ヰcompany they ヰ别made. юThen the king ヰmarried ｐhis 佛daughter to the 仇young ヰman ｐwho ｐhad ゐ拣delivered ｐher, and 别gave a 答ゐnoble's 佛daughter to ｐhis 仇brother.

So they 佛all ゐlived ｐゐhappily 佛all the юrest of their 别days.

The fish and the ring

仇Once upon a 拆time there ゐlived a 路Baron ｐwho was a 别great ヰ○magician, and could юtell by ｐhis 葛arts and 葛ヰcharms юeverything that was 答going to ｐhappen at юany 拆time.

Now this 别great ゐ桂lord ｐhad a ゐlittle 仇son 桂born to ｐhim as heir to 佛all ｐhis ゐcastles and ゐlands. So, юwhen the ゐlittle ゐlad was about four 金years 答ゐold, wishing to know what ｐhis 桂叼fortune would be, the 路Baron ゐlooked in ｐhis 路Book of 路别Fate to see what it 桂答ゐforetold.

And, ゐlo and ｐ答ゐbehold! It was written that this ヰ仇much-ゐ仇loved, ヰ仇much-拆prized heir to 佛all the 别great ゐlands and ゐcastles was to ヰmarry a ゐlow-桂born ヰ别maiden. So the 路Baron was ヰ别dismayed, and юset to 火work by ヰmore 葛arts and 葛ヰcharms to 仇discover if this ヰ别maiden were 佛ゐюalready 桂born, and if so, where she ゐlived.

And ｐhe found out that she ｐhad ○仇just 梆been 桂born in a юvery poor ｐhouse, where the poor 吼parents were 佛ゐюalready 火burdened with 拆five ゐchildren.

So ｐhe 佛ゐcalled for ｐhis ｐ桂horse and 答rode away, and away, until ｐhe 别came to the poor ヰman's ｐhouse, and there ｐhe found the poor ヰman sitting at ｐhis 桂юdoorstep юvery sad and 答ゐdoleful.

"what is the ヰmatter, ヰmy юfriend?" Asked ｐhe; and the poor ヰman ゐ拆replied:

"路ヰMay it ゐ梆please your honour, a ゐlittle ゐlass ｐhas ○仇just 梆been 桂born to our ｐhouse; and we ｐhave 拆five ゐchildren 佛ゐюalready, and where the юbread is to 仇come from to fill the sixth ヰmouth, we know not."

"if that be 佛all your 仇trouble," 答quoth the 路Baron юゐreadily, " {mayhap} I can ｐюゐhelp you: So 答don't be down-ｐ葛hearted. I 别юam ○仇just ゐlooking for 仇such a ゐlittle ゐlass to ヰcompanion ヰmy 仇son, so, if you will, I will give you юten crowns for ｐher."

юWell! The ヰman ｐhe nigh ○仇ヰjumped for ○joy, since ｐhe was to юget good ヰ仇money, and ｐhis 佛daughter, so ｐhe 佛thought, a good ｐ答home. 吼Therefore ｐhe 佛brought out the 拆ゐchild юthen and there, and the 路Baron, wrapping the 别babe in ｐhis ゐ答cloak, 答rode away. 仇But юwhen ｐhe got to the river ｐhe ゐ仇flung the ゐlittle thing into the 答ゐswollen 梆stream, and юsaid to ｐヰюゐhimself as ｐhe ゐgalloped back to ｐhis castle:

"there 答goes 路别Fate!"

仇But, you see, ｐhe was ○仇just sore ヰ别mistaken. For the ゐlittle ゐlass didn't sink. The 梆stream was юvery swift, and ｐher ゐlong ゐ答clothes юkept ｐher 仇up till she 佛caught in a snag ○仇just opposite a 拣ヰfisherman, ｐwho was ヰюmending ｐhis юnets.

Now the 拣ヰfisherman and ｐhis 拆wife ｐhad no ゐchildren, and they were ○仇just ゐlonging for a 别baby; so юwhen the ヰgoodman saw the ゐlittle ゐlass ｐhe was 答拣仇overcome with ○joy, and took ｐher ｐ答home to ｐhis 拆wife, ｐwho 梆received ｐher with 答open 葛ヰarms.

And there she grew 仇up, the apple of their 拆eyes, into the ヰ答most 筐beautiful ヰ别maiden that юever was 梆seen.

Now, юwhen she was about 梆fifteen 金years of 别age, it so ｐhappened that the 路Baron and ｐhis юfriends юwent a-ｐ仇hunting ゐalong the banks of the river and stopped to юget a drink of 佛water at the 拣ヰfisherman's ｐ仇hut. And ｐwho should bring the 佛water out 仇but, as they 佛thought, the 拣ヰfisherman's 佛daughter.

Now the 仇young ヰюmen of the 葛party 答noticed ｐher 筐beauty, and 仇one of юthem юsaid to the 路Baron, "路She should ヰmarry юwell; 梆read 仇us ｐher 别fate, since you are so ゐ火learned in the 葛art."

юThen the 路Baron, 吼scarce ゐlooking at ｐher, юsaid 吼ゐゐcarelessly: "I could юguess ｐher 别fate! 仇Some юwretched 答yokel or 仇other. 仇But, to ゐ梆please you, I will cast ｐher ｐ答horoscope by the 葛stars; so юtell ヰme, 火girl, what day you were 桂born?"

"that I cannot юtell, sir," ゐ拆replied the 火girl, "for I was picked 仇up in the river about 梆fifteen 金years ago."

юThen the 路Baron grew 别pale, for ｐhe юguessed at 仇once that she was the ゐlittle ゐlass ｐhe ｐhad ゐ仇flung into the 梆stream, and that 路别Fate ｐhad 梆been stronger than ｐhe was. 仇But ｐhe юkept ｐhis 答own counsel and юsaid 仇nothing at the 拆time. 拣拣Afterwards, ｐюhowever, ｐhe 佛thought out a ゐplan, so ｐhe 答rode back and 别gave the 火girl a ゐюletter.

"see you!" ｐHe юsaid. "I will ヰ别make your 桂叼fortune. 别Take this ゐюletter to ヰmy 仇brother, ｐwho 梆needs a good 火girl, and you will be юゐsettled for ゐ拆life."

Now the 拣ヰfisherman and ｐhis 拆wife were 答growing 答ゐold and 梆needed ｐюゐhelp; so the 火girl юsaid she would go, and took the ゐюletter.

And the 路Baron 答rode back to ｐhis castle 别saying to ｐヰюゐhimself 仇once ヰmore:

"there 答goes 路别Fate!"

For what ｐhe ｐhad written in the ゐюletter was this:

"dear 路仇Brother,

"别take the 吼bearer and put ｐher to юdeath ヰ梆攫ゐimmediately."

仇But 仇once юagain ｐhe was sore ヰ别mistaken; since on the way to the town where ｐhis 仇brother ゐlived, the 火girl ｐhad to stop the 拆night in a ゐlittle inn. And it so ｐhappened that that юvery 拆night a gang of 梆thieves 答broke into the inn, and not юcontent with carrying off 佛all that the 梆innkeeper юpossessed, they 火searched the pockets of the юguests, and found the ゐюletter which the 火girl carried. And юwhen they 梆read it, they 梆agreed that it was a ヰ梆mean trick and a 别shame. So their captain 拣sat down and, 别taking юpen and 别paper, 答wrote юinstead:

"dear 路仇Brother,

"别take the 吼bearer and ヰmarry ｐher to ヰmy 仇son without ゐdelay."

юThen, after 仇putting the 答note into an юゐ答envelope and 梆ゐsealing it 仇up, they 别gave it to the 火girl and bade ｐher go on ｐher way. So юwhen she 拣拆arrived at the 仇拣brother's castle, though rather 拣拆surprised, ｐhe 别gave 桂拣orders for a юwedding 梆feast to be 吼prepared. And the 路Baron 仇son, ｐwho was 别staying with ｐhis 仇uncle, 梆seeing the 火ゐgirl's 别great 筐beauty, was 仇nothing ゐ答loth, so they were fast юwedded.

юWell! юWhen the 筐news was 佛brought to the 路Baron, ｐhe was nigh 拆beside ｐヰюゐhimself; 仇but ｐhe was 火ヰdetermined not to be 仇done by 路别Fate. "it is not ヰmy 佛ゐfault," she юsaid. "I ｐhave 仇done 仇nothing. It is 路别Fate. 仇But if you will spare ヰmy ゐ拆life I ヰpromise that I will 拆fight юagainst 路别Fate 佛ゐalso. юWell! The 路Baron 梆agreed to this. So ｐhe took off ｐhis 答ゐgold ring from ｐhis finger and ゐ仇flung it 答over the ゐcliffs into the sea and юsaid:

"юnever dare to show ヰme your 别face юagain till you can show ヰme that ring ゐ拆拆likewise."

And with that ｐhe ゐюlet ｐher go.

юWell! The 火girl 拣wandered on, and she 拣wandered on, until she 别came to a 答ゐヰnobleman's castle; and there, as they 梆needed a kitchen 火girl, she 别○engaged as a 仇ゐ攫scullion, since she ｐhad 梆been 筐used to 仇such 火work in the 拣ヰfisherman's ｐ仇hut.

юWell! юWhen the 火girl ｐ火heard she was wanted she ヰ别made ｐ火юゐherself юready, and with the 答ゐgold ring on ｐher 仇thumb, юwent 答ゐゐboldly into the 拆dining-ｐ佛hall. ヰMaster of 佛all ヰ拣masters

A 路火Girl 仇once юwent to the fair to ｐ拆hire ｐ火юゐherself for 火servant. At ゐlast a 仇funny-ゐlooking 答ゐold ○юゐヰgentleman 别○engaged ｐher and took ｐher ｐ答home to ｐhis ｐhouse. юWhen she got there, ｐhe 答ゐtold ｐher that ｐhe ｐhad 仇ヰsomething to 梆teach ｐher, for that in ｐhis ｐhouse ｐhe ｐhad ｐhis 答own 别ヰnames for things.

ｐHe юsaid to ｐher, "路What will you 佛call ヰme?"

"ヰmaster or ヰmister, or юwhatever you ゐ梆please, sir," юsays she.

ｐHe юsaid, "路You ヰ仇must 佛call ヰme'masterof 佛all ヰ拣masters. 'and what would you 佛call this?" 娥Pointing to ｐhis юbed.

"юbed or couch, or юwhatever you ゐ梆please, sir."

"no, that's ヰmy'barnacle'. And what do you 佛call 梆these?" юSaid ｐhe, 娥pointing to ｐhis ゐ叼pantaloons.

"梆breeches or 拣trousers, or юwhatever you ゐ梆please, sir."

"you ヰ仇must 佛call юthem'squibsand 拣crackers. 'and what would you 佛call ｐher?" 娥Pointing to the cat.

"cat or kit, or юwhatever you ゐ梆please, sir. '

"you ヰ仇must 佛call ｐher'white-别faced {simminy'} 路And this now," 答showing the 拆fire, "what would you 佛call this?"

"拆fire or ゐ别flame, or юwhatever you ゐ梆please, sir."

"you ヰ仇must 佛call it'hot {cockalorum'} ; and what this?" ｐHe юwent on, 娥pointing to the 佛water.

"佛water or юwet, or юwhatever you ゐ梆please, sir."

"no, 'pondalorum'is its 别name. And what do you 佛call 佛all this?" Asked ｐhe, as ｐhe 娥pointed to the ｐhouse.

"you ヰ仇must 佛call it'hightopper ヰmountain. '"

That юvery 拆night the 火servant 答woke ｐher ヰmaster 仇up in a 拆fright and юsaid, "路ヰMaster of 佛all ヰ拣masters, юget out of your 葛barnacle and put on your squibs and 拣crackers. That's 佛all!!

Its 别tail]

路ヰゐMolly 路仇Whuppie 路And 路The 路仇Double-路别Faced 路○拆Giant

仇Once upon a 拆time there was a ヰman and ｐhis 拆wife ｐwho were not 答over rich. Now the two юゐeldest were ○仇just 桂拣ordinary 火ゐgirls, so they 拆cried a bit and юゐfelt 别afraid; 仇but the 仇youngest, ｐ叼whose 别name was 路ヰゐMolly 路仇Whuppie, was 答ゐbold, so she ゐcounselled ｐher 拣sisters not to despair, 仇but to try and 拆find 仇some ｐhouse where they ヰ拆might юget a 拆night's ゐ○lodging. So they юset off through the forest, and ○火journeyed, and ○火journeyed, and ○火journeyed, 仇but юnever a ｐhouse did they see. "it will be a ○拆giant's ｐhouse," юsaid the two юゐelder 火ゐgirls, юヰゐtrembling with 拆fright.

"if there were two ○拆giants in it I ヰ梆mean to ｐhave ヰmy 仇supper," 答quoth 路ヰゐMolly 路仇Whuppie, and knocked at a ｐ筐huge door, as 答ゐbold as brass. It was 答opened by the ○拆giant's 拆wife, ｐwho shook ｐher ｐюhead юwhen 路ヰゐMolly 路仇Whuppie asked for ゐvictuals and a 拆night's ゐ○lodging.

"you wouldn't thank ヰme for it," she юsaid, "for ヰmy ヰman is a ○拆giant, and юwhen ｐhe 仇ヰcomes ｐ答home ｐhe will kill you of a 火certainty."

"仇but if you give 仇us 仇supper at 仇once," юsays 路ヰゐMolly ゐcraftily, "we shall ｐhave finished it before the ○拆giant 仇ヰcomes ｐ答home; for we are юvery 葛sharp-юset."

Now the ○拆giant's 拆wife was not 仇拆ゐunkindly; 拆besides, ｐher three 佛拣daughters, ｐwho were ○仇just of an 别age with 路ヰゐMolly and ｐher 拣sisters, 仇tugged at ｐher 火skirts юwell ゐ梆pleased; so she took the 火ゐgirls in, юset юthem by the 拆fire, and 别gave юthem 梆each a 答bowl of юbread and ヰゐmilk. 仇But they ｐhad ｐ葛ゐhardly 仇begun to gobble it 仇up before the door 火burst 答open, and a 金fearful ○拆giant 答strode in 别saying:

"_fee- {fi} -юfo- {fum} , I ヰюsmell the ヰюsmell of 仇some 火ゐearthly 仇one. _"

"答don't put 桂юゐyourself about, ヰmy dear," юsaid the ○拆giant's 拆wife, 拆trying to ヰ别make the юbest of it. "see for 桂юゐyourself. They are 答ゐonly three poor ゐlittle {girlies} ゐ拆like our {girlies} . Now this ○拆giant was not at 佛all a 别桂拣straightforward ○拆giant. ｐHe was a 仇double-别faced ○拆giant. So ｐhe 答ゐonly юsaid,

Dear ヰme! ｐHe was_ a 仇double-别faced ○拆giant!

仇But 路ヰゐMolly 路仇Whuppie, the 仇youngest of the three 火ゐgirls, was not 答ゐonly 答ゐbold, she was ゐюclever. So юwhen she was in юbed, юinstead of 答going to ゐ梆sleep ゐ拆like the 仇拣others, she ゐlay 别awake and 佛thought, and 佛thought, and 佛thought; until at ゐlast she 仇up юever so ゐsoftly, took off ｐher 答own and ｐher 拣sisters' straw 别chains, put юthem round the юneck of the 答拣ogre's 佛拣daughters, and ゐ别placed their 答ゐgold 别chains round ｐher 答own and ｐher 拣sisters' юnecks.

And 梆even юthen she did not go to ゐ梆sleep, 仇but ゐlay still and 别waited to see if she was 拆wise; and she was! For in the юvery ヰmiddle of the 拆night, юwhen юeverybody юゐelse was юdead ゐ梆asleep and it was pitch 葛dark, in 仇ヰcomes the ○拆giant, 佛all юゐstealthy, 梆ゐfeels for the straw 别chains, twists юthem 拆tight round the 吼拣wearers' юnecks, ｐhalf ゐstrangles ｐhis 佛拣daughters, drags юthem on to the ゐfloor, and 梆beats юthem till they were 拆quite юdead; so, 佛all юゐstealthy and 拆satisfied, 答goes back to ｐhis 答own юbed, thinking ｐhe ｐhad 梆been юvery ゐюclever.

仇But ｐhe was no ヰmatch, you see, for 路ヰゐMolly 路仇Whuppie; for she at 仇once roused ｐher 拣sisters, bade юthem be 拆quiet, and ゐfollow ｐher. юThen she ゐslipped out of the ○拆giant's ｐhouse and ran, and ran, and ran until the 佛dawn 答broke and they found ヰюゐthemselves before 仇another 别great ｐhouse. "别taste and try," юsays 路ヰゐMolly 路仇Whuppie, ゐlaughing, and was 答over the 路Bridge of a 路Single 路ｐHair before you could say 拆knife. And, after 佛all, it was not a ○拆giant's ｐhouse 仇but a 路King castle. юThen the 路King юwhen ｐhe ｐhad ｐ火heard the 桂story юsaid, "路You are a ゐюclever 火girl, 路ヰゐMolly 路仇Whuppie, and you ヰ○managed юvery юwell; 仇but if you could ヰmanage still юbetter and 梆steal the ○拆giant's 桂sword, in which 葛part of ｐhis юstrength ゐ拆lies, I will give your юゐeldest sister in ヰmarriage to ヰmy юゐeldest 仇son."

юWell! 路ヰゐMolly 路仇Whuppie 佛thought this would be a юvery good {downsitting} for ｐher sister, so she юsaid she would try.

So that 梆evening, 佛all ゐ答alone, she ran across the 路Bridge of 路仇One 路ｐHair, and ran and ran till she 别came to the ○拆giant's ｐhouse. The 仇sun was ○仇just юsetting, and shone on it so 筐ゐbeautifully that 路ヰゐMolly 路仇Whuppie 佛thought it ゐlooked ゐ拆like a castle in 路别Spain, and could ｐ葛ゐhardly ゐ梆believe that 仇such a юdreadful, 仇double-别faced ○拆giant ゐlived within. ｐюHowever, she knew ｐhe did; so she ゐslipped into the ｐhouse 仇答unbeknownst, 答stole 仇up to the ○拆giant's 叼room, and юcrept in ｐ拆behind the юbed. By and by the ○拆giant 别came ｐ答home, 别ate a ｐ筐huge 仇supper, and 别came crashing 仇up the 吼stairs to ｐhis юbed. 仇But 路ヰゐMolly юkept юvery still and ｐюゐheld ｐher юbreath. So after a 拆time ｐhe юfell ゐ梆asleep, and 叼soon ｐhe began to snore. юThen 路ヰゐMolly юcrept out from 仇under the юbed, юever so ゐsoftly, and юcrept 仇up the юbed-ゐ答clothes, and юcrept past ｐhis 别great 桂snoring 别face, and ゐ别laid ｐ答ゐhold of the 桂sword that ｐ仇hung 仇above it. 仇But ゐalas! As she ○仇ヰjumped from the юbed in a ｐ仇hurry, the 桂sword ゐrattled in the 拣scabbard. The 娥noise 答woke the ○拆giant, and 仇up ｐhe ○仇ヰjumped and ran after 路ヰゐMolly, ｐwho ran as she ｐhad юnever 仇run before, carrying the 桂sword 答over ｐher 答ゐshoulder. And ｐhe ran, and she ran, and they 答both ran, until they 别came to the 路Bridge of 路仇One 路ｐHair. юThen she ゐюfled 答over it ゐ拆light-footed, ゐbalancing the 桂sword, 仇but ｐhe couldn't. So ｐhe stopped, 答ヰfoaming at the ヰmouth with 别rage, and 佛ゐcalled after ｐher:

"woe 火worth you, 路ヰゐMolly 路仇Whuppie! юNever you dare to 仇come юagain!"

And she, 火turning ｐher ｐюhead about as she юsped 答over the 路仇One 路ｐHair 路Bridge, ゐlaughed ゐ拆ゐlightly:

"拆twice юyet, gaffer, will I 仇come to the 路Castle in 路别Spain!"

So 路ヰゐMolly 别gave the 桂sword to the 路King, and, as ｐhe ｐhad ヰpromised, ｐhis юゐeldest 仇son юwedded ｐher юゐeldest sister.

仇But after the ヰmarriage юfestivities were 答over the 路King юsays юagain to 路ヰゐMolly 路仇Whuppie:

"筐you're a ヰ别main ゐюclever 火girl, 路ヰゐMolly, and you ｐhave ヰ○managed юvery юwell, 仇but if you could ヰmanage still юbetter and 梆steal the ○拆giant's 火purse, in which 葛part of ｐhis юstrength ゐ拆lies, I will ヰmarry ヰmy юsecond 仇son to your юsecond sister. 仇But you 梆need to be 吼careful, for the ○拆giant ゐ梆sleeps with the 火purse 仇under ｐhis ゐpillow!"

юWell! 路ヰゐMolly 路仇Whuppie 佛thought this would be a юvery good {downsitting} , 梆indeed, for ｐher юsecond sister, so she юsaid she would try ｐher ゐ仇luck.

So that 梆evening, ○仇just at 仇юsunsetting, she ran 答over the 路仇One 路ｐHair 路Bridge, and ran, and ran, and ran until she 别came to the ○拆giant's ｐhouse ゐlooking for 佛all the 火ゐworld ゐ拆like a castle in the air, 佛all 仇ruddy and 答ゐgolden and ゐglinting. She could 吼scarce ゐ梆believe 仇such a юdreadful 仇double-别faced ○拆giant ゐlived within. ｐюHowever, she knew_ ｐhe did; so she ゐslipped into the ｐhouse 仇答unbeknownst, 答stole 仇up to the ○拆giant's 叼room, and юcrept in ゐbelow the ○拆giant's юbed. By and by the ○拆giant 别came ｐ答home, 别ate a ｐ葛hearty 仇supper, and юthen 别came crashing 仇吼upstairs, and 叼soon юfell a-桂snoring. юThen 路ヰゐMolly 路仇Whuppie ゐslipped from 仇under the юbed, and ゐslipped 仇up the юbed-ゐ答clothes, and 梆reaching out ｐher ｐhand ゐslipped it 仇under the ゐpillow, and got ｐ答ゐhold of the 火purse. 仇But the ○拆giant's ｐюhead was so ｐюheavy on it she ｐhad to 仇tug and 仇tug away. At ゐlast out it 别came, she юfell 拣backward 答over the ю拆bedside, the 火purse 答opened, and 仇some of the ヰ仇money юfell out with a crash. The 娥noise 别wakened the ○拆giant, and she ｐhad 答ゐonly 拆time to grab the ヰ仇money off the ゐfloor, юwhen ｐhe was after ｐher. ｐHow they ran, and ran, and ran, and ran! 仇But after the юwedding was 答over the 路King юsays to ｐher, юsays ｐhe:

"路ヰゐMolly! You are the ヰ答most ヰ别main ゐюclever 火girl in the 火ゐworld; 仇but if you would do юbetter юyet, and 梆steal ヰme from ｐhis finger the ○拆giant's ring, in which 佛all ｐhis юstrength ゐ拆lies, I will give you ヰmy 金dearest, 仇youngest, ｐヰhandsomest 仇son for 桂юゐyourself."

Now 路ヰゐMolly 佛thought the 路King 仇son was the 拆nicest 仇young prince she ｐhad юever 梆seen, so she юsaid she would try, and that 梆evening, 佛all ゐ答alone, she юsped across the 路仇One 路ｐHair 路Bridge as ゐ拆light as a юfeather, and ran, and ran, and ran until she 别came to the ○拆giant's ｐhouse 佛all ゐlit 仇up with the юred юsetting 仇sun ゐ拆like юany castle in the air. 仇But you know ｐhe was a 仇double-别faced ○拆giant; so 拣ｐperhaps ｐhe 桂snored ゐlouder on 火purpose. For no 叼sooner ｐhad 路ヰゐMolly 路仇Whuppie began to 仇tug at ｐhis ring than ... ヰMy!...

ｐHe ｐhad ｐher fast 梆between ｐhis finger and 仇thumb. And ｐhe 别sate 仇up in юbed, and shook ｐhis ｐюhead at ｐher and юsaid, "路ヰゐMolly 路仇Whuppie, you are a ヰ别main ゐюclever 火girl! Now, if I ｐhad 仇done as ヰ仇much ill to you as you ｐhave 仇done to ヰme, what would you do to ヰme?"

юThen 路ヰゐMolly 佛thought for a ヰ答ヰmoment and she юsaid, "拆I'd put you in a sack, and 拆I'd put the cat 拆inside with you, and 拆I'd put the dog 拆inside with you, and 拆I'd put a 梆needle and юthread and a pair of 金shears 拆inside with you, and 拆I'd ｐhang you 仇up on a 别nail, and 拆I'd go to the wood and 仇cut the thickest stick I could юget, and 仇come ｐ答home and 别take you down and bang you, and bang, and bang, and bang you till you were юdead!"

"拆right you are!" 拆Cried the ○拆giant ゐ梆ゐgleefully, "and that's ○仇just what 拆I'll do to you!"

So ｐhe got a sack and put 路ヰゐMolly into it with the dog and the cat, and the 梆needle and юthread and the 金shears, and ｐ仇hung ｐher on a 别nail in the 佛wall, and юwent out to the wood to 叼choose a stick.

юThen 路ヰゐMolly 路仇Whuppie began to ゐlaugh ゐ拆like юanything, and the dog ○娥joined in with 葛barks, and the cat with ヰ筐mews.

Now the ○拆giant's 拆wife was sitting in the юnext 叼room, and юwhen she ｐ火heard the ヰ答commotion she юwent in to see what was 仇up.

And no ヰmatter ｐhow the ○拆giant's 拆wife юbegged to know what she saw, there юnever was юany answer 仇but, "路ｐHo, ｐho! ｐHa, ｐha! Could ye 仇but see what I see!!!"

At ゐlast the ○拆giant's 拆wife юbegged 路ヰゐMolly to ゐюlet ｐher see, so 路ヰゐMolly took the 金shears, 仇cut a ｐ答hole in the sack, ○仇ヰjumped out, ｐюゐhelped the ○拆giant's 拆wife in, and 答sewed 仇up the ｐ答hole! For of 桂course she ｐhadn't 拣forgotten to 别take out the 梆needle and юthread with ｐher.

Now, ○仇just at that юvery ヰ答ヰmoment, the ○拆giant 火burst in, and 路ヰゐMolly ｐhad 吼ゐbarely 拆time to ｐ拆hide ｐ拆behind the door before ｐhe 仇rushed at the sack, tore it down, and began to batter it with a ｐ筐huge tree ｐhe ｐhad 仇cut in the wood.

"stop! Stop!" 拆Cried ｐhis 拆wife. "it's ヰme! It's ヰme!"

仇But ｐhe couldn't ｐhear, for, see you, the dog and the cat ｐhad 仇ヰゐtumbled 仇one on the top of the 仇other, and 仇such a ゐgrowling and spitting, and юゐyelling and 拣佛ゐcaterwauling you юnever ｐ火heard! юWell, ｐhe threw down the tree and ran after ｐher. юNever was 仇such a 别race. They ran, and they ran, and they ran, and they ran, until they 别came to the 路仇One 路ｐHair 路Bridge. The 路Ass, 路The 路别Table, 路And 路The 路Stick

A ゐlad 别ヰnamed 路○Jack was 仇once so 仇ｐunhappy at ｐ答home through ｐhis 拣father's ill-梆ヰtreatment, that ｐhe ヰ别made 仇up ｐhis ヰ拆mind to 仇run away and 梆seek ｐhis 桂叼fortune in the 拆wide 火ゐworld.

ｐHe ran, and ｐhe ran, till ｐhe could 仇run no ゐlonger, and юthen ｐhe ran 拆right 仇up юagainst a ゐlittle 答ゐold ヰwoman ｐwho was 拣gathering sticks. ｐHe was too ヰ仇much out of юbreath to юbeg 葛pardon, 仇but the ヰwoman was good-别拣natured, and she юsaid ｐhe 梆ヰseemed to be a ゐ拆ゐlikely ゐlad, so she would 别take ｐhim to be ｐher 火servant, and would pay ｐhim юwell. ｐHe 梆agreed, for ｐhe was юvery ｐ仇hungry, and she 佛brought ｐhim to ｐher ｐhouse in the wood, where ｐhe 火served ｐher for a {twelvemonths} and a day. юWhen the year ｐhad passed, she 佛ゐcalled ｐhim to ｐher, and юsaid she ｐhad good 别○wages for ｐhim. So she юpresented ｐhim with an ass out of the 别stable, and ｐhe ｐhad 仇but to pull 路юNeddy's 金ears to ヰ别make ｐhim begin at 仇once to {hee} -ｐhaw! And юwhen ｐhe 别brayed there dropped from ｐhis ヰmouth ゐsilver sixpences, and ｐhalf-crowns, and 答ゐgolden guineas.

The ゐlad was юwell ゐ梆pleased with the 别wage ｐhe ｐhad 梆received, and away ｐhe 答rode till ｐhe 梆reached an inn. There ｐhe 桂拣ordered the юbest of юeverything, and юwhen the 梆innkeeper 筐refused to 火serve ｐhim without 梆being 别paid 桂ｐbeforehand, the boy юwent off to the 别stable, ゐpulled the ass's 金ears, and 别obtained ｐhis pocket full of ヰ仇money. The ｐ答host ｐhad watched 佛all this through a crack in the door, and юwhen 拆night 别came on ｐhe put an ass of ｐhis 答own for the юprecious 路юNeddy ゐbelonging to the 筐youth. So 路○Jack, without 答knowing that юany 别change ｐhad 梆been ヰ别made, 答rode away юnext ヰ桂morning to ｐhis 拣father's ｐhouse.

Now I ヰ仇must юtell you that near ｐhis ｐ答home юゐdwelt a poor widow with an 答ゐonly 佛daughter. The ゐlad and the ヰ别maiden were fast юfriends and true-ゐ仇loves. So юwhen 路○Jack 火returned ｐhe asked ｐhis 拣father's ゐ梆leave to ヰmarry the 火girl.

"юnever till you ｐhave the ヰ仇money to 梆keep ｐher," was the ゐreply.

"I ｐhave that, father," юsaid the ゐlad, and 答going to the ass ｐhe ゐpulled its ゐlong 金ears; юwell, ｐhe ゐpulled, and ｐhe ゐpulled, till 仇one of юthem 别came off in ｐhis ｐhands; 仇but 路юNeddy, though ｐhe {hee} -ｐ佛hawed and ｐhe {hee} -ｐ佛hawed, ゐюlet 佛fall no ｐhalf-crowns or guineas. юThen the father picked 仇up a ｐ别桂hayfork and 梆beat ｐhis 仇son out of the ｐhouse.

I ヰpromise you ｐhe ran; ｐhe ran and ran till ｐhe 别came bang юagainst a door, and 火burst it 答open, and there ｐhe was in a ○娥拣joiner's shop. "筐you're a ゐ拆ゐlikely ゐlad," юsaid the ○娥joiner; "火serve ヰme for a {twelvemonths} and a day and I will pay you юwell." So ｐhe 梆agreed, and 火served the 葛carpenter for a year and a day. "now," юsaid the ヰmaster, "I will give you your 别wage"; and ｐhe юpresented ｐhim with a 别table, юゐtelling ｐhim ｐhe ｐhad 仇but to say, "路别Table, be 仇拣covered," and at 仇once it would be юspread with ゐlots to 梆eat and drink.

路○Jack ｐhitched the 别table on ｐhis back, and away ｐhe юwent with it till ｐhe 别came to the inn. "юwell, ｐ答host," shouted ｐhe, 仇putting down the 别table, "ヰmy dinner to-day, and that of the юbest."

"юvery sorry, sir," юsays the ｐ答host, "仇but there is 仇nothing in the ｐhouse 仇but ｐham and юeggs."

"no ｐham and юeggs for ヰme!" ゐ别ヰExclaimed 路○Jack. "I can do юbetter than that. --仇come, ヰmy 别table, be 仇拣covered!"

So at 仇once the 别table was юspread with 火turkey and ○sausages, 答roast ヰ仇mutton, 别答potatoes, and 梆greens. The 梆innkeeper 答opened ｐhis 拆eyes, 仇but ｐhe юsaid 仇nothing, not ｐhe! 仇But that 拆night ｐhe юfetched down from ｐhis attic a 别table юvery ゐ拆like the ヰ○magic 仇one, and 别○exchanged the two, and 路○Jack, 仇none the 拆wiser, юnext ヰ桂morning ｐhitched the 火ゐworthless 别table on to ｐhis back and carried it ｐ答home.

"now, father, ヰmay I ヰmarry ヰmy ゐlass?" ｐHe asked.

"not ゐюunless you can 梆keep ｐher," ゐ拆replied the father.

"ゐlook ｐhere!" ゐ别ヰExclaimed 路○Jack. "father, I ｐhave a 别table which 答does 佛all ヰmy bidding."

"ゐюlet ヰme see it," юsaid the 答ゐold ヰman.

The ゐlad юset it in the ヰmiddle of the 叼room, and bade it be 仇拣covered; 仇but 佛all in 别vain, the 别table ヰ别remained bare. юThen, in a 别rage, the father 佛caught the 桂ヰwarming-pan down from the 佛wall and 桂ヰwarmed ｐhis 仇son's back with it so that the boy ゐюfled ｐゐhowling from the ｐhouse, and ran and ran till ｐhe 别came to a river and 仇ヰゐtumbled in. A ヰman picked ｐhim out and bade ｐhim ｐюゐhelp in ヰ别making a bridge 答over the river by casting a tree across. юThen 路○Jack ゐ拆ヰclimbed 仇up to the top of the tree and threw ｐhis 别weight on it, so that юwhen the ヰman ｐhad 叼rooted the tree 仇up, 路○Jack and the tree-ｐюhead dropped on the 葛farther bank.

○仇Just ゐlonging for a 别baby]

"thank you," юsaid the ヰman; "and now for what you ｐhave 仇done I will pay you"; so 别saying, ｐhe tore a branch from the tree, and {fettled} it 仇up into a ゐ仇club with ｐhis 拆knife. "there," ゐ别ヰexclaimed ｐhe; "别take this stick, and юwhen you say to it, 'Up, stick, and bang ｐhim,'it will knock юany 仇one down ｐwho angers you."

The ゐlad was 答拣○娥overjoyed to юget this stick, for ｐhe ｐhad 仇begun to see ｐhe ｐhad 梆been tricked by the 梆innkeeper, so away ｐhe юwent with it to the inn, and as 叼soon as the ヰman 金appeared ｐhe 拆cried:

"仇up, stick, and bang ｐhim!"

At the 火word the 仇○cudgel ゐflew from ｐhis ｐhand and 拣battered the 答ゐold юゐfellow on the back, rapped ｐhis ｐюhead, 叼bruised ｐhis 葛ヰarms, ゐtickled ｐhis ribs, till ｐhe юfell 答groaning on the ゐfloor; and still the stick {belaboured} the 别prostrate ヰman, nor would 路○Jack 佛call it off till ｐhe ｐhad got back the 答ゐstolen ass and 别table. юThen ｐhe ゐgalloped ｐ答home on the ass, with the 别table on ｐhis 答ゐ拣shoulders, and the stick in ｐhis ｐhand. юWhen ｐhe 拣拆arrived there ｐhe found ｐhis father was юdead, so ｐhe 佛brought ｐhis ass into the 别stable, and ゐpulled its 金ears till ｐhe ｐhad ゐfilled the ヰ别○manger with ヰ仇money.

It was 叼soon 答known through the town that 路○Jack ｐhad 火returned 答ゐrolling in юゐwealth, and 桂ゐaccordingly 佛all the 火ゐgirls in the ゐ别place юset their caps at ｐhim.

"now," юsaid 路○Jack, "I shall ヰmarry the richest ゐlass in the ゐ别place; so to-ヰmorrow do you 佛all 仇come in 仇front of ヰmy ｐhouse with your ヰ仇money in your 别aprons."

юNext ヰ桂morning the 梆street was full of 火ゐgirls with 别aprons ｐюゐheld out, and 答ゐgold and ゐsilver in юthem; 仇but 路○Jack's 答own 梆ｐ葛sweetheart was ヰ仇among юthem, and she ｐhad 拆neither 答ゐgold nor ゐsilver; 佛nought 仇but two copper юpennies, that was 佛all she ｐhad.

"stand 拆aside, ゐlass," юsaid 路○Jack to ｐher, 梆speaking 仇ゐroughly. "thou ｐhast no ゐsilver nor 答ゐgold--stand off from the юrest." She 别obeyed, and the 金tears ran down ｐher 梆cheeks, and ゐfilled ｐher 别apron with 拆ヰdiamonds.

"仇up, stick, and bang юthem!" ゐ别ヰExclaimed 路○Jack; 吼whereupon the 仇○cudgel ゐ梆leaped 仇up, and 仇running ゐalong the ゐ拆line of 火ゐgirls, knocked юthem 佛all on the ｐюheads and ゐюleft юthem юゐsenseless on the 别ヰpavement. 路○Jack took 佛all their ヰ仇money and 桂poured it into ｐhis true-ゐ仇love's ゐlap.
