The 路юWell 路Of 路The 路火ゐWorld 路юEnd

仇Once upon a 拆time, and a юvery good 拆time it was, though it wasn't in ヰmy 拆time, nor in your 拆time, nor юany 仇one юゐelse's 拆time, there was a 火girl ｐ叼whose ヰ仇mother ｐhad 拆died, and ｐher father ｐhad ヰmarried юagain. And ｐher юヰ仇stepmother ｐ别hated ｐher because she was ヰmore 筐beautiful than she was. And she was юvery 叼cruel to ｐher; she 筐used to ヰ别make ｐher do 佛all the 火servant's 火work, and юnever ゐюlet ｐher ｐhave юany 梆peace. At ゐlast, 仇one day, the юヰ仇stepmother 佛thought to юget rid of ｐher 佛ゐюaltogether; so she ｐhanded ｐher a sieve and юsaid to ｐher:

"go, fill it at the 路юWell of the 路火ゐWorld 路юEnd and bring it ｐ答home to ヰme full, or woe 拆betide you." For she 佛thought she would юnever be 别able to 拆find the 路юWell of the 路火ゐWorld 路юEnd, and, if she did, ｐhow could she bring ｐ答home a sieve full of 佛water?

юWell, the 火girl 葛started off, and asked юevery 仇one she ヰюmet to юtell ｐher where was the 路юWell of the 路火ゐWorld 路юEnd. 仇But 答nobody knew, and she didn't know what to do, юwhen a queer ゐlittle 答ゐold ヰwoman, 佛all юbent 仇double, 答ゐtold ｐher where it was, and ｐhow she could юget to it. So she did what the 答ゐold ヰwoman 答ゐtold ｐher, and at ゐlast 拣拆arrived at the 路юWell of the 路火ゐWorld 路юEnd. 仇But юwhen she dipped the sieve in the 答ゐcold 答ゐcold 佛water, it 佛all ran out юagain. She 拆tried and she 拆tried юagain, 仇but юevery 拆time it was the 别same; and at ゐlast she 别sate down and 拆cried as if ｐher ｐ葛heart would 别break.

仇ゐSuddenly she ｐ火heard a 答croaking 娥voice, and she ゐlooked 仇up and saw a 别great frog with goggle 拆eyes ゐlooking at ｐher and 梆speaking to ｐher.

"what's the ヰmatter, 金dearie?" It юsaid.

"oh dear! Oh dear!" She юsaid, "ヰmy юヰ仇stepmother ｐhas юsent ヰme 佛all this ゐlong way to fill this sieve with 佛water from the 路юWell of the 路火ゐWorld 路юEnd, and I can't fill it no ｐhow at 佛all."

"юwell," юsaid the frog, "if you ヰpromise ヰme to do юwhatever I bid you for a ｐ答whole 拆night ゐlong, 拆I'll юtell you ｐhow to fill it."

So the 火girl 梆agreed, and юthen the frog юsaid:

"stop it with ヰmoss and 佛daub it with ゐclay, 路And юthen it will carry the 佛water away";

And юthen it 别gave a ｐhop, skip, and ○仇ヰjump, and юwent ゐflop into the 路юWell of the 路火ゐWorld 路юEnd.

So the 火girl ゐlooked about for 仇some ヰmoss, and ゐ拆lined the bottom of the sieve with it, and 答over that she put 仇some ゐclay, and юthen she dipped it 仇once-юagain into the 路юWell of the 路火ゐWorld 路юEnd; and this 拆time the 佛water didn't 仇run out, and she 火turned to go away.

○仇Just юthen the frog popped 仇up its ｐюhead out of the 路юWell of the 路火ゐWorld 路юEnd, and юsaid, "路ヰюヰRemember your ヰpromise."

"佛all 拆right," юsaid the 火girl; for, 佛thought she, "what ｐ葛harm can a frog do ヰme?"

So she юwent back to ｐher юヰ仇stepmother, and 佛brought the sieve full of 佛water from the 路юWell of the 路火ゐWorld 路юEnd. The юヰ仇stepmother was angry as angry, 仇but she юsaid 仇nothing at 佛all.

That юvery 梆evening they ｐ火heard 仇ヰsomething tap-tapping at the door ゐlow down, and a 娥voice 拆cried out:

"答open the door, ヰmy {hinny} , ヰmy ｐ葛heart, 路答Open the door, ヰmy 答own 葛ゐdarling; 路ヰюヰRemember the 火words that you and I 答spoke, 路At the 路火ゐWorld 路юEnd 路юWell 仇but this ヰ桂morning."

"юwhatever can that be?" 拆Cried out the юヰ仇stepmother.

юThen the 火girl ｐhad to юtell ｐher 佛all about it, and what she ｐhad ヰpromised the frog.

"火ゐgirls ヰ仇must 梆keep their ヰpromises," юsaid the юヰ仇stepmother, ｐwho was ゐglad the 火girl would ｐhave to obey a nasty frog. "go and 答open the door this instant."

So the 火girl юwent and 答opened the door, and there was the frog from the 路юWell of the 路火ゐWorld 路юEnd. And it ｐhopped, and it ｐhopped, and it ○仇ヰjumped, till it 梆reached the 火girl, and юthen it юsaid:

"ゐlift ヰme 仇up, ヰmy {hinny} , ヰmy ｐ葛heart, 路ゐLift to your knee, ヰmy 答own 葛ゐdarling; 路ヰюヰRemember the 火words that you and I 答spoke, 路At the 路火ゐWorld 路юEnd 路юWell 仇but this ヰ桂morning."

仇But the 火girl would not do the frog's bidding, till ｐher юヰ仇stepmother юsaid, "路ゐLift it 仇up this instant, you ｐ仇hussy! 火ゐGirls ヰ仇must_ 梆keep their ヰpromises!"

So she ゐlifted the frog 仇up on to ｐher ゐlap, and it ゐlay there 仇ヰ拣ゐcomfortably for a 拆time; till at ゐlast it юsaid:

юWell, that she did not ヰ拆mind 叼doing, so she got it a 答bowl of ヰゐmilk and юbread, and юfed it юwell. 仇But юwhen the frog ｐhad finished, it юsaid:

"别take ヰme to юbed, ヰmy {hinny} , ヰmy ｐ葛heart, 路别Take ヰme to юbed, ヰmy 答own 葛ゐdarling; 路ヰюヰRemember the ヰpromise you ヰpromised to ヰme, 路At the 路火ゐWorld 路юEnd 路юWell 仇but this ヰ桂morning."

So the 火girl took the frog with ｐher to юbed, and юkept it as far away from ｐher as she could. юWell, ○仇just as the day was beginning to 别break, what should the frog say 仇but:

"chop off ヰmy ｐюhead, ヰmy {hinny} , ヰmy ｐ葛heart, 路Chop off ヰmy ｐюhead, ヰmy 答own 葛ゐdarling; 路ヰюヰRemember the ヰpromise you ヰpromised to ヰme, 路At the 路火ゐWorld 路юEnd 路юWell 仇but this ヰ桂morning."

The юヰ仇stepmother was 拣拆surprised 梆indeed юwhen she found the 仇young prince юinstead of the nasty frog, and she was not юbest ゐ梆pleased, you ヰmay be sure, юwhen the prince 答ゐtold ｐher that ｐhe was 答going to ヰmarry ｐher ю佛stepdaughter because she ｐhad {unspelled} ｐhim. 仇But ヰmarried they were, and юwent away to ゐ拆live in the castle of the king, ｐhis father; and 佛all the юヰ仇stepmother ｐhad to 答console ｐher was, that it was 佛all through ｐher_ that ｐher ю佛stepdaughter was ヰmarried to a prince.

The 路答Rose 路Tree

仇Once upon a 拆time, ゐlong ゐlong 金years ago, in the 别days юwhen 仇one ｐhad to be 吼careful about witches, there ゐlived a good ヰman, ｐ叼whose 仇young 拆wife 拆died, ゐ梆leaving ｐhim a 别baby 火girl.

Now this good ヰman юゐfelt ｐhe could not ゐlook after the 别baby 拣ゐproperly, so ｐhe ヰmarried a 仇young ヰwoman ｐ叼whose ｐ仇husband ｐhad 拆died ゐ梆leaving ｐher with a 别baby boy.

仇Thus the two ゐchildren grew 仇up юtogether, and ゐ仇loved 梆each 仇other 金ゐdearly, 金ゐdearly.

仇But the 娥boy's ヰ仇mother was 攫ゐreally a wicked witch-ヰwoman, and so ○юゐjealous that she wanted 佛all the 娥boy's ゐ仇love for ｐ火юゐherself, and юwhen the 火girl-别baby grew 拆white as ヰゐmilk, with 梆cheeks ゐ拆like 答roses and ゐlips ゐ拆like юcherries, and юwhen ｐher ｐhair, 拆shining ゐ拆like 答ゐgolden ゐsilk, ｐ仇hung down to ｐher 梆feet so that ｐher father and 佛all the 别拣neighbours began to 别praise ｐher ゐlooks, the юヰ仇stepmother 吼ゐfairly ｐ别hated ｐher, and did 佛all in ｐher power to 娥spoil ｐher ゐlooks. She would юset the 拆ゐchild ｐ葛hard tasks, and юsend ｐher out in 佛all ю拣weathers to do ゐdifficult ヰю○messages, and if they were not юwell 拣桂ヰperformed would 梆beat ｐher and 答ゐscold ｐher 叼ゐcruelly.

Now 仇one 答ゐcold winter 梆evening юwhen the snow was drifting fast, and the 拆ゐwild 答rose tree in the 葛garden 仇under which the ゐchildren 筐used to ゐplay in 仇ヰsummer was 佛all brown and barren 别save for 答ゐ别snowflake ゐ拣flowers, the юヰ仇stepmother юsaid to the ゐlittle 火girl:

"拆ゐchild! Go and buy ヰme a 仇bunch of ゐcandles at the 答拣grocer's. ｐHere is 仇some ヰ仇money; go ゐquickly, and 答don't ゐ娥loiter by the way."

So the ゐlittle 火girl took the ヰ仇money and юset off ゐquickly through the snow, for 佛ゐюalready it was 答growing 葛dark. Now there was 仇such a 拆wind ゐ答blowing that it 金ゐnearly ゐblew ｐher off ｐher 梆feet, and as she ran ｐher 筐beautiful ｐhair got 佛all ゐtangled and 佛ゐヰ答almost tripped ｐher 仇up. ｐюHowever, she got the ゐcandles, 别paid for юthem, and 葛started ｐ答home юagain. 仇But this 拆time the 拆wind was ｐ拆behind ｐher and ゐblew 佛all ｐher 筐beautiful 答ゐgolden ｐhair in 仇front of ｐher ゐ拆like a ゐcloud, so that she could not see ｐher юsteps, and, 仇ヰcoming to a 拆stile, ｐhad to stop and put down the 仇bundle of ゐcandles in 桂order to see ｐhow to юget 答over it. And юwhen she was ゐ拆ヰclimbing it a big ゐblack dog 别came by and ran off with the 仇bunch of ゐcandles! Now she was so 别afraid of ｐher юヰ仇stepmother that she 火durst not go ｐ答home, 仇but 火turned back and 佛bought 仇another 仇bunch of ゐcandles at the 答拣grocer's, and юwhen she 拣拆arrived at the 拆stile 仇once ヰmore, the 别same thing ｐhappened. A big ゐblack dog 别came down the 答road and ran away with the 仇bunch of ゐcandles. So юyet 仇once юagain she ○火journeyed back to the 答拣grocer's through 拆wind and snow, and, with ｐher ゐlast юpenny, 佛bought юyet 仇another 仇bunch of ゐcandles. To no 火purpose, for ゐalas, and ゐalack-a-day! юWhen she ゐ别laid юthem down in 桂order to 葛part ｐher 筐beautiful 答ゐgolden ｐhair and to see ｐhow to юget 答over the 拆stile, a big ゐblack dog ran away with юthem.

So 仇nothing was ゐюleft 别save to go back to ｐher юヰ仇stepmother in fear and юヰゐtrembling. 仇But, for a 仇wonder, ｐher юヰ仇stepmother did not 梆seem юvery angry. She 答ゐonly 答ゐscolded ｐher for 梆being so ゐ别late, for, see you, ｐher father and ｐher ゐlittle ゐ别ヰ别playmate ｐhad gone to their юbeds and were in the 路ゐLand of 路Nod.

юThen she юsaid to the 拆ゐchild, "I ヰ仇must 别take the ゐtangles out of your ｐhair before you go to ゐ梆sleep. 仇Come, put your ｐюhead on ヰmy ゐlap."

So the ゐlittle 火girl put ｐher ｐюhead on ｐher юヰ仇拣stepmother's ゐlap, and, ゐlo and ｐ答ゐbehold! ｐHer 筐beautiful юゐyellow-ゐsilk ｐhair 答ゐrolled 拆right 答over the ヰwoman's 梆knees and ゐlay upon the ground.

юThen the 筐beauty of it ヰ别made the юヰ仇stepmother ヰmore ○юゐjealous than before, so she юsaid, "I cannot 葛part your ｐhair 拣ゐproperly on ヰmy knee, юfetch ヰme a ゐbillet of wood."

So the ゐlittle 火girl юfetched 仇one. юThen юsaid the юヰ仇stepmother, "路Your ｐhair is so thick I cannot 葛part it with a 答comb; юfetch ヰme an axe!"

So the 拆ゐchild юfetched an axe.

"now," юsaid that wicked, wicked ヰwoman, "ゐlay your ｐюhead down on the ゐbillet 拆while I 葛part your ｐhair."

And the 拆ゐchild did as she was bid without fear; and ゐlo! The 筐beautiful ゐlittle 答ゐgolden ｐюhead was off in a юsecond, by 仇one ゐblow of the axe.

Now the wicked юヰ仇stepmother ｐhad 佛thought it 佛all out before, so she took the poor ゐlittle юdead 火girl out to the 葛garden, 仇dug a ｐゐhollow in the snow 仇under the 答rose tree, and юsaid to ｐ火юゐherself, "路юWhen spring 仇ヰcomes and the snow ヰюゐmelts if 梆people 拆find ｐher 答bones, they will say she ゐlost ｐher way and юfell ゐ梆asleep in the snow."

仇But 火first, because she was a wicked witch-ヰwoman, 答knowing юゐspells and 葛ヰcharms, she took out the ｐ葛heart of the ゐlittle 火girl and ヰ别made it into two 别拣savoury pasties, 仇one for ｐher ｐ仇husband's юbreakfast and 仇one for the ゐlittle 娥boy's, for 仇thus would the ゐ仇love they bore to the ゐlittle 火girl 仇become ｐ火hers. ю拣ゐюNevertheless, she was ヰ别mistaken, for юwhen ヰ桂morning 别came and the ゐlittle 拆ゐchild could not be found, the father юsent away ｐhis юbreakfast 吼ゐbarely 别tasted, and the ゐlittle boy юwept so that ｐhe could 梆eat 仇nothing.

So they 梆grieved and 梆grieved. And юwhen the snow ヰюゐmelted and they found the 答bones of the poor 拆ゐchild, they юsaid, "路She ヰ仇must ｐhave ゐlost ｐher way that 葛dark 拆night 答going to the 答拣grocer's to buy ゐcandles." So they юburied the 答bones 仇under the ゐchildren's 答rose tree, and юevery day the ゐlittle boy 别sate there and юwept and юwept for ｐhis ゐlost ゐ别ヰ别playmate.

Now юwhen 仇ヰsummer 别came the 拆ゐwild 答rose tree ゐ拣flowered. It was 仇拣covered with 拆white 答roses, and ヰ仇amongst the ゐ拣flowers there 别sate a 筐beautiful 拆white 火bird. And it sang and sang and sang ゐ拆like an 别○angel out of ｐюheaven; 仇but what it sang the ゐlittle boy could юnever ヰ别make out, for ｐhe could ｐ葛ゐhardly see for 梆weeping, ｐ葛ゐhardly ｐhear for sobbing.

So at ゐlast the 筐beautiful 拆white 火bird 仇答ゐunfolded its 佛broad 拆white wings and ゐflew to a ゐ拣cobbler's shop, where a ヰ火myrtle bush ｐ仇hung 答over the ヰman and ｐhis ゐlast, on which ｐhe was ヰ别making a 别dainty ゐlittle pair of 答rose-юred 叼shoes. юThen it 火perched on a bough and sang юever so 梆ゐsweetly:

"юヰ仇stepmother ゐslew ヰme, 路Father nigh 别ate ヰme, 路ｐHe ｐ叼whom I 金ゐdearly ゐ仇love 路Sits ゐbelow, I sing 仇above, 路Stick! Stock! 路答Stone юdead!"

"sing that 筐beautiful song юagain," юsaid the ゐcobbler. "it is юbetter than a 拆别ゐnightingale's."

"that will I ゐゐgladly," sang the 火bird, "if you will give ヰme the ゐlittle 答rose-юred 叼shoes you are ヰ别making."

And the ゐcobbler 别gave юthem ゐゐwillingly, so the 拆white 火bird sang its song 仇once ヰmore. юThen with the 答rose-юred 叼shoes in 仇one foot it ゐflew to an ash tree that grew ゐ答close 拆beside a 答ゐヰgoldsmith's юbench, and sang:

"юヰ仇stepmother ゐslew ヰme, 路Father nigh 别ate ヰme, 路ｐHe ｐ叼whom I 金ゐdearly ゐ仇love 路Sits ゐbelow, I sing 仇above, 路Stick! Stock! 路答Stone юdead!"

"oh, what a 筐beautiful song!" 拆Cried the 答ゐヰgoldsmith.

"that will I ゐゐgladly," sang the 火bird, "if you will give ヰme the 答ゐgold 别chain 筐you're ヰ别making."

And the 答ゐヰgoldsmith 别gave the 佛bauble ゐゐwillingly, and the 火bird sang its song 仇once ヰmore. юThen with the 答rose-юred 叼shoes in 仇one foot and the 答ゐgolden 别chain in the 仇other, the 火bird ゐflew to an 答oak tree which 答拣ｐ仇overhung the ヰmill 梆stream, 拆beside which three ヰゐ拣millers were busy picking out a ヰゐ答millstone, and, 火perching on a bough, sang its song юever so 梆ゐsweetly:

"ヰmy юヰ仇stepmother ゐslew ヰme, 路ヰMy father nigh 别ate ヰme, 路ｐHe ｐ叼whom I 金ゐdearly ゐ仇love 路Sits ゐbelow, I sing 仇above, 路Stick! --"

○仇Just юthen 仇one of the ヰゐ拣millers put down ｐhis 叼tool and ゐlistened.

"stock!" Sang the 火bird.

And the юsecond ヰゐmiller put 拆aside ｐhis 叼tool and ゐlistened.

"路答Stone," sang the 火bird.

юThen the 火third ヰゐmiller put 拆aside ｐhis 叼tool and ゐlistened.

"юdead!" Sang the 火bird so 梆ゐsweetly that with 仇one 桂accord the ヰゐ拣millers ゐlooked 仇up and 拆cried with 仇one 娥voice:

"oh, what a 筐beautiful song! Sing it юagain, dear 火bird, it is 梆sweeter than a 拆别ゐnightingale's."

"that will I ゐゐgladly," 拣answered the 火bird, "if you will ｐhang the ヰゐ答millstone you are picking round ヰmy юneck."

So the ヰゐ拣millers ｐ仇hung it as they were asked; and юwhen the song was finished, the 火bird юspread its 拆wide 拆white wings and, with the ヰゐ答millstone round its юneck and the ゐlittle 答rose-юred 叼shoes in 仇one foot, the 答ゐgolden 别chain in the 仇other, it ゐflew back to the 答rose tree. 仇But the ゐlittle ゐ别ヰ别playmate was not there; ｐhe was 拆inside the ｐhouse 梆eating ｐhis dinner.

юThen the 火bird ゐflew to the ｐhouse, and ゐrattled the ヰゐ答millstone about the 梆eaves until the юヰ仇stepmother 拆cried, "路ｐ葛Hearken! ｐHow it 仇拣thunders!"

So the ゐlittle boy ran out to see, and down dropped the 别dainty 答rose-юred 叼shoes at ｐhis 梆feet.

"see what 拆fine things the 仇thunder ｐhas 佛brought!" ｐHe 拆cried with ゐglee as ｐhe ran back.

юThen the 拆white 火bird ゐrattled the ヰゐ答millstone about the 梆eaves 仇once ヰmore, and 仇once юagain the юヰ仇stepmother юsaid, "路ｐ葛Hearken! ｐHow it 仇拣thunders!"

So this 拆time the father юwent out to see, and down dropped the 答ゐgolden 别chain about ｐhis юneck.

"it is true," ｐhe юsaid юwhen ｐhe 别came back. "the 仇thunder 答does bring 拆fine things!"

юThen 仇once ヰmore the 拆white 火bird ゐrattled the ヰゐ答millstone about the 梆eaves, and this 拆time the юヰ仇stepmother юsaid ｐ仇ゐhurriedly, "路ｐ葛Hark! There it is юagain! 拣ｐPerhaps it ｐhas got 仇ヰsomething for ヰme!"

юThen she ran out; 仇but the ヰ答ヰmoment she юstepped 拆outside the door, down юfell the ヰゐ答millstone 拆right on ｐher ｐюhead and ゐkilled ｐher.

So that was an юend of ｐher. So 仇one day ｐhe 别gave 仇up 佛ゐюaltogether, and they юburied ｐhim 仇under the 答rose tree 拆beside ｐhis ゐlittle ゐ别ヰ别playmate.

Now юwhen the spring 别came and the 答rose tree ゐヰblossomed, the ゐ拣flowers were no ゐlonger 拆white. They were ю○edged with 答rose 仇ゐcolour ゐ拆like the ゐlittle 娥boy's 叼shoes, and in the юcentre of 梆each ゐblossom there was a 筐beautiful 仇tuft of 答ゐgolden ゐsilk ゐ拆like the ゐlittle 火ゐgirl's ｐhair.

And if you ゐlook in a 拆ゐwild 答rose you will 拆find 梆these things there still.
